63 {
64  if (amrex::ParallelDescriptor::IOProcessor()) {
65  const char* romsx_hash = amrex::buildInfoGetGitHash(1);
66  const char* amrex_hash = amrex::buildInfoGetGitHash(2);

73  }

90  // Geometry on all levels has been defined already.
91 
92  // No valid BoxArray and DistributionMapping have been defined.
93  // But the arrays for them have been resized.
94 
95  int nlevs_max = max_level + 1;
96 
97  istep.resize(nlevs_max, 0);
98  nsubsteps.resize(nlevs_max, 1);
99  for (int lev = 1; lev <= max_level; ++lev) {
100  nsubsteps[lev] = MaxRefRatio(lev-1);
101  }
102 
103  t_new.resize(nlevs_max, 0.0);
104  t_old.resize(nlevs_max, -1.e100);
105  dt.resize(nlevs_max, 1.e100);
106 
107  vars_new.resize(nlevs_max);
108  vars_old.resize(nlevs_max);
109 
110  for (int lev = 0; lev < nlevs_max; ++lev) {
111  vars_new[lev].resize(Vars::NumTypes);
112  vars_old[lev].resize(Vars::NumTypes);
113  }
114 
115  flux_registers.resize(nlevs_max);
116 
117  // Initialize tagging criteria for mesh refinement
118  refinement_criteria_setup();
119 
120  // We have already read in the ref_Ratio (via amr.ref_ratio =) but we need to enforce
121  // that there is no refinement in the vertical so we test on that here.
122  for (int lev = 0; lev < max_level; ++lev)
123  {
124  amrex::Print() << "Refinement ratio at level " << lev << " set to be " <<
125  ref_ratio[lev][0] << " " << ref_ratio[lev][1] << " " << ref_ratio[lev][2] << std::endl;
126 
127  if (ref_ratio[lev][2] != 1)
128  {
129  amrex::Error("We don't allow refinement in the vertical -- make sure to set ref_ratio = 1 in z");
130  }
131  }
132 }

◆ Advance()

void ROMSX::Advance ( int  lev,
amrex::Real  time,
amrex::Real  dt_lev,
int  iteration,
int  ncycle 
)

advance a single level for a single time step

9 {
10  BL_PROFILE("ROMSX::Advance()");
11 
12  MultiFab& S_old = vars_old[lev][Vars::cons];
13  MultiFab& S_new = vars_new[lev][Vars::cons];
14 
15  MultiFab& U_old = vars_old[lev][Vars::xvel];
16  MultiFab& V_old = vars_old[lev][Vars::yvel];
17  MultiFab& W_old = vars_old[lev][Vars::zvel];
18 
19  MultiFab& U_new = vars_new[lev][Vars::xvel];
20  MultiFab& V_new = vars_new[lev][Vars::yvel];
21  MultiFab& W_new = vars_new[lev][Vars::zvel];
22 
23  U_old.FillBoundary(geom[lev].periodicity());
24  V_old.FillBoundary(geom[lev].periodicity());
25  W_old.FillBoundary(geom[lev].periodicity());
26  MultiFab::Copy(S_new,S_old,0,0,S_new.nComp(),S_new.nGrowVect());
27  MultiFab::Copy(U_new,U_old,0,0,U_new.nComp(),U_new.nGrowVect());
28  MultiFab::Copy(V_new,V_old,0,0,V_new.nComp(),V_new.nGrowVect());
29  MultiFab::Copy(W_new,W_old,0,0,W_new.nComp(),W_new.nGrowVect());
30

32 
33  const BoxArray& ba = S_old.boxArray();
34  const DistributionMapping& dm = S_old.DistributionMap();
35 
36  int nvars = S_old.nComp();
37 
38  const int ncomp = 1;
39  const int nrhs = ncomp-1;
40  const int nnew = ncomp-1;
41  const int nstp = ncomp-1;
42 
43  // Place-holder for source array -- for now just set to 0

45  source.setVal(0.0);
46 
47  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
48  // Time step momentum equation
49  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
50 
51  //Only used locally, probably should be rearranged into FArrayBox declaration
52  MultiFab mf_AK(ba,dm,1,IntVect(NGROW,NGROW,0)); //2d missing j coordinate
53  MultiFab mf_DC(ba,dm,1,IntVect(NGROW,NGROW,NGROW-1)); //2d missing j coordinate
54  MultiFab mf_Hzk(ba,dm,1,IntVect(NGROW,NGROW,NGROW-1)); //2d missing j coordinate

56  std::unique_ptr<MultiFab>& mf_z_r = vec_z_r[lev];
57  std::unique_ptr<MultiFab>& mf_z_w = vec_z_w[lev];

59  MultiFab mf_u(ba,dm,1,IntVect(NGROW,NGROW,0));

100  // read uninitialized data on ghost values in setting the bc's on the velocities
101  mf_u.setVal(0.e34,IntVect(AMREX_D_DECL(NGROW-1,NGROW-1,0)));
102  mf_v.setVal(0.e34,IntVect(AMREX_D_DECL(NGROW-1,NGROW-1,0)));

109  mf_w.setVal(0);
110  mf_DC.setVal(0);
111  mf_w.setVal(0.e34,IntVect(AMREX_D_DECL(NGROW-1,NGROW-1,0)));
112 
113  MultiFab::Copy(mf_u,U_new,0,0,U_new.nComp(),IntVect(AMREX_D_DECL(NGROW,NGROW,0)));

118  MultiFab::Copy(mf_W,S_old,Omega_comp,0,mf_W.nComp(),IntVect(AMREX_D_DECL(NGROW,NGROW,0)));

259  auto pmon_v=fab_pmon_v.array();
260  auto pnom_v=fab_pnom_v.array();
261  auto fomn=fab_fomn.array();
262 
263  //From ana_grid.h and metrics.F
264  amrex::ParallelFor(gbx2D,
265  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int )
266  {
267  pm(i,j,0)=dxi[0];
268  pn(i,j,0)=dxi[1];
269  //defined UPWELLING
270  Real f0=-8.26e-5;
271  Real beta=0.0;
272  Real Esize=1000*(Mm);
273  Real y = prob_lo[1] + (j + 0.5) * dx[1];
274  Real f=fomn(i,j,0)=f0+beta*(y-.5*Esize);
275  fomn(i,j,0)=f*(1.0/(pm(i,j,0)*pn(i,j,0)));
276  });
277 
278  amrex::ParallelFor(gbx2D,
279  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int )
280  {
281  //Note: are the comment definitons right? Don't seem to match metrics.f90
282  om_v(i,j,0)=1.0/dxi[0]; // 2/(pm(i,j-1)+pm(i,j))
283  on_u(i,j,0)=1.0/dxi[1]; // 2/(pm(i,j-1)+pm(i,j))
284  om_r(i,j,0)=1.0/dxi[0]; // 1/pm(i,j)
285  on_r(i,j,0)=1.0/dxi[1]; // 1/pn(i,j)
286  //todo: om_p on_p
287  om_p(i,j,0)=1.0/dxi[0]; // 4/(pm(i-1,j-1)+pm(i-1,j)+pm(i,j-1)+pm(i,j))
288  on_p(i,j,0)=1.0/dxi[1]; // 4/(pn(i-1,j-1)+pn(i-1,j)+pn(i,j-1)+pn(i,j))
289  on_v(i,j,0)=1.0/dxi[1]; // 2/(pn(i-1,j)+pn(i,j))
290  om_u(i,j,0)=1.0/dxi[0]; // 2/(pm(i-1,j)+pm(i,j))
291  pmon_u(i,j,0)=1.0; // (pm(i-1,j)+pm(i,j))/(pn(i-1,j)+pn(i,j))
292  pnom_u(i,j,0)=1.0; // (pn(i-1,j)+pn(i,j))/(pm(i-1,j)+pm(i,j))
293  pmon_v(i,j,0)=1.0; // (pm(i,j-1)+pm(i,j))/(pn(i,j-1)+pn(i,j))
294  pnom_v(i,j,0)=1.0; // (pn(i,j-1)+pn(i,j))/(pm(i,j-1)+pm(i,j))
295  });
296 
297  amrex::ParallelFor(gbx2,
298  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
299  {
300  Huon(i,j,k,0)=0.0;
301  Hvom(i,j,k,0)=0.0;
302  });
303 
304  // Set bottom stress as defined in set_vbx.F
305  amrex::ParallelFor(gbx1D,
306  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int )
307  {
308  //DO j=Jstr,Jend
309  // DO i=IstrU,Iend
310  bustr(i,j,0) = 0.5 * (rdrag(i-1,j,0)+rdrag(i,j,0))*(uold(i,j,0,nrhs));
311  //DO j=JstrV,Jend
312  // DO i=Istr,Iend
313  bvstr(i,j,0) = 0.5 * (rdrag(i,j-1,0)+rdrag(i,j,0))*(vold(i,j,0,nrhs));
314  });
315 
316  // updates Huon/Hvom
317  set_massflux_3d(gbx2,1,0,uold,Huon,Hz,on_u,nnew);
318  set_massflux_3d(gbx2,0,1,vold,Hvom,Hz,om_v,nnew);
319 
320  rho_eos(gbx2,temp,salt,rho,rhoA,rhoS,pden,Hz,z_w,nrhs,N);
321  }
322  prestep(lev, mf_uold, mf_vold, mf_u, mf_v, mf_ru, mf_rv, mf_tempold, mf_saltold,
323  mf_temp, mf_salt, mf_Hz, vec_Akv[lev], vec_Huon[lev], vec_Hvom[lev], mf_W, mf_DC, vec_t3[lev],
324  vec_s3[lev], mf_z_r, mf_sustr, mf_svstr, mf_bustr, mf_bvstr, iic, ntfirst, nnew,
325  nstp, nrhs, N, dt_lev);
326 
327  for ( MFIter mfi(mf_u, TilingIfNotGPU()); mfi.isValid(); ++mfi )
328  {
329  Array4<Real> const& DC = mf_DC.array(mfi);
330  Array4<Real> const& Akv = (vec_Akv[lev])->array(mfi);
331  Array4<Real> const& Hz = (vec_Hz[lev])->array(mfi);
332  Array4<Real> const& Huon = (vec_Huon[lev])->array(mfi);
333  Array4<Real> const& Hvom = (vec_Hvom[lev])->array(mfi);
334  Array4<Real> const& z_r = (mf_z_r)->array(mfi);
335  Array4<Real> const& z_w = (mf_z_w)->array(mfi);
336  Array4<Real> const& uold = (mf_uold).array(mfi);
337  Array4<Real> const& vold = (mf_vold).array(mfi);
338  Array4<Real> const& u = (mf_u).array(mfi);
339  Array4<Real> const& v = (mf_v).array(mfi);
340  Array4<Real> const& pden = (mf_pden).array(mfi);
341  Array4<Real> const& rho = (mf_rho).array(mfi);
342  Array4<Real> const& rhoA = (mf_rhoA).array(mfi);
343  Array4<Real> const& rhoS = (mf_rhoS).array(mfi);
344  Array4<Real> const& tempold = (mf_tempold).array(mfi);
345  Array4<Real> const& saltold = (mf_saltold).array(mfi);
346  Array4<Real> const& temp = (mf_temp).array(mfi);
347  Array4<Real> const& salt = (mf_salt).array(mfi);
348  Array4<Real> const& tempstore = (vec_t3[lev])->array(mfi);
349  Array4<Real> const& saltstore = (vec_s3[lev])->array(mfi);
350  Array4<Real> const& ru = (mf_ru)->array(mfi);
351  Array4<Real> const& rv = (mf_rv)->array(mfi);
352  Array4<Real> const& rufrc = (mf_rufrc)->array(mfi);
353  Array4<Real> const& rvfrc = (mf_rvfrc)->array(mfi);
354  Array4<Real> const& W = (mf_W).array(mfi);
355  Array4<Real> const& sustr = (mf_sustr)->array(mfi);
356  Array4<Real> const& svstr = (mf_svstr)->array(mfi);
357  Array4<Real> const& rdrag = (mf_rdrag)->array(mfi);
358  Array4<Real> const& bustr = (mf_bustr)->array(mfi);
359  Array4<Real> const& bvstr = (mf_bvstr)->array(mfi);
360  Array4<Real> const& ubar = (mf_ubar)->array(mfi);
361  Array4<Real> const& vbar = (mf_vbar)->array(mfi);
362  Array4<Real> const& visc2_p = (mf_visc2_p)->array(mfi);
363  Array4<Real> const& visc2_r = (mf_visc2_r)->array(mfi);
364  Array4<Real> const& diff2_salt = (mf_diff2_salt)->array(mfi);
365  Array4<Real> const& diff2_temp = (mf_diff2_temp)->array(mfi);
366 
367  Box bx = mfi.tilebox();
368  Box tbxp1 = bx;
369  Box tbxp2 = bx;
370  Box gbx = mfi.growntilebox();
371  Box gbx1 = mfi.growntilebox(IntVect(NGROW-1,NGROW-1,0));
372  Box gbx2 = mfi.growntilebox(IntVect(NGROW,NGROW,0));
373  Box gbx11 = mfi.growntilebox(IntVect(NGROW-1,NGROW-1,NGROW-1));
374 
375  tbxp1.grow(IntVect(NGROW-1,NGROW-1,0));
376  tbxp2.grow(IntVect(NGROW,NGROW,0));
377  //copy the tilebox
378  //Box gbx1 = bx;
379  //Box gbx11 = bx;
380  //Box gbx2 = bx;
381  //TODO: adjust for tiling
382  //Box gbx3uneven(IntVect(AMREX_D_DECL(bx.smallEnd(0)-3,bx.smallEnd(1)-3,bx.smallEnd(2))),
383  // IntVect(AMREX_D_DECL(bx.bigEnd(0)+2,bx.bigEnd(1)+2,bx.bigEnd(2))));
384  //Box gbx2uneven(IntVect(AMREX_D_DECL(bx.smallEnd(0)-2,bx.smallEnd(1)-2,bx.smallEnd(2))),
385  // IntVect(AMREX_D_DECL(bx.bigEnd(0)+1,bx.bigEnd(1)+1,bx.bigEnd(2))));
386  Box ubx = surroundingNodes(bx,0);
387  Box vbx = surroundingNodes(bx,1);
388  //make only gbx be grown to match multifabs
389  //gbx2.grow(IntVect(NGROW,NGROW,0));
390  //gbx1.grow(IntVect(NGROW-1,NGROW-1,0));
391  //gbx11.grow(IntVect(NGROW-1,NGROW-1,NGROW-1));
392 
393  Box bxD = bx;
394  bxD.makeSlab(2,0);
395  Box gbx1D = gbx1;
396  gbx1D.makeSlab(2,0);
397  Box gbx2D = gbx2;
398  gbx2D.makeSlab(2,0);
399 
400  Box tbxp1D = tbxp1;
401  tbxp1D.makeSlab(2,0);
402  Box tbxp2D = tbxp2;
403  tbxp2D.makeSlab(2,0);
404  //gbx1D.grow(IntVect(NGROW-1,NGROW-1,0));
405  //gbx2D.grow(IntVect(NGROW,NGROW,0));
406 
407  FArrayBox fab_FC(gbx2,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena()); //3D
408  FArrayBox fab_FX(gbx2,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena()); //3D
409  FArrayBox fab_FE(gbx2,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena()); //3D
410  FArrayBox fab_BC(gbx2,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena());
411  FArrayBox fab_CF(gbx2,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena());
412  FArrayBox fab_pn(tbxp2D,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena());
413  FArrayBox fab_pm(tbxp2D,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena());
414  FArrayBox fab_on_u(tbxp2D,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena());
415  FArrayBox fab_om_v(tbxp2D,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena());
416  FArrayBox fab_om_u(tbxp2D,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena());
417  FArrayBox fab_on_v(tbxp2D,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena());
418  FArrayBox fab_om_r(tbxp2D,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena());
419  FArrayBox fab_on_r(tbxp2D,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena());
420  FArrayBox fab_om_p(tbxp2D,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena());
421  FArrayBox fab_on_p(tbxp2D,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena());
422  FArrayBox fab_pmon_u(tbxp2D,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena());
423  FArrayBox fab_pnom_u(tbxp2D,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena());
424  FArrayBox fab_pmon_v(tbxp2D,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena());
425  FArrayBox fab_pnom_v(tbxp2D,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena());
426  FArrayBox fab_fomn(tbxp2D,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena());
427  //FArrayBox fab_oHz(gbx11,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena());
428 
429  auto FC=fab_FC.array();
430  auto FX=fab_FX.array();
431  auto FE=fab_FE.array();
432  auto pn=fab_pn.array();
433  auto pm=fab_pm.array();
434  auto on_u=fab_on_u.array();
435  auto om_v=fab_om_v.array();
436  auto om_u=fab_om_u.array();
437  auto on_v=fab_on_v.array();
438  auto om_r=fab_om_r.array();
439  auto on_r=fab_on_r.array();
440  auto om_p=fab_om_p.array();
441  auto on_p=fab_on_p.array();
442  auto pmon_u=fab_pmon_u.array();
443  auto pnom_u=fab_pnom_u.array();
444  auto pmon_v=fab_pmon_v.array();
445  auto pnom_v=fab_pnom_v.array();
446  auto fomn=fab_fomn.array();
447 
448  //From ana_grid.h and metrics.F
449  amrex::ParallelFor(tbxp2D,
450  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int )
451  {
452  pm(i,j,0)=dxi[0];
453  pn(i,j,0)=dxi[1];
454  //defined UPWELLING
455  Real f0=-8.26e-5;
456  Real beta=0.0;
457  Real Esize=1000*(Mm);
458  Real y = prob_lo[1] + (j + 0.5) * dx[1];
459  Real f=fomn(i,j,0)=f0+beta*(y-.5*Esize);
460  fomn(i,j,0)=f*(1.0/(pm(i,j,0)*pn(i,j,0)));
461  });
462 
463  amrex::ParallelFor(tbxp2D,
464  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int )
465  {
466  //Note: are the comment definitons right? Don't seem to match metrics.f90
467  om_v(i,j,0)=1.0/dxi[0]; // 2/(pm(i,j-1)+pm(i,j))
468  on_u(i,j,0)=1.0/dxi[1]; // 2/(pm(i,j-1)+pm(i,j))
469  om_r(i,j,0)=1.0/dxi[0]; // 1/pm(i,j)
470  on_r(i,j,0)=1.0/dxi[1]; // 1/pn(i,j)
471  //todo: om_p on_p
472  om_p(i,j,0)=1.0/dxi[0]; // 4/(pm(i-1,j-1)+pm(i-1,j)+pm(i,j-1)+pm(i,j))
473  on_p(i,j,0)=1.0/dxi[1]; // 4/(pn(i-1,j-1)+pn(i-1,j)+pn(i,j-1)+pn(i,j))
474  on_v(i,j,0)=1.0/dxi[1]; // 2/(pn(i-1,j)+pn(i,j))
475  om_u(i,j,0)=1.0/dxi[0]; // 2/(pm(i-1,j)+pm(i,j))
476  pmon_u(i,j,0)=1.0; // (pm(i-1,j)+pm(i,j))/(pn(i-1,j)+pn(i,j))
477  pnom_u(i,j,0)=1.0; // (pn(i-1,j)+pn(i,j))/(pm(i-1,j)+pm(i,j))
478  pmon_v(i,j,0)=1.0; // (pm(i,j-1)+pm(i,j))/(pn(i,j-1)+pn(i,j))
479  pnom_v(i,j,0)=1.0; // (pn(i,j-1)+pn(i,j))/(pm(i,j-1)+pm(i,j))
480  });
481  if (verbose >= 2) {
482  amrex::PrintToFile("temp_pret3dmix").SetPrecision(18)<<FArrayBox(temp) << std::endl;
483  amrex::PrintToFile("salt_pret3dmix").SetPrecision(18)<<FArrayBox(salt) << std::endl;
484  }
485  t3dmix(bx, temp, diff2_temp, Hz, pm, pn, pmon_u, pnom_v, nrhs, nnew, dt_lev);
486  t3dmix(bx, salt, diff2_salt, Hz, pm, pn, pmon_u, pnom_v, nrhs, nnew, dt_lev);
487  if (verbose >= 2) {
488  amrex::PrintToFile("temp_postt3dmix").SetPrecision(18)<<FArrayBox(temp) << std::endl;
489  amrex::PrintToFile("salt_postt3dmix").SetPrecision(18)<<FArrayBox(salt) << std::endl;
490  }
491 
492  if (solverChoice.use_coriolis) {
493  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
494  // coriolis
495  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
496  //
497  // ru, rv updated
498  // In ROMS, coriolis is the first (un-ifdefed) thing to happen in rhs3d_tile, which gets called after t3dmix
499  coriolis(bx, gbx, uold, vold, ru, rv, Hz, fomn, nrhs, nrhs);
500  }
501  if (verbose >= 2) {
502  amrex::PrintToFile("ru_aftercor").SetPrecision(18)<<FArrayBox(ru)<<std::endl;
503  amrex::PrintToFile("rv_aftercor").SetPrecision(18)<<FArrayBox(rv)<<std::endl;
504  amrex::PrintToFile("u_aftercor").SetPrecision(18)<<FArrayBox(u)<<std::endl;
505  amrex::PrintToFile("v_aftercor").SetPrecision(18)<<FArrayBox(v)<<std::endl;
506  amrex::PrintToFile("temp_aftercor").SetPrecision(18)<<FArrayBox(temp)<<std::endl;
507  amrex::PrintToFile("tempstore_aftercor").SetPrecision(18)<<FArrayBox(tempstore)<<std::endl;
508  amrex::PrintToFile("salt_aftercor").SetPrecision(18)<<FArrayBox(salt)<<std::endl;
509  amrex::PrintToFile("saltstore_aftercor").SetPrecision(18)<<FArrayBox(saltstore)<<std::endl;
510  }
511 
512  //
513  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
514  // rhs_3d
515  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
516  //
517 
518  ////rufrc from 3d is set to ru, then the wind stress (and bottom stress) is added, then the mixing is added
519  //rufrc=ru+sustr*om_u*on_u
520  rhs_3d(bx, gbx, uold, vold, ru, rv, rufrc, rvfrc, sustr, svstr, bustr, bvstr, Huon, Hvom, on_u, om_v, om_u, on_v, W, FC, nrhs, N);
521  if (verbose >= 2) {
522  amrex::PrintToFile("ru_afterrhs").SetPrecision(18)<<FArrayBox(ru)<<std::endl;
523  amrex::PrintToFile("rv_afterrhs").SetPrecision(18)<<FArrayBox(rv)<<std::endl;
524  amrex::PrintToFile("u_afterrhs").SetPrecision(18)<<FArrayBox(u)<<std::endl;
525  amrex::PrintToFile("v_afterrhs").SetPrecision(18)<<FArrayBox(v)<<std::endl;
526  }
527 
528  //u=u+(contributions from S-surfaces viscosity not scaled by dt)*dt*dx*dy
529  //rufrc=rufrc + (contributions from S-surfaces viscosity not scaled by dt*dx*dy)
530  uv3dmix(bx, u, v, rufrc, rvfrc, visc2_p, visc2_r, Hz, om_r, on_r, om_p, on_p, pm, pn, nrhs, nnew, dt_lev);
531  if (verbose >= 2) {
532  amrex::PrintToFile("ru_afteruvmix").SetPrecision(18)<<FArrayBox(ru)<<std::endl;
533  amrex::PrintToFile("rv_afteruvmix").SetPrecision(18)<<FArrayBox(rv)<<std::endl;
534  amrex::PrintToFile("u_afteruvmix").SetPrecision(18)<<FArrayBox(u)<<std::endl;
535  amrex::PrintToFile("v_afteruvmix").SetPrecision(18)<<FArrayBox(v)<<std::endl;
536  amrex::PrintToFile("Huon").SetPrecision(18)<<FArrayBox(Huon)<<std::endl;
537  amrex::PrintToFile("temp_uv3dmix").SetPrecision(18)<<FArrayBox(temp)<<std::endl;
538  amrex::PrintToFile("tempstore_uv3dmix").SetPrecision(18)<<FArrayBox(tempstore)<<std::endl;
539  amrex::PrintToFile("salt_uv3dmix").SetPrecision(18)<<FArrayBox(salt)<<std::endl;
540  amrex::PrintToFile("saltstore_uv3dmix").SetPrecision(18)<<FArrayBox(saltstore)<<std::endl;
541  }
542  } // MFIter
543 
544  mf_temp.FillBoundary(geom[lev].periodicity());
545  mf_salt.FillBoundary(geom[lev].periodicity());
546  mf_tempold.FillBoundary(geom[lev].periodicity());
547  mf_saltold.FillBoundary(geom[lev].periodicity());
548  vec_t3[lev]->FillBoundary(geom[lev].periodicity());
549  vec_s3[lev]->FillBoundary(geom[lev].periodicity());
550  vec_Huon[lev]->FillBoundary(geom[lev].periodicity());
551  vec_Hvom[lev]->FillBoundary(geom[lev].periodicity());
552 
553  bool predictor_2d_step=true;
554  bool first_2d_step=(iic==ntfirst);
555  int nfast_counter=predictor_2d_step ? nfast : nfast-1;
556  nfast_counter += 1;
557  //Compute fast timestep from dt_lev and ratio
558  Real dtfast_lev=dt_lev/Real(fixed_ndtfast_ratio);
559  int next_indx1 = 0;
560  for(int my_iif = 0; my_iif < nfast_counter; my_iif++) {
561  first_2d_step=(my_iif==0);
562  //Predictor
563  predictor_2d_step=true;
564  advance_2d(lev, mf_u, mf_v, mf_rhoS, mf_rhoA, vec_ru[lev], vec_rv[lev],
565  vec_rufrc[lev], vec_rvfrc[lev],
566  vec_Zt_avg1[lev],
567  vec_DU_avg1[lev], vec_DU_avg2[lev],
568  vec_DV_avg1[lev], vec_DV_avg2[lev],
569  vec_rubar[lev], vec_rvbar[lev], vec_rzeta[lev],
570  vec_ubar[lev], vec_vbar[lev], vec_zeta[lev],
571  vec_hOfTheConfusingName[lev], vec_visc2_p[lev], vec_visc2_r[lev],
572  ncomp, dt_lev, dtfast_lev, predictor_2d_step, first_2d_step, my_iif, nfast, next_indx1);
573 
574  //Corrector. Skip it on last fast step
575  predictor_2d_step=false;
576  if (my_iif < nfast_counter - 1) {
577  advance_2d(lev, mf_u, mf_v, mf_rhoS, mf_rhoA, vec_ru[lev], vec_rv[lev],
578  vec_rufrc[lev], vec_rvfrc[lev],
579  vec_Zt_avg1[lev],
580  vec_DU_avg1[lev], vec_DU_avg2[lev],
581  vec_DV_avg1[lev], vec_DV_avg2[lev],
582  vec_rubar[lev], vec_rvbar[lev], vec_rzeta[lev],
583  vec_ubar[lev], vec_vbar[lev], vec_zeta[lev],
584  vec_hOfTheConfusingName[lev], vec_visc2_p[lev], vec_visc2_r[lev],
585  ncomp, dt_lev, dtfast_lev, predictor_2d_step, first_2d_step, my_iif, nfast, next_indx1);
586  }
587  }
588 
589  set_depth(lev);
590 
591  advance_3d(lev, mf_u, mf_v, mf_tempold, mf_saltold, mf_temp, mf_salt, vec_t3[lev], vec_s3[lev], vec_ru[lev], vec_rv[lev],
592  vec_DU_avg1[lev], vec_DU_avg2[lev],
593  vec_DV_avg1[lev], vec_DV_avg2[lev],
594  vec_ubar[lev], vec_vbar[lev],
595  mf_AK, mf_DC,
596  mf_Hzk, vec_Akv[lev], vec_Hz[lev], vec_Huon[lev], vec_Hvom[lev], ncomp, N, dt_lev);
597 
598  MultiFab::Copy(U_new,mf_u,0,0,U_new.nComp(),IntVect(AMREX_D_DECL(NGROW-1,NGROW-1,0)));
599  U_new.FillBoundary(geom[lev].periodicity());
600 
601  MultiFab::Copy(V_new,mf_v,0,0,V_new.nComp(),IntVect(AMREX_D_DECL(NGROW-1,NGROW-1,0)));
602  V_new.FillBoundary(geom[lev].periodicity());
603 
604  MultiFab::Copy(U_old,mf_uold,0,0,U_old.nComp(),IntVect(AMREX_D_DECL(NGROW-1,NGROW-1,0)));
605  U_old.FillBoundary(geom[lev].periodicity());
606 
607  MultiFab::Copy(V_old,mf_vold,0,0,V_old.nComp(),IntVect(AMREX_D_DECL(NGROW-1,NGROW-1,0)));
608  V_old.FillBoundary(geom[lev].periodicity());
609 
610  mf_temp.FillBoundary(geom[lev].periodicity());
611  mf_salt.FillBoundary(geom[lev].periodicity());
612  mf_tempold.FillBoundary(geom[lev].periodicity());

614  vec_t3[lev]->FillBoundary(geom[lev].periodicity());
615  vec_s3[lev]->FillBoundary(geom[lev].periodicity());
616

618  // MultiFab::Copy(W_new,mf_w,0,0,W_new.nComp(),IntVect(AMREX_D_DECL(NGROW-1,NGROW-1,0)));
619  // W_new.FillBoundary();
620  // MultiFab::Copy(mf_W,S_old,Omega_comp,0,mf_W.nComp(),mf_w.nGrowVect());

◆ advance_2d()

void ROMSX::advance_2d ( int  lev,
amrex::MultiFab &  mf_u,
amrex::MultiFab &  mf_v,
amrex::MultiFab &  mf_rhoS,
amrex::MultiFab &  mf_rhoA,
std::unique_ptr< amrex::MultiFab > &  mf_ru,
std::unique_ptr< amrex::MultiFab > &  mf_rv,
std::unique_ptr< amrex::MultiFab > &  mf_rufrc,
std::unique_ptr< amrex::MultiFab > &  mf_rvfrc,
std::unique_ptr< amrex::MultiFab > &  mf_Zt_avg1,
std::unique_ptr< amrex::MultiFab > &  mf_DU_avg1,
std::unique_ptr< amrex::MultiFab > &  mf_DU_avg2,
std::unique_ptr< amrex::MultiFab > &  mf_DV_avg1,
std::unique_ptr< amrex::MultiFab > &  mf_DV_avg2,
std::unique_ptr< amrex::MultiFab > &  mf_rubar,
std::unique_ptr< amrex::MultiFab > &  mf_rvbar,
std::unique_ptr< amrex::MultiFab > &  mf_rzeta,
std::unique_ptr< amrex::MultiFab > &  mf_ubar,
std::unique_ptr< amrex::MultiFab > &  mf_vbar,
std::unique_ptr< amrex::MultiFab > &  mf_zeta,
std::unique_ptr< amrex::MultiFab > &  mf_h,
std::unique_ptr< amrex::MultiFab > &  mf_visc2_p,
std::unique_ptr< amrex::MultiFab > &  mf_visc2_r,
const int  ncomp,
const amrex::Real  dt_lev,
const amrex::Real  dtfast_lev,
const bool  predictor_2d_step,
const bool  first_2d_step,
int  my_iif,
int  nfast,
int &  next_indx1 
)

Perform a 2D predictor (predictor_2d_step=True) or corrector (predictor_2d_step=False) step

35 {
36  auto geomdata = Geom(lev).data();
37  const auto dxi = Geom(lev).InvCellSizeArray();
38 
39  const int Lm = Geom(lev).Domain().size()[0];
40  const int Mm = Geom(lev).Domain().size()[1];
41 
42  auto N = Geom(lev).Domain().size()[2]-1; // Number of vertical "levs" aka, NZ
43 
44  int iic = istep[lev];
45  const int nrhs = ncomp-1;
46  const int nnew = ncomp-1;
47  const int nstp = ncomp-1;
48  int ntfirst = 0;
49  //bool predictor_2d_step = true;
50  // int my_iif = 1; //substep index
51  int knew = 3;
52  int krhs = (my_iif + iic) % 2 + 1;
53  int kstp = my_iif <=1 ? iic % 2 + 1 : (iic % 2 + my_iif % 2 + 1) % 2 + 1;
54  int indx1 = krhs;
55  if(predictor_2d_step)
56  next_indx1 = 3 - indx1;
57  else {
58  knew = next_indx1;
59  kstp = 3 - knew;
60  krhs = 3;
61  //If it's not the auxiliary time step, set indx1 to next_indx1
62  // NOTE: should this ever not execute?
63  if (my_iif<nfast+1)
64  indx1=next_indx1;
65  }
66  int ptsk = 3-kstp;
67  knew-=1;
68  krhs-=1;
69  kstp-=1;
70  indx1-=1;
71  ptsk-=1;
72 
73 
74  for ( MFIter mfi(mf_u, TilingIfNotGPU()); mfi.isValid(); ++mfi )
75  {
76 
77  Array4<Real> const& u = (mf_u).array(mfi);
78  Array4<Real> const& v = (mf_v).array(mfi);
79  Array4<Real> const& rhoS = (mf_rhoS).array(mfi);
80  Array4<Real> const& rhoA = (mf_rhoA).array(mfi);
81  Array4<Real> const& ubar = (mf_ubar)->array(mfi);
82  Array4<Real> const& vbar = (mf_vbar)->array(mfi);
83  Array4<Real> const& zeta = (mf_zeta)->array(mfi);
84  Array4<Real> const& h = (mf_h)->array(mfi);
85  Array4<Real> const& Zt_avg1 = (mf_Zt_avg1)->array(mfi);
86  Array4<Real> const& DU_avg1 = (mf_DU_avg1)->array(mfi);
87  Array4<Real> const& DU_avg2 = (mf_DU_avg2)->array(mfi);
88  Array4<Real> const& DV_avg1 = (mf_DV_avg1)->array(mfi);
89  Array4<Real> const& DV_avg2 = (mf_DV_avg2)->array(mfi);
90  Array4<Real> const& ru = (mf_ru)->array(mfi);
91  Array4<Real> const& rv = (mf_rv)->array(mfi);
92  Array4<Real> const& rufrc = (mf_rufrc)->array(mfi);
93  Array4<Real> const& rvfrc = (mf_rvfrc)->array(mfi);
94  Array4<Real> const& rubar = (mf_rubar)->array(mfi);
95  Array4<Real> const& rvbar = (mf_rvbar)->array(mfi);
96  Array4<Real> const& rzeta = (mf_rzeta)->array(mfi);
97  Array4<Real> const& visc2_p = (mf_visc2_p)->array(mfi);
98  Array4<Real> const& visc2_r = (mf_visc2_r)->array(mfi);
99 
100  Box bx = mfi.tilebox();
101  Box gbx = mfi.growntilebox();
102  Box gbx1 = mfi.growntilebox(IntVect(NGROW-1,NGROW-1,0));
103  Box gbx2 = mfi.growntilebox(IntVect(NGROW,NGROW,0));
104  Box gbx11 = mfi.growntilebox(IntVect(NGROW-1,NGROW-1,NGROW-1));
105 
106  Box tbxp1 = bx;
107  Box tbxp11 = bx;
108  Box tbxp2 = bx;
109  tbxp1.grow(IntVect(NGROW-1,NGROW-1,0));
110  tbxp2.grow(IntVect(NGROW,NGROW,0));
111  tbxp11.grow(IntVect(NGROW-1,NGROW-1,NGROW-1));
112  //make only gbx be grown to match multifabs
113  //gbx2.grow(IntVect(NGROW,NGROW,0));
114  //gbx1.grow(IntVect(NGROW-1,NGROW-1,0));
115  //gbx11.grow(IntVect(NGROW-1,NGROW-1,NGROW-1));
116  Box ubxD = surroundingNodes(bx,0);
117  Box vbxD = surroundingNodes(bx,1);
118 
119  Box bxD = bx;
120  bxD.makeSlab(2,0);
121  Box gbxD = gbx;
122  gbxD.makeSlab(2,0);
123  Box gbx1D = gbx1;
124  gbx1D.makeSlab(2,0);
125  Box gbx2D = gbx2;
126  gbx2D.makeSlab(2,0);
127 
128  Box tbxp2D = tbxp2;
129  tbxp2D.makeSlab(2,0);
130 
131 
132  //bxD.makeSlab(2,0);
133  //ubxD.makeSlab(2,0);
134  //vbxD.makeSlab(2,0);
135  //Box gbx1D = bxD;
136  //Box gbx2D = bxD;
137  //gbx1D.grow(IntVect(NGROW-1,NGROW-1,0));
138  //gbx2D.grow(IntVect(NGROW,NGROW,0));
139 
140  Box tbxp2uneven(IntVect(AMREX_D_DECL(bx.smallEnd(0)-NGROW,bx.smallEnd(1)-NGROW,bx.smallEnd(2))),
141  IntVect(AMREX_D_DECL(bx.bigEnd(0)+NGROW-1,bx.bigEnd(1)+NGROW-1,bx.bigEnd(2))));
142 
143  Box tbxp2unevenD = tbxp2uneven;
144  tbxp2unevenD.makeSlab(2,0);
145 
146  BoxArray ba_gbx2uneven = intersect(BoxArray(tbxp2uneven), gbx);
147  AMREX_ASSERT((ba_gbx2uneven.size() == 1));
148  Box gbx2uneven = ba_gbx2uneven[0];
149  Box gbx2unevenD = gbx2uneven;
150  gbx2unevenD.makeSlab(2,0);
151  //AKA
152  //ubxD.setRange(2,0);
153  //vbxD.setRange(2,0);
154 
155  FArrayBox fab_pn(tbxp2,1,The_Async_Arena());
156  FArrayBox fab_pm(tbxp2,1,The_Async_Arena());
157  FArrayBox fab_on_u(tbxp2,1,The_Async_Arena());
158  FArrayBox fab_om_v(tbxp2,1,The_Async_Arena());
159  FArrayBox fab_fomn(tbxp2,1,The_Async_Arena());
160  FArrayBox fab_Huon(tbxp2,1,The_Async_Arena()); //fab_Huon.setVal(0.0);
161  FArrayBox fab_Hvom(tbxp2,1,The_Async_Arena()); //fab_Hvom.setVal(0.0);
162  FArrayBox fab_oHz(tbxp11,1,The_Async_Arena()); //fab_oHz.setVal(0.0);
163  FArrayBox fab_om_u(tbxp2,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena());
164  FArrayBox fab_on_v(tbxp2,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena());
165  FArrayBox fab_om_r(tbxp2,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena());
166  FArrayBox fab_on_r(tbxp2,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena());
167  FArrayBox fab_om_p(tbxp2,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena());
168  FArrayBox fab_on_p(tbxp2,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena());
169 
170  //step2d work arrays
171  FArrayBox fab_Drhs(tbxp2,1,The_Async_Arena());
172  FArrayBox fab_Drhs_p(tbxp2,1,The_Async_Arena());
173  FArrayBox fab_Dnew(tbxp2,1,The_Async_Arena());
174  FArrayBox fab_zwrk(tbxp2,1,The_Async_Arena());
175  FArrayBox fab_gzeta(tbxp2,1,The_Async_Arena());
176  FArrayBox fab_gzeta2(tbxp2,1,The_Async_Arena());
177  FArrayBox fab_gzetaSA(tbxp2,1,The_Async_Arena());
178  FArrayBox fab_Dstp(tbxp2,1,The_Async_Arena());
179  FArrayBox fab_DUon(tbxp2,1,The_Async_Arena());
180  FArrayBox fab_DVom(tbxp2,1,The_Async_Arena());
181  FArrayBox fab_rhs_ubar(tbxp2,1,The_Async_Arena());
182  FArrayBox fab_rhs_vbar(tbxp2,1,The_Async_Arena());
183  FArrayBox fab_rhs_zeta(tbxp2uneven,1,The_Async_Arena());
184  FArrayBox fab_zeta_new(tbxp2uneven,1,The_Async_Arena());
185 
186  auto on_u=fab_on_u.array();
187  auto om_v=fab_om_v.array();
188  auto pn=fab_pn.array();
189  auto pm=fab_pm.array();
190  auto fomn=fab_fomn.array();
191  auto om_u=fab_om_u.array();
192  auto on_v=fab_on_v.array();
193  auto om_r=fab_om_r.array();
194  auto on_r=fab_on_r.array();
195  auto om_p=fab_om_p.array();
196  auto on_p=fab_on_p.array();
197 
198  auto Drhs=fab_Drhs.array();
199  auto Drhs_p=fab_Drhs_p.array();
200  auto Dnew=fab_Dnew.array();
201  auto zwrk=fab_zwrk.array();
202  auto gzeta=fab_gzeta.array();
203  auto gzeta2=fab_gzeta2.array();
204  auto gzetaSA=fab_gzetaSA.array();
205  auto Dstp=fab_Dstp.array();
206  auto DUon=fab_DUon.array();
207  auto DVom=fab_DVom.array();
208  auto rhs_ubar=fab_rhs_ubar.array();
209  auto rhs_vbar=fab_rhs_vbar.array();
210  auto rhs_zeta=fab_rhs_zeta.array();
211  auto zeta_new=fab_zeta_new.array();
212 
213  auto weight1 = vec_weight1.dataPtr();
214  auto weight2 = vec_weight2.dataPtr();
215  if ((verbose >= 2) && predictor_2d_step && my_iif == 0) {
216  amrex::PrintToFile("ru_startadvance").SetPrecision(18)<<FArrayBox(ru)<<std::endl;
217  amrex::PrintToFile("rv_startadvance").SetPrecision(18)<<FArrayBox(rv)<<std::endl;
218  amrex::PrintToFile("u_startadvance2").SetPrecision(18)<<FArrayBox(u)<<std::endl;
219  amrex::PrintToFile("v_startadvance2").SetPrecision(18)<<FArrayBox(v)<<std::endl;
220  }
221 
222  //From ana_grid.h and metrics.F
223  amrex::ParallelFor(tbxp2,
224  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int)
225  {
226  pm(i,j,0)=dxi[0];
227  pn(i,j,0)=dxi[1];
228  DUon(i,j,0)=0.0;
229  DVom(i,j,0)=0.0;
230  rhs_ubar(i,j,0)=0.0;
231  rhs_vbar(i,j,0)=0.0;
232  });
233 
234  amrex::ParallelFor(tbxp2,
235  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
236  {
237  //Note: are the comment definitons right? Don't seem to match metrics.f90
238  om_v(i,j,0)=1.0/dxi[0]; // 2/(pm(i,j-1)+pm(i,j))
239  on_u(i,j,0)=1.0/dxi[1]; // 2/(pm(i,j-1)+pm(i,j))
240  om_r(i,j,0)=1.0/dxi[0]; // 1/pm(i,j)
241  on_r(i,j,0)=1.0/dxi[1]; // 1/pn(i,j)
242  //todo: om_p on_p
243  om_p(i,j,0)=1.0/dxi[0]; // 4/(pm(i-1,j-1)+pm(i-1,j)+pm(i,j-1)+pm(i,j))
244  on_p(i,j,0)=1.0/dxi[1]; // 4/(pn(i-1,j-1)+pn(i-1,j)+pn(i,j-1)+pn(i,j))
245  on_v(i,j,0)=1.0/dxi[1]; // 2/(pn(i-1,j)+pn(i,j))
246  om_u(i,j,0)=1.0/dxi[0]; // 2/(pm(i-1,j)+pm(i,j))
247  });
248  amrex::ParallelFor(tbxp2,
249  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int )
250  {
251 
252  const auto prob_lo = geomdata.ProbLo();
253  const auto dx = geomdata.CellSize();
254 
255  pm(i,j,0)=dxi[0];
256  pn(i,j,0)=dxi[1];
257  //defined UPWELLING
258  Real f0=-8.26e-5;
259  Real beta=0.0;
260  Real Esize=1000*(Mm);
261  Real y = prob_lo[1] + (j + 0.5) * dx[1];
262  Real f=fomn(i,j,0)=f0+beta*(y-.5*Esize);
263  fomn(i,j,0)=f*(1.0/(pm(i,j,0)*pn(i,j,0)));
264  });
265 
266  amrex::ParallelFor(tbxp2,
267  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int)
268  {
269  Drhs(i,j,0)=zeta(i,j,0,krhs)+h(i,j,0);
270  });
271  amrex::ParallelFor(tbxp2D,
272  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int)
273  {
274  Real cff=.5*on_u(i,j,0);
275  //todo: HACKHACKHACK may not work for evolve_free_surface=1 or flat_bathymetry=0
276  Real cff1=gbx2D.contains(i-1,j,0) ? cff*(Drhs(i,j,0)+Drhs(i-1,j,0)) : on_u(i,j,0)*Drhs(i,j,0);
277  DUon(i,j,0)=ubar(i,j,0,krhs)*cff1;
278  });
279  amrex::ParallelFor(tbxp2D,
280  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int)
281  {
282  Real cff=.5*om_v(i,j,0);
283  //todo: HACKHACKHACK may not work for evolve_free_surface=1 or flat_bathymetry=0
284  Real cff1=gbx2D.contains(i,j-1,0) ? cff*(Drhs(i,j,0)+Drhs(i,j-1,0)) : om_v(i,j,0)*Drhs(i,j,0);
285  DVom(i,j,0)=vbar(i,j,0,krhs)*cff1;
286  });
287  if(predictor_2d_step)
288  {
289  if(first_2d_step) {
290  Real cff2=(Real(-1.0)/Real(12.0))*weight2[my_iif+1];
291  amrex::ParallelFor(gbx2,
292  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int)
293  {
294  Zt_avg1(i,j,0)=0.0;
295  });
296  amrex::ParallelFor(gbx2D,
297  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int)
298  {
299  DU_avg1(i,j,0)=0.0;
300  DU_avg2(i,j,0)=cff2*DUon(i,j,0);
301  });
302  amrex::ParallelFor(gbx2D,
303  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int)
304  {
305  DV_avg1(i,j,0)=0.0;
306  DV_avg2(i,j,0)=cff2*DVom(i,j,0);
307  });
308  }
309  else {
310  Real cff1=weight1[my_iif-1];
311  Real cff2=(Real(8.0)/Real(12.0))*weight2[my_iif]-
312  (Real(1.0)/Real(12.0))*weight2[my_iif+1];
313  amrex::ParallelFor(gbx2,
314  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
315  {
316  if(k==0)
317  Zt_avg1(i,j,0)=Zt_avg1(i,j,0)+cff1*zeta(i,j,0,krhs);
318  });
319  amrex::ParallelFor(gbx2D,
320  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
321  {
322  DU_avg1(i,j,0)=DU_avg1(i,j,0)+cff1*DUon(i,j,0);
323  DU_avg2(i,j,0)=DU_avg2(i,j,0)+cff2*DUon(i,j,0);
324  });
325  amrex::ParallelFor(gbx2D,
326  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int)
327  {
328  DV_avg1(i,j,0)=DV_avg1(i,j,0)+cff1*DVom(i,j,0);
329  DV_avg2(i,j,0)=DV_avg2(i,j,0)+cff2*DVom(i,j,0);
330  });
331  }
332  }
333  else {
334  Real cff2;
335  if(first_2d_step)
336  cff2=weight2[my_iif];
337  else
338  cff2=Real(5.0)/Real(12.0)*weight2[my_iif];
339  amrex::ParallelFor(gbx2D,
340  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int)
341  {
342  DU_avg2(i,j,0)=DU_avg2(i,j,0)+cff2*DUon(i,j,0);
343  });
344  amrex::ParallelFor(gbx2D,
345  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int)
346  {
347  DV_avg2(i,j,0)=DV_avg2(i,j,0)+cff2*DVom(i,j,0);
348  });
349  }
350 
351  //
352  // Do not perform the actual time stepping during the auxiliary
353  // (nfast(ng)+1) time step. Jump to next box
354  //
355 
356  if (my_iif>=nfast) {
357  continue; }
358  //Load new free-surface values into shared array at both predictor
359  //and corrector steps
360  //
361  //=======================================================================
362  // Time step free-surface equation.
363  //=======================================================================
364  //
365  // During the first time-step, the predictor step is Forward-Euler
366  // and the corrector step is Backward-Euler. Otherwise, the predictor
367  // step is Leap-frog and the corrector step is Adams-Moulton.
368  //
369 
370  // todo: gzeta
371 
372  // todo: HACKHACKHACK Should use rho0 from prob.H
373  Real fac=1000.0/1025.0;
374 
375  if(my_iif==0) {
376  Real cff1=dtfast_lev;
377  amrex::ParallelFor(tbxp2unevenD,
378  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int )
379  {
380  rhs_zeta(i,j,0)=(DUon(i,j,0)-DUon(i+1,j,0))+
381  (DVom(i,j,0)-DVom(i,j+1,0));
382  zeta_new(i,j,0)=zeta(i,j,0,kstp)+
383  pm(i,j,0)*pn(i,j,0)*cff1*rhs_zeta(i,j,0);
384  Dnew(i,j,0)=zeta_new(i,j,0)+h(i,j,0);
385 
386  //Pressure gradient terms:
387  zwrk(i,j,0)=0.5_rt*(zeta(i,j,0,kstp)+zeta_new(i,j,0));
388  gzeta(i,j,0)=(fac+rhoS(i,j,0))*zwrk(i,j,0);
389  gzeta2(i,j,0)=gzeta(i,j,0)*zwrk(i,j,0);
390  gzetaSA(i,j,0)=zwrk(i,j,0)*(rhoS(i,j,0)-rhoA(i,j,0));
391  });
392  } else if (predictor_2d_step) {
393  Real cff1=2.0_rt*dtfast_lev;
394  Real cff4=4.0/25.0;
395  Real cff5=1.0-2.0*cff4;
396  amrex::ParallelFor(tbxp2unevenD,
397  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int )
398  {
399  rhs_zeta(i,j,0)=(DUon(i,j,0)-DUon(i+1,j,0))+
400  (DVom(i,j,0)-DVom(i,j+1,0));
401  zeta_new(i,j,0)=zeta(i,j,0,kstp)+
402  pm(i,j,0)*pn(i,j,0)*cff1*rhs_zeta(i,j,0);
403  Dnew(i,j,0)=zeta_new(i,j,0)+h(i,j,0);
404  //Pressure gradient terms
405  zwrk(i,j,0)=cff5*zeta(i,j,0,krhs)+
406  cff4*(zeta(i,j,0,kstp)+zeta_new(i,j,0));
407  gzeta(i,j,0)=(fac+rhoS(i,j,0))*zwrk(i,j,0);
408  gzeta2(i,j,0)=gzeta(i,j,0)*zwrk(i,j,0);
409  gzetaSA(i,j,0)=zwrk(i,j,0)*(rhoS(i,j,0)-rhoA(i,j,0));
410  });
411  } else if (!predictor_2d_step) { //AKA if(corrector_2d_step)
412  Real cff1=dtfast_lev*5.0_rt/12.0_rt;
413  Real cff2=dtfast_lev*8.0_rt/12.0_rt;
414  Real cff3=dtfast_lev*1.0_rt/12.0_rt;
415  Real cff4=2.0_rt/5.0_rt;
416  Real cff5=1.0_rt-cff4;
417  amrex::ParallelFor(tbxp2unevenD,
418  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int )
419  {
420  Real cff=cff1*((DUon(i,j,0)-DUon(i+1,j,0))+
421  (DVom(i,j,0)-DVom(i,j+1,0)));
422  zeta_new(i,j,0)=zeta(i,j,0,kstp)+
423  pm(i,j,0)*pn(i,j,0)*(cff+
424  cff2*rzeta(i,j,0,kstp)-
425  cff3*rzeta(i,j,0,ptsk));
426  Dnew(i,j,0)=zeta_new(i,j,0)+h(i,j,0);
427  //Pressure gradient terms
428  zwrk(i,j,0)=cff5*zeta_new(i,j,0)+cff4*zeta(i,j,0,krhs);
429  gzeta(i,j,0)=(fac+rhoS(i,j,0))*zwrk(i,j,0);
430  gzeta2(i,j,0)=gzeta(i,j,0)*zwrk(i,j,0);
431  gzetaSA(i,j,0)=zwrk(i,j,0)*(rhoS(i,j,0)-rhoA(i,j,0));
432  });
433  }
434 
435  //
436  // Load new free-surface values into shared array at both predictor
437  // and corrector steps.
438  //
439  amrex::ParallelFor(gbx2unevenD,
440  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int )
441  {
442  zeta(i,j,0,knew)=zeta_new(i,j,0);
443  });
444 
445  //
446  // If predictor step, load right-side-term into shared array.
447  //
448  if (predictor_2d_step) {
449  amrex::ParallelFor(gbx2unevenD,
450  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int )
451  {
452  rzeta(i,j,0,krhs)=rhs_zeta(i,j,0);
453  });
454  }
455 
456  //
457  //=======================================================================
458  // Compute right-hand-side for the 2D momentum equations.
459  //=======================================================================
460  //
461 /*
462 !
463 !-----------------------------------------------------------------------
464 ! Compute pressure gradient terms.
465 !-----------------------------------------------------------------------
466 !
467 */
468 
469  Real cff1 = 0.5 * 9.81; // Should be the variable gravitational field strength
470  Real cff2 = 1.0 / 3.0;
471  amrex::ParallelFor(bxD,
472  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int )
473  {
474  rhs_ubar(i,j,0)=cff1*on_u(i,j,0)*
475  ((h(i-1,j,0)+
476  h(i ,j,0))*
477  (gzeta(i-1,j,0)-
478  gzeta(i ,j,0))+
479  (h(i-1,j,0)-
480  h(i ,j,0))*
481  (gzetaSA(i-1,j,0)+
482  gzetaSA(i ,j,0)+
483  cff2*(rhoA(i-1,j,0)-
484  rhoA(i ,j,0))*
485  (zwrk(i-1,j,0)-
486  zwrk(i ,j,0)))+
487  (gzeta2(i-1,j,0)-
488  gzeta2(i ,j,0)));
489  //if (j > JstrV)
490  rhs_vbar(i,j,0)=cff1*om_v(i,j,0)*
491  ((h(i,j-1,0)+
492  h(i,j ,0))*
493  (gzeta(i,j-1,0)-
494  gzeta(i,j ,0))+
495  (h(i,j-1,0)-
496  h(i,j ,0))*
497  (gzetaSA(i,j-1,0)+
498  gzetaSA(i,j ,0)+
499  cff2*(rhoA(i,j-1,0)-
500  rhoA(i,j ,0))*
501  (zwrk(i,j-1,0)-
502  zwrk(i,j ,0)))+
503  (gzeta2(i,j-1,0)-
504  gzeta2(i,j ,0)));
505  });
506 /*
507  cff1=0.5_r8*g
508  cff2=1.0_r8/3.0_r8
509  DO j=Jstr,Jend
510  DO i=IstrU,Iend
511  rhs_ubar(i,j,0)=cff1*on_u(i,j,0)* &
512  & ((h(i-1,j,0)+ &
513  & h(i ,j,0))* &
514  & (gzeta(i-1,j,0)- &
515  & gzeta(i ,j,0))+ &
516  & (h(i-1,j,0)- &
517  & h(i ,j,0))* &
518  & (gzetaSA(i-1,j,0)+ &
519  & gzetaSA(i ,j,0)+ &
520  & cff2*(rhoA(i-1,j,0)- &
521  & rhoA(i ,j,0))* &
522  & (zwrk(i-1,j,0)- &
523  & zwrk(i ,j,0)))+ &
524  & (gzeta2(i-1,j,0)- &
525  & gzeta2(i ,j,0)))
526  END DO
527  IF (j.ge.JstrV) THEN
528  DO i=Istr,Iend
529  rhs_vbar(i,j,0)=cff1*om_v(i,j,0)* &
530  & ((h(i,j-1)+ &
531  & h(i,j ))* &
532  & (gzeta(i,j-1)- &
533  & gzeta(i,j ))+ &
534  & (h(i,j-1)- &
535  & h(i,j ))* &
536  & (gzetaSA(i,j-1)+ &
537  & gzetaSA(i,j )+ &
538  & cff2*(rhoA(i,j-1)- &
539  & rhoA(i,j ))* &
540  & (zwrk(i,j-1)- &
541  & zwrk(i,j )))+ &
542  & (gzeta2(i,j-1)- &
543  & gzeta2(i,j )))
544  END DO
545  END IF
546  END DO
547 */
548  // Advection terms for 2d ubar, vbar added to rhs_ubar and rhs_vbar
549  //
550  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
551  // rhs_2d
552  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
553  //
554  rhs_2d(bxD, ubar, vbar, rhs_ubar, rhs_vbar, DUon, DVom, krhs, N);
555  if (solverChoice.use_coriolis) {
556  // Coriolis terms for 2d ubar, vbar added to rhs_ubar and rhs_vbar
557  //
558  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
559  // coriolis
560  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
561  //
562  // Need to clean up rhs_ubar vs rubar (index only the same for one out of predictor/corrector)
563  coriolis(bxD, gbxD, ubar, vbar, rhs_ubar, rhs_vbar, Drhs, fomn, krhs, 0);
564  }
565  //Add in horizontal harmonic viscosity.
566  // Consider generalizing or copying uv3dmix, where Drhs is used instead of Hz and u=>ubar v=>vbar, drop dt terms
567  amrex::ParallelFor(tbxp1,
568  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int)
569  {
570  Drhs_p(i,j,0)=0.25*(Drhs(i,j,0)+Drhs(i-1,j,0)+
571  Drhs(i,j-1,0)+Drhs(i-1,j-1,0));
572  });
573 
574  uv3dmix(bxD, ubar, vbar, rhs_ubar, rhs_vbar, visc2_p, visc2_r, Drhs_p, on_r, om_r, on_p, om_p, pn, pm, krhs, nnew, 0.0);
575 
576  //Coupling from 3d to 2d
577  /////////Coupling of 3d updates to 2d predictor-corrector
578  //todo: my_iif=>my_my_iif iic => icc
579  if (first_2d_step&&predictor_2d_step) {
580  if (iic==ntfirst) {
581  amrex::ParallelFor(gbx1D,
582  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int )
583  {
584  //DO j=Jstr,Jend
585  //DO i=IstrU,Iend
586  rufrc(i,j,0)=rufrc(i,j,0)-rhs_ubar(i,j,0);
587  rhs_ubar(i,j,0)=rhs_ubar(i,j,0)+rufrc(i,j,0);
588  ru(i,j,-1,nstp)=rufrc(i,j,0);
589  });
590  //END DO
591  //END DO
592  amrex::ParallelFor(gbx1D,
593  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int )
594  {
595  //DO j=JstrV,Jend
596  //DO i=Istr,Iend
597  rvfrc(i,j,0)=rvfrc(i,j,0)-rhs_vbar(i,j,0);
598  rhs_vbar(i,j,0)=rhs_vbar(i,j,0)+rvfrc(i,j,0);
599  rv(i,j,-1,nstp)=rvfrc(i,j,0);
600  });
601  // END DO
602  // END DO
603  } else if (iic==(ntfirst+1)) {
604  amrex::ParallelFor(gbx1D,
605  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int )
606  {
607  //DO j=Jstr,Jend
608  //DO i=IstrU,Iend
609  rufrc(i,j,0)=rufrc(i,j,0)-rhs_ubar(i,j,0);
610  rhs_ubar(i,j,0)=rhs_ubar(i,j,0)+
611  1.5_rt*rufrc(i,j,0)-0.5_rt*ru(i,j,-1,0);
612  ru(i,j,-1,1)=rufrc(i,j,0);
613  Real r_swap= ru(i,j,-1,1);
614  ru(i,j,-1,1) = ru(i,j,-1,0);
615  ru(i,j,-1,0) = r_swap;
616  });
617  //END DO
618  // END DO
619  amrex::ParallelFor(gbx1D,
620  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int )
621  {
622  //DO j=JstrV,Jend
623  //DO i=Istr,Iend
624  rvfrc(i,j,0)=rvfrc(i,j,0)-rhs_vbar(i,j,0);
625  rhs_vbar(i,j,0)=rhs_vbar(i,j,0)+
626  1.5_rt*rvfrc(i,j,0)-0.5_rt*rv(i,j,-1,0);
627  rv(i,j,-1,1)=rvfrc(i,j,0);
628  Real r_swap= rv(i,j,-1,1);
629  rv(i,j,-1,1) = rv(i,j,-1,0);
630  rv(i,j,-1,0) = r_swap;
631  });
632  //END DO
633  // END DO
634  } else {
635  Real cff1=23.0_rt/12.0_rt;
636  Real cff2=16.0_rt/12.0_rt;
637  Real cff3= 5.0_rt/12.0_rt;
638  amrex::ParallelFor(gbx1D,
639  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int )
640  {
641  //DO j=Jstr,Jend
642  //DO i=IstrU,Iend
643  rufrc(i,j,0)=rufrc(i,j,0)-rhs_ubar(i,j,0);
644  rhs_ubar(i,j,0)=rhs_ubar(i,j,0)+
645  cff1*rufrc(i,j,0)-
646  cff2*ru(i,j,-1,0)+
647  cff3*ru(i,j,-1,1);
648  ru(i,j,-1,1)=rufrc(i,j,0);
649  Real r_swap= ru(i,j,-1,1);
650  ru(i,j,-1,1) = ru(i,j,-1,0);
651  ru(i,j,-1,0) = r_swap;
652  });
653  //END DO
654  //END DO
655  amrex::ParallelFor(gbx1D,
656  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int )
657  {
658  //DO j=JstrV,Jend
659  //DO i=Istr,Iend
660  rvfrc(i,j,0)=rvfrc(i,j,0)-rhs_vbar(i,j,0);
661  rhs_vbar(i,j,0)=rhs_vbar(i,j,0)+
662  cff1*rvfrc(i,j,0)-
663  cff2*rv(i,j,-1,0)+
664  cff3*rv(i,j,-1,1);
665  rv(i,j,-1,1)=rvfrc(i,j,0);
666 
667  Real r_swap= rv(i,j,-1,1);
668  rv(i,j,-1,1) = rv(i,j,-1,0);
669  rv(i,j,-1,0) = r_swap;
670  });
671  //END DO
672  //END DO
673  }
674  } else {
675  amrex::ParallelFor(gbx1D,
676  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int )
677  {
678  //DO j=Jstr,Jend
679  //DO i=IstrU,Iend
680  rhs_ubar(i,j,0)=rhs_ubar(i,j,0)+rufrc(i,j,0);
681  });
682  //END DO
683  //END DO
684  amrex::ParallelFor(gbx1D,
685  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int )
686  {
687  //DO j=JstrV,Jend
688  //DO i=Istr,Iend
689  rhs_vbar(i,j,0)=rhs_vbar(i,j,0)+rvfrc(i,j,0);
690  });
691  //END DO
692  //END DO
693  }
694 
695  //
696  //=======================================================================
697  // Time step 2D momentum equations.
698  //=======================================================================
699  //
700  // Compute total water column depth.
701  //
702  amrex::ParallelFor(tbxp2D,
703  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int )
704  {
705  //DO j=JstrV-1,Jend
706  //DO i=IstrU-1,Iend
707  Dstp(i,j,0)=zeta(i,j,0,kstp)+h(i,j,0);
708  });
709  //END DO
710  //END DO
711 
712  //
713  // During the first time-step, the predictor step is Forward-Euler
714  // and the corrector step is Backward-Euler. Otherwise, the predictor
715  // step is Leap-frog and the corrector step is Adams-Moulton.
716  //
717  if (my_iif==0) {
718  Real cff1=0.5_rt*dtfast_lev;
719  amrex::ParallelFor(gbx1D,
720  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int )
721  {
722  //DO j=Jstr,Jend
723  //DO i=IstrU,Iend
724  Real cff=(pm(i,j,0)+pm(i-1,j,0))*(pn(i,j,0)+pn(i-1,j,0));
725  Real fac=1.0_rt/(Dnew(i,j,0)+Dnew(i-1,j,0));
726  ubar(i,j,0,knew)=(ubar(i,j,0,kstp)*
727  (Dstp(i,j,0)+Dstp(i-1,j,0))+
728  cff*cff1*rhs_ubar(i,j,0))*fac;
729  });
730  //END DO
731  //END DO
732  amrex::ParallelFor(gbx1D,
733  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int )
734  {
735  //DO j=JstrV,Jend
736  //DO i=Istr,Iend
737  Real cff=(pm(i,j,0)+pm(i,j-1,0))*(pn(i,j,0)+pn(i,j-1,0));
738  Real fac=1.0_rt/(Dnew(i,j,0)+Dnew(i,j-1,0));
739  vbar(i,j,0,knew)=(vbar(i,j,0,kstp)*
740  (Dstp(i,j,0)+Dstp(i,j-1,0))+
741  cff*cff1*rhs_vbar(i,j,0))*fac;
742  });
743  //END DO
744  //END DO
745  } else if (predictor_2d_step) {
746  Real cff1=dtfast_lev;
747  amrex::ParallelFor(gbx1D,
748  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int )
749  {
750  //DO j=Jstr,Jend
751  //DO i=IstrU,Iend
752  Real cff=(pm(i,j,0)+pm(i-1,j,0))*(pn(i,j,0)+pn(i-1,j,0));
753  Real fac=1.0_rt/(Dnew(i,j,0)+Dnew(i-1,j,0));
754  ubar(i,j,0,knew)=(ubar(i,j,0,kstp)*
755  (Dstp(i,j,0)+Dstp(i-1,j,0))+
756  cff*cff1*rhs_ubar(i,j,0))*fac;
757  });
758  //END DO
759  //END DO
760  amrex::ParallelFor(gbx1D,
761  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int )
762  {
763  //DO j=JstrV,Jend
764  //DO i=Istr,Iend
765  Real cff=(pm(i,j,0)+pm(i,j-1,0))*(pn(i,j,0)+pn(i,j-1,0));
766  Real fac=1.0_rt/(Dnew(i,j,0)+Dnew(i,j-1,0));
767  vbar(i,j,0,knew)=(vbar(i,j,0,kstp)*
768  (Dstp(i,j,0)+Dstp(i,j-1,0))+
769  cff*cff1*rhs_vbar(i,j,0))*fac;
770  });
771  //END DO
772  //END DO
773  } else if ((!predictor_2d_step)) {
774  Real cff1=0.5_rt*dtfast_lev*5.0_rt/12.0_rt;
775  Real cff2=0.5_rt*dtfast_lev*8.0_rt/12.0_rt;
776  Real cff3=0.5_rt*dtfast_lev*1.0_rt/12.0_rt;
777  amrex::ParallelFor(gbx1D,
778  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int )
779  {
780  //DO j=Jstr,Jend
781  //DO i=IstrU,Iend
782  Real cff=(pm(i,j,0)+pm(i-1,j,0))*(pn(i,j,0)+pn(i-1,j,0));
783  Real fac=1.0_rt/(Dnew(i,j,0)+Dnew(i-1,j,0));
784  ubar(i,j,0,knew)=(ubar(i,j,0,kstp)*
785  (Dstp(i,j,0)+Dstp(i-1,j,0))+
786  cff*(cff1*rhs_ubar(i,j,0)+
787  cff2*rubar(i,j,0,kstp)-
788  cff3*rubar(i,j,0,ptsk)))*fac;
789  });
790  //END DO
791  //END DO
792  amrex::ParallelFor(gbx1D,
793  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int )
794  {
795  //DO j=JstrV,Jend
796  //DO i=Istr,Iend
797  Real cff=(pm(i,j,0)+pm(i,j-1,0))*(pn(i,j,0)+pn(i,j-1,0));
798  Real fac=1.0_rt/(Dnew(i,j,0)+Dnew(i,j-1,0));
799  vbar(i,j,0,knew)=(vbar(i,j,0,kstp)*
800  (Dstp(i,j,0)+Dstp(i,j-1,0))+
801  cff*(cff1*rhs_vbar(i,j,0)+
802  cff2*rvbar(i,j,0,kstp)-
803  cff3*rvbar(i,j,0,ptsk)))*fac;
804  });
805  //END DO
806  //END DO
807  }
808 
809  //store rhs_ubar and rhs_vbar to save later
810  //
811  // If predictor step, load right-side-term into shared arrays for
812  // future use during the subsequent corrector step.
813  //
814 
815  if (predictor_2d_step) {
816  amrex::ParallelFor(gbx1D,
817  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int )
818  {
819  //DO j=Jstr,Jend
820  //DO i=IstrU,Iend
821  rubar(i,j,0,krhs)=rhs_ubar(i,j,0);
822  });
823  //END DO
824  //END DO
825  amrex::ParallelFor(gbx1D,
826  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int )
827  {
828  //DO j=JstrV,Jend
829  //DO i=Istr,Iend
830  rvbar(i,j,0,krhs)=rhs_vbar(i,j,0);
831  });
832  //END DO
833  //END DO
834  }
835  }
836  mf_DU_avg1->FillBoundary(geom[lev].periodicity());
837  mf_DU_avg2->FillBoundary(geom[lev].periodicity());
838  mf_DV_avg1->FillBoundary(geom[lev].periodicity());
839  mf_DV_avg2->FillBoundary(geom[lev].periodicity());
840  mf_rubar->FillBoundary(geom[lev].periodicity());
841  mf_rvbar->FillBoundary(geom[lev].periodicity());
842  mf_rzeta->FillBoundary(geom[lev].periodicity());
843  mf_ubar->FillBoundary(geom[lev].periodicity());
844  mf_vbar->FillBoundary(geom[lev].periodicity());
845  mf_zeta->FillBoundary(geom[lev].periodicity());
846 
847 }
ROMSX::vec_weight2
amrex::Vector< amrex::Real > vec_weight2
Definition: ROMSX.H:320
ROMSX::vec_weight1
amrex::Vector< amrex::Real > vec_weight1
Definition: ROMSX.H:319
ROMSX::rhs_2d
void rhs_2d(const amrex::Box &bx, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > uold, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > vold, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > ru, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > rv, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > Huon, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > Hvom, int nrhs, int N)
Definition: ROMSX_rhs_uv_2d.cpp:11

◆ advance_3d()

void ROMSX::advance_3d ( int  lev,
amrex::MultiFab &  mf_u,
amrex::MultiFab &  mf_v,
amrex::MultiFab &  mf_tempold,
amrex::MultiFab &  mf_saltold,
amrex::MultiFab &  mf_temp,
amrex::MultiFab &  mf_salt,
std::unique_ptr< amrex::MultiFab > &  mf_tempstore,
std::unique_ptr< amrex::MultiFab > &  mf_saltstore,
std::unique_ptr< amrex::MultiFab > &  mf_ru,
std::unique_ptr< amrex::MultiFab > &  mf_rv,
std::unique_ptr< amrex::MultiFab > &  mf_DU_avg1,
std::unique_ptr< amrex::MultiFab > &  mf_DU_avg2,
std::unique_ptr< amrex::MultiFab > &  mf_DV_avg1,
std::unique_ptr< amrex::MultiFab > &  mf_DV_avg2,
std::unique_ptr< amrex::MultiFab > &  mf_ubar,
std::unique_ptr< amrex::MultiFab > &  mf_vbar,
amrex::MultiFab &  mf_AK,
amrex::MultiFab &  mf_DC,
amrex::MultiFab &  mf_Hzk,
std::unique_ptr< amrex::MultiFab > &  mf_Akv,
std::unique_ptr< amrex::MultiFab > &  mf_Hz,
std::unique_ptr< amrex::MultiFab > &  mf_Huon,
std::unique_ptr< amrex::MultiFab > &  mf_Hvom,
const int  ncomp,
const int  N,
const amrex::Real  dt_lev 
)

Advance the 3D variables

32 {
33 
34  auto geomdata = Geom(lev).data();
35  const auto dxi = Geom(lev).InvCellSizeArray();
36 
37  const int Mm = Geom(lev).Domain().size()[1];
38 
39  const int nrhs = ncomp-1;
40  const int nnew = ncomp-1;
41 
42  int iic = istep[lev];
43  int ntfirst = 0;
44 
45  for ( MFIter mfi(mf_u, TilingIfNotGPU()); mfi.isValid(); ++mfi )
46  {
47  Array4<Real> const& u = mf_u.array(mfi);
48  Array4<Real> const& v = mf_v.array(mfi);
49 
50  Array4<Real> const& tempold = (mf_tempold).array(mfi);
51  Array4<Real> const& saltold = (mf_saltold).array(mfi);
52 
53  Array4<Real> const& temp = (mf_temp).array(mfi);
54  Array4<Real> const& salt = (mf_salt).array(mfi);
55 
56  Array4<Real> const& tempstore = mf_tempstore->array(mfi);
57  Array4<Real> const& saltstore = mf_saltstore->array(mfi);
58 
59  Array4<Real> const& ru = mf_ru->array(mfi);
60  Array4<Real> const& rv = mf_rv->array(mfi);
61 
62  Array4<Real> const& AK = mf_AK.array(mfi);
63  Array4<Real> const& DC = mf_DC.array(mfi);
64 
65  Array4<Real> const& Hzk = mf_Hzk.array(mfi);
66  Array4<Real> const& Akv = mf_Akv->array(mfi);
67  Array4<Real> const& Hz = mf_Hz->array(mfi);
68 
69  Array4<Real> const& DU_avg1 = mf_DU_avg1->array(mfi);
70  Array4<Real> const& DV_avg1 = mf_DV_avg1->array(mfi);
71 
72  Array4<Real> const& DU_avg2 = mf_DU_avg2->array(mfi);
73  Array4<Real> const& DV_avg2 = mf_DV_avg2->array(mfi);
74 
75  Array4<Real> const& ubar = mf_ubar->array(mfi);
76  Array4<Real> const& vbar = mf_vbar->array(mfi);
77 
78  Array4<Real> const& Huon = mf_Huon->array(mfi);
79  Array4<Real> const& Hvom = mf_Hvom->array(mfi);
80 
81  Box bx = mfi.tilebox();
82  Box gbx = mfi.growntilebox();
83  Box gbx1 = mfi.growntilebox(IntVect(NGROW-1,NGROW-1,0));
84  Box gbx2 = mfi.growntilebox(IntVect(NGROW,NGROW,0));
85  Box gbx11 = mfi.growntilebox(IntVect(NGROW-1,NGROW-1,NGROW-1));
86  Box gbx21 = mfi.growntilebox(IntVect(NGROW,NGROW,NGROW-1));
87 
88  Box tbxp1 = bx;
89  Box tbxp11 = bx;
90  Box tbxp2 = bx;
91  tbxp1.grow(IntVect(NGROW-1,NGROW-1,0));
92  tbxp2.grow(IntVect(NGROW,NGROW,0));
93  tbxp11.grow(IntVect(NGROW-1,NGROW-1,NGROW-1));
94 
95  Box ubx = surroundingNodes(bx,0);
96  Box vbx = surroundingNodes(bx,1);
97  Box ubx2 = surroundingNodes(ubx,0);
98  Box vbx2 = surroundingNodes(vbx,1);
99  if (verbose > 0) {
100  amrex::Print() << " BX " << bx << std::endl;
101  amrex::Print() << "UBX " << ubx << std::endl;
102  amrex::Print() << "VBX " << vbx << std::endl;
103  }
104 
105  FArrayBox fab_FC(gbx2,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena());
106  FArrayBox fab_BC(gbx2,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena());
107  FArrayBox fab_CF(gbx21,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena());
108  FArrayBox fab_oHz(gbx11,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena());
109  FArrayBox fab_pn(tbxp2,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena());
110  FArrayBox fab_pm(tbxp2,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena());
111  FArrayBox fab_fomn(tbxp2,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena());
112  FArrayBox fab_Akt(tbxp2,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena());
113  FArrayBox fab_W(tbxp2,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena());
114 
115  FArrayBox fab_on_u(tbxp2,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena());
116  FArrayBox fab_om_v(tbxp2,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena());
117  auto on_u=fab_on_u.array();
118  auto om_v=fab_om_v.array();
119 
120  auto FC = fab_FC.array();
121  auto BC = fab_BC.array();
122  auto CF = fab_CF.array();
123  auto oHz= fab_oHz.array();
124  auto pn=fab_pn.array();
125  auto pm=fab_pm.array();
126  auto fomn=fab_fomn.array();
127  auto Akt= fab_Akt.array();
128  auto W= fab_W.array();
129  //From ini_fields and .in file
130  //fab_Akt.setVal(1e-6);
131  //From ana_grid.h and metrics.F
132  //
133  if (verbose >= 2) {
134  amrex::PrintToFile("u").SetPrecision(18)<<FArrayBox(u)<<std::endl;
135  amrex::PrintToFile("v").SetPrecision(18)<<FArrayBox(v)<<std::endl;
136  amrex::PrintToFile("temp_startad").SetPrecision(18)<<FArrayBox(temp)<<std::endl;
137  amrex::PrintToFile("tempstore_startad").SetPrecision(18)<<FArrayBox(tempstore)<<std::endl;
138  amrex::PrintToFile("salt_startad").SetPrecision(18)<<FArrayBox(salt)<<std::endl;
139  amrex::PrintToFile("saltstore_startad").SetPrecision(18)<<FArrayBox(saltstore)<<std::endl;
140  }
141 
142  // Update to u and v
143  //
144  amrex::ParallelFor(tbxp2,
145  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
146  {
147  const auto prob_lo = geomdata.ProbLo();
148  const auto dx = geomdata.CellSize();
149 
150  pm(i,j,0)=dxi[0];
151  pn(i,j,0)=dxi[1];
152 
153  //defined UPWELLING
154  Real f0=-8.26e-5;
155  Real beta=0.0;
156  Real Esize=1000*(Mm);
157  Real y = prob_lo[1] + (j + 0.5) * dx[1];
158  Real f=fomn(i,j,0)=f0+beta*(y-.5*Esize);
159  fomn(i,j,0)=f*(1.0/(pm(i,j,0)*pn(i,j,0)));
160  Akt(i,j,k)=1e-6;
161  });
162  amrex::ParallelFor(tbxp2,
163  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
164  {
165  om_v(i,j,0)=1.0/dxi[0];
166  on_u(i,j,0)=1.0/dxi[1];
167  });
168 
169  Real cff;
170  if (iic==ntfirst) {
171  cff=0.25*dt_lev;
172  } else if (iic==ntfirst+1) {
173  cff=0.25*dt_lev*3.0/2.0;
174  } else {
175  cff=0.25*dt_lev*23.0/12.0;
176  }
177  if(solverChoice.test_vertical) {
178  amrex::ParallelFor(gbx2,
179  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
180  {
181  u(i,j,k) += gbx2.contains(i-1,j,0) ? cff * (pm(i,j,0)+pm(i-1,j,0)) * (pn(i,j,0)+pn(i-1,j,0)) * ru(i,j,k,nrhs) : cff * (2.0 * pm(i,j,0)) * (2.0 * pn(i,j,0)) * ru(i,j,k,nrhs) ;
182  v(i,j,k) += gbx2.contains(i,j-1,0) ? cff * (pm(i,j,0)+pm(i,j-1,0)) * (pn(i,j,0)+pn(i,j-1,0)) * rv(i,j,k,nrhs) : cff * (2.0 * pm(i,j,0)) * (2.0 * pn(i,j,0)) * rv(i,j,k,nrhs);
183 
184  u(i,j,k) *= gbx2.contains(i-1,j,0) ? 2.0 / (Hz(i-1,j,k) + Hz(i,j,k)) : 1.0 / (Hz(i,j,k));
185  v(i,j,k) *= gbx2.contains(i,j-1,0) ? 2.0 / (Hz(i,j-1,k) + Hz(i,j,k)) : 1.0 / (Hz(i,j,k));
186  });
187  {
188  amrex::Gpu::synchronize();
189  amrex::Gpu::LaunchSafeGuard lsg(true);
190  //amrex::ParallelFor(gbx2,
191  // [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
192  // {
193  // printf("%d %d %d %25.25g uvel after uv in advance3d\n", i,j,k,u(i,j,k));
194  // });
195  // NOTE: DC is only used as scratch in vert_visc_3d -- no need to pass or return a value
196  // NOTE: may not actually need to set these to zero
197  amrex::ParallelFor(gbx21,
198  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
199  {
200  DC(i,j,k) = 0.0;
201  CF(i,j,k) = 0.0;
202  });
203 #ifdef AMREX_USE_GPU
204  Gpu::synchronize();
205 #else
206 #endif
207  vert_visc_3d(gbx1,bx,1,0,u,Hz,Hzk,oHz,AK,Akv,BC,DC,FC,CF,nnew,N,dt_lev);
208 
209  amrex::ParallelFor(gbx21,
210  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
211  {
212  DC(i,j,k) = 0.0;
213  CF(i,j,k) = 0.0;
214  });
215  vert_visc_3d(gbx1,bx,0,1,v,Hz,Hzk,oHz,AK,Akv,BC,DC,FC,CF,nnew,N,dt_lev);
216  }
217  amrex::ParallelFor(gbx21,
218  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
219  {
220  DC(i,j,k) = 0.0;
221  CF(i,j,k) = 0.0;
222  });
223  vert_mean_3d(bx,1,0,u,Hz,Hzk,DU_avg1,oHz,Akv,BC,DC,FC,CF,pm,nnew,N,dt_lev);
224 
225  amrex::ParallelFor(gbx21,
226  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
227  {
228  DC(i,j,k) = 0.0;
229  CF(i,j,k) = 0.0;
230  });
231  vert_mean_3d(bx,0,1,v,Hz,Hzk,DV_avg1,oHz,Akv,BC,DC,FC,CF,pn,nnew,N,dt_lev);
232 
233 
234  update_massflux_3d(gbx2,bx,1,0,u,Huon,Hz,on_u,DU_avg1,DU_avg2,DC,FC,CF,nnew);
235  amrex::ParallelFor(Box(ubar),
236  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
237  {
238  ubar(i,j,k,0) = DC(i,j,-1)*DU_avg1(i,j,0);
239  ubar(i,j,k,1) = ubar(i,j,k,0);
240  });
241  update_massflux_3d(gbx2,bx,0,1,v,Hvom,Hz,om_v,DV_avg1,DV_avg2,DC,FC,CF,nnew);
242  amrex::ParallelFor(Box(vbar),
243  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
244  {
245  vbar(i,j,k,0) = DC(i,j,-1)*DV_avg1(i,j,0);
246  vbar(i,j,k,1) = vbar(i,j,k,0);
247  });
248  //amrex::ParallelFor(ubx,
249  //[=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
250  //{
251  // printf("%d %d %d %25.25g Huon after massflux\n", i, j, k, Huon(i,j,k));
252  // });
253  }
254  }
255  for ( MFIter mfi(mf_u, TilingIfNotGPU()); mfi.isValid(); ++mfi )
256  {
257  Array4<Real> const& u = mf_u.array(mfi);
258  Array4<Real> const& v = mf_v.array(mfi);
259 
260  Array4<Real> const& tempold = (mf_tempold).array(mfi);
261  Array4<Real> const& saltold = (mf_saltold).array(mfi);
262 
263  Array4<Real> const& temp = (mf_temp).array(mfi);
264  Array4<Real> const& salt = (mf_salt).array(mfi);
265 
266  Array4<Real> const& tempstore = mf_tempstore->array(mfi);
267  Array4<Real> const& saltstore = mf_saltstore->array(mfi);
268 
269  Array4<Real> const& ru = mf_ru->array(mfi);
270  Array4<Real> const& rv = mf_rv->array(mfi);
271 
272  Array4<Real> const& AK = mf_AK.array(mfi);
273  Array4<Real> const& DC = mf_DC.array(mfi);
274 
275  Array4<Real> const& Hzk = mf_Hzk.array(mfi);
276  Array4<Real> const& Akv = mf_Akv->array(mfi);
277  Array4<Real> const& Hz = mf_Hz->array(mfi);
278 
279  Array4<Real> const& DU_avg1 = mf_DU_avg1->array(mfi);
280  Array4<Real> const& DV_avg1 = mf_DV_avg1->array(mfi);
281 
282  Array4<Real> const& DU_avg2 = mf_DU_avg2->array(mfi);
283  Array4<Real> const& DV_avg2 = mf_DV_avg2->array(mfi);
284 
285  Array4<Real> const& ubar = mf_ubar->array(mfi);
286  Array4<Real> const& vbar = mf_vbar->array(mfi);
287 
288  Array4<Real> const& Huon = mf_Huon->array(mfi);
289  Array4<Real> const& Hvom = mf_Hvom->array(mfi);
290 
291  Box bx = mfi.tilebox();
292  Box gbx = mfi.growntilebox();
293  Box gbx1 = mfi.growntilebox(IntVect(NGROW-1,NGROW-1,0));
294  Box gbx2 = mfi.growntilebox(IntVect(NGROW,NGROW,0));
295  Box gbx11 = mfi.growntilebox(IntVect(NGROW-1,NGROW-1,NGROW-1));
296  Box gbx21 = mfi.growntilebox(IntVect(NGROW,NGROW,NGROW-1));
297 
298  Box tbxp1 = bx;
299  Box tbxp11 = bx;
300  Box tbxp2 = bx;
301  tbxp1.grow(IntVect(NGROW-1,NGROW-1,0));
302  tbxp2.grow(IntVect(NGROW,NGROW,0));
303  tbxp11.grow(IntVect(NGROW-1,NGROW-1,NGROW-1));
304 
305  Box ubx = surroundingNodes(bx,0);
306  Box vbx = surroundingNodes(bx,1);
307  Box ubx2 = surroundingNodes(ubx,0);
308  Box vbx2 = surroundingNodes(vbx,1);
309  if (verbose > 0) {
310  amrex::Print() << " BX " << bx << std::endl;
311  amrex::Print() << "UBX " << ubx << std::endl;
312  amrex::Print() << "VBX " << vbx << std::endl;
313  }
314 
315  FArrayBox fab_FC(gbx2,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena());
316  FArrayBox fab_BC(gbx2,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena());
317  FArrayBox fab_CF(gbx21,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena());
318  FArrayBox fab_oHz(gbx11,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena());
319  FArrayBox fab_pn(tbxp2,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena());
320  FArrayBox fab_pm(tbxp2,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena());
321  FArrayBox fab_fomn(tbxp2,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena());
322  FArrayBox fab_Akt(tbxp2,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena());
323  FArrayBox fab_W(tbxp2,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena());
324 
325  FArrayBox fab_on_u(tbxp2,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena());
326  FArrayBox fab_om_v(tbxp2,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena());
327  auto on_u=fab_on_u.array();
328  auto om_v=fab_om_v.array();
329 
330  auto FC = fab_FC.array();
331  auto BC = fab_BC.array();
332  auto CF = fab_CF.array();
333  auto oHz= fab_oHz.array();
334  auto pn=fab_pn.array();
335  auto pm=fab_pm.array();
336  auto fomn=fab_fomn.array();
337  auto Akt= fab_Akt.array();
338  auto W= fab_W.array();
339  //From ini_fields and .in file
340  //fab_Akt.setVal(1e-6);
341  //From ana_grid.h and metrics.F
342  //
343  if (verbose >= 2) {
344  amrex::PrintToFile("u").SetPrecision(18)<<FArrayBox(u)<<std::endl;
345  amrex::PrintToFile("v").SetPrecision(18)<<FArrayBox(v)<<std::endl;
346  amrex::PrintToFile("temp").SetPrecision(18)<<FArrayBox(temp)<<std::endl;
347  amrex::PrintToFile("tempstore").SetPrecision(18)<<FArrayBox(tempstore)<<std::endl;
348  amrex::PrintToFile("salt").SetPrecision(18)<<FArrayBox(salt)<<std::endl;
349  amrex::PrintToFile("saltstore").SetPrecision(18)<<FArrayBox(saltstore)<<std::endl;
350  }
351 
352  // Update to u and v
353  //
354  amrex::ParallelFor(tbxp2,
355  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
356  {
357  const auto prob_lo = geomdata.ProbLo();
358  const auto dx = geomdata.CellSize();
359 
360  pm(i,j,0)=dxi[0];
361  pn(i,j,0)=dxi[1];
362 
363  //defined UPWELLING
364  Real f0=-8.26e-5;
365  Real beta=0.0;
366  Real Esize=1000*(Mm);
367  Real y = prob_lo[1] + (j + 0.5) * dx[1];
368  Real f=fomn(i,j,0)=f0+beta*(y-.5*Esize);
369  fomn(i,j,0)=f*(1.0/(pm(i,j,0)*pn(i,j,0)));
370  Akt(i,j,k)=1e-6;
371  });
372  amrex::ParallelFor(tbxp2,
373  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
374  {
375  om_v(i,j,0)=1.0/dxi[0];
376  on_u(i,j,0)=1.0/dxi[1];
377  });
378 
379  Real cff;
380  if (iic==ntfirst) {
381  cff=0.25*dt_lev;
382  } else if (iic==ntfirst+1) {
383  cff=0.25*dt_lev*3.0/2.0;
384  } else {
385  cff=0.25*dt_lev*23.0/12.0;
386  }
387 
388  bool test_functionality=true;
389  if(test_functionality) {
390  //
391  //------------------------------------------------------------------------
392  // Vertically integrate horizontal mass flux divergence.
393  //------------------------------------------------------------------------
394  //
395  //Should really use gbx3uneven
396  amrex::ParallelFor(Box(W),
397  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
398  {
399  // Starting with zero vertical velocity at the bottom, integrate
400  // from the bottom (k=0) to the free-surface (k=N). The w(:,:,N(ng))
401  // contains the vertical velocity at the free-surface, d(zeta)/d(t).
402  // Notice that barotropic mass flux divergence is not used directly.
403  //
404  W(i,j,k)=0.0;
405  });
406 
407  amrex::ParallelFor(gbx1,
408  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
409  {
410  // Starting with zero vertical velocity at the bottom, integrate
411  // from the bottom (k=0) to the free-surface (k=N). The w(:,:,N(ng))
412  // contains the vertical velocity at the free-surface, d(zeta)/d(t).
413  // Notice that barotropic mass flux divergence is not used directly.
414  //
415  if(k==0) {
416  W(i,j,k)=0.0;
417  } else {
418  W(i,j,k) = - (Huon(i+1,j,k)-Huon(i,j,k));
419  }
420  });
421 
422  amrex::ParallelFor(gbx1,
423  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
424  {
425  // Starting with zero vertical velocity at the bottom, integrate
426  // from the bottom (k=0) to the free-surface (k=N). The w(:,:,N(ng))
427  // contains the vertical velocity at the free-surface, d(zeta)/d(t).
428  // Notice that barotropic mass flux divergence is not used directly.
429  //
430  if(k==0) {
431  W(i,j,k)=0.0;
432  } else {
433  W(i,j,k) = W(i,j,k)- (Hvom(i,j+1,k)-Hvom(i,j,k));
434  }
435  });
436 
437  amrex::ParallelFor(Box(W),
438  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
439  {
440  // Starting with zero vertical velocity at the bottom, integrate
441  // from the bottom (k=0) to the free-surface (k=N). The w(:,:,N(ng))
442  // contains the vertical velocity at the free-surface, d(zeta)/d(t).
443  // Notice that barotropic mass flux divergence is not used directly.
444  //
445  if(k==0) {
446  W(i,j,k)=W(i,j,k);
447  } else {
448  W(i,j,k) = W(i,j,k) + W(i,j,k-1);
449  }
450  });
451 
452  //
453  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
454  // rhs_3d
455  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
456  //
457  if (verbose >= 2) {
458  PrintToFile("tempold_beforerhs").SetPrecision(18)<<FArrayBox(tempold)<<std::endl;
459  PrintToFile("temp_beforerhs").SetPrecision(18)<<FArrayBox(temp)<<std::endl;
460  PrintToFile("saltstore_beforerhs").SetPrecision(18)<<FArrayBox(saltstore)<<std::endl;
461  PrintToFile("salt_beforerhs").SetPrecision(18)<<FArrayBox(salt)<<std::endl;
462  }
463  rhs_t_3d(bx, gbx, tempold, temp, tempstore, Huon, Hvom, Hz, oHz, pn, pm, W, FC, nrhs, nnew, N,dt_lev);
464  rhs_t_3d(bx, gbx, saltold, salt, saltstore, Huon, Hvom, Hz, oHz, pn, pm, W, FC, nrhs, nnew, N,dt_lev);
465  if (verbose >= 2) {
466  PrintToFile("u_afterrhst").SetPrecision(18) << FArrayBox(u) << std::endl;
467  PrintToFile("v_afterrhst").SetPrecision(18) << FArrayBox(v) << std::endl;
468  PrintToFile("temp_afterrhst").SetPrecision(18) << FArrayBox(temp) << std::endl;
469  PrintToFile("salt_afterrhst").SetPrecision(18) << FArrayBox(salt) << std::endl;
470  PrintToFile("tempold_afterrhst").SetPrecision(18) << FArrayBox(tempold) << std::endl;
471  PrintToFile("saltold_afterrhst").SetPrecision(18) << FArrayBox(saltold) << std::endl;
472  PrintToFile("tempstore_afterrhst").SetPrecision(18) << FArrayBox(tempstore) << std::endl;
473  PrintToFile("saltstore_afterrhst").SetPrecision(18) << FArrayBox(saltstore) << std::endl;
474  }
475  }
476  }
477  mf_temp.FillBoundary(geom[lev].periodicity());
478  mf_salt.FillBoundary(geom[lev].periodicity());
479 
480  for ( MFIter mfi(mf_u, TilingIfNotGPU()); mfi.isValid(); ++mfi )
481  {
482  Array4<Real> const& u = mf_u.array(mfi);
483  Array4<Real> const& v = mf_v.array(mfi);
484 
485  Array4<Real> const& tempold = (mf_tempold).array(mfi);
486  Array4<Real> const& saltold = (mf_saltold).array(mfi);
487 
488  Array4<Real> const& temp = (mf_temp).array(mfi);
489  Array4<Real> const& salt = (mf_salt).array(mfi);
490 
491  Array4<Real> const& tempstore = mf_tempstore->array(mfi);
492  Array4<Real> const& saltstore = mf_saltstore->array(mfi);
493 
494  Array4<Real> const& ru = mf_ru->array(mfi);
495  Array4<Real> const& rv = mf_rv->array(mfi);
496 
497  Array4<Real> const& AK = mf_AK.array(mfi);
498  Array4<Real> const& DC = mf_DC.array(mfi);
499 
500  Array4<Real> const& Hzk = mf_Hzk.array(mfi);
501  Array4<Real> const& Akv = mf_Akv->array(mfi);
502  Array4<Real> const& Hz = mf_Hz->array(mfi);
503 
504  Array4<Real> const& DU_avg1 = mf_DU_avg1->array(mfi);
505  Array4<Real> const& DV_avg1 = mf_DV_avg1->array(mfi);
506 
507  Array4<Real> const& DU_avg2 = mf_DU_avg2->array(mfi);
508  Array4<Real> const& DV_avg2 = mf_DV_avg2->array(mfi);
509 
510  Array4<Real> const& Huon = mf_Huon->array(mfi);
511  Array4<Real> const& Hvom = mf_Hvom->array(mfi);
512 
513  Box bx = mfi.tilebox();
514  Box gbx = mfi.growntilebox();
515  Box gbx1 = mfi.growntilebox(IntVect(NGROW-1,NGROW-1,0));
516  Box gbx2 = mfi.growntilebox(IntVect(NGROW,NGROW,0));
517  Box gbx11 = mfi.growntilebox(IntVect(NGROW-1,NGROW-1,NGROW-1));
518  Box gbx21 = mfi.growntilebox(IntVect(NGROW,NGROW,NGROW-1));
519  //copy the tilebox
520  Box tbxp1 = bx;
521  Box tbxp11 = bx;
522  Box tbxp2 = bx;
523  Box tbxp21 = bx;
524  //make only gbx be grown to match multifabs
525  tbxp21.grow(IntVect(NGROW,NGROW,NGROW-1));
526  tbxp2.grow(IntVect(NGROW,NGROW,0));
527  tbxp1.grow(IntVect(NGROW-1,NGROW-1,0));
528  tbxp11.grow(IntVect(NGROW-1,NGROW-1,NGROW-1));
529 
530  Box ubx = surroundingNodes(bx,0);
531  Box vbx = surroundingNodes(bx,1);
532  Box ubx2 = surroundingNodes(ubx,0);
533  Box vbx2 = surroundingNodes(vbx,1);
534  if (verbose > 0) {
535  amrex::Print() << " BX " << bx << std::endl;
536  amrex::Print() << "UBX " << ubx << std::endl;
537  amrex::Print() << "VBX " << vbx << std::endl;
538  }
539 
540  FArrayBox fab_FC(tbxp2,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena());
541  FArrayBox fab_BC(tbxp2,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena());
542  FArrayBox fab_CF(tbxp21,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena());
543  FArrayBox fab_oHz(tbxp11,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena());
544  FArrayBox fab_pn(tbxp2,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena());
545  FArrayBox fab_pm(tbxp2,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena());
546  FArrayBox fab_fomn(tbxp2,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena());
547  FArrayBox fab_Akt(tbxp2,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena());
548  FArrayBox fab_W(tbxp2,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena());
549 
550  FArrayBox fab_on_u(tbxp2,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena());
551  FArrayBox fab_om_v(tbxp2,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena());
552  auto on_u=fab_on_u.array();
553  auto om_v=fab_om_v.array();
554 
555  auto FC = fab_FC.array();
556  auto BC = fab_BC.array();
557  auto CF = fab_CF.array();
558  auto oHz= fab_oHz.array();
559  auto pn=fab_pn.array();
560  auto pm=fab_pm.array();
561  auto fomn=fab_fomn.array();
562  auto Akt= fab_Akt.array();
563  auto W= fab_W.array();
564  //From ini_fields and .in file
565  //fab_Akt.setVal(1e-6);
566  //From ana_grid.h and metrics.F
567 
568  //
569  // Update to u and v
570  //
571  amrex::ParallelFor(tbxp2,
572  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
573  {
574  const auto prob_lo = geomdata.ProbLo();
575  const auto dx = geomdata.CellSize();
576 
577  pm(i,j,0)=dxi[0];
578  pn(i,j,0)=dxi[1];
579 
580  //defined UPWELLING
581  Real f0=-8.26e-5;
582  Real beta=0.0;
583  Real Esize=1000*(Mm);
584  Real y = prob_lo[1] + (j + 0.5) * dx[1];
585  Real f=fomn(i,j,0)=f0+beta*(y-.5*Esize);
586  fomn(i,j,0)=f*(1.0/(pm(i,j,0)*pn(i,j,0)));
587  Akt(i,j,k)=1e-6;
588  });
589  amrex::ParallelFor(tbxp2,
590  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
591  {
592  om_v(i,j,0)=1.0/dxi[0];
593  on_u(i,j,0)=1.0/dxi[1];
594  });
595 
596  if (verbose >= 2) {
597  PrintToFile("temp_beforevvisc").SetPrecision(18) << FArrayBox(temp) << std::endl;
598  PrintToFile("salt_beforevvisc").SetPrecision(18) << FArrayBox(salt) << std::endl;
599  }
600  if(solverChoice.test_vertical) {
601  vert_visc_3d(gbx1,bx,0,0,temp,Hz,Hzk,oHz,AK,Akt,BC,DC,FC,CF,nnew,N,dt_lev);
602  vert_visc_3d(gbx1,bx,0,0,salt,Hz,Hzk,oHz,AK,Akt,BC,DC,FC,CF,nnew,N,dt_lev);
603  }
604  if (verbose >= 2) {
605  PrintToFile("temp_aftervvisc").SetPrecision(18) << FArrayBox(temp) << std::endl;
606  PrintToFile("salt_aftervvisc").SetPrecision(18) << FArrayBox(salt) << std::endl;
607  PrintToFile("tempstore_aftervvisc").SetPrecision(18) << FArrayBox(tempstore) << std::endl;
608  PrintToFile("saltstore_aftervvisc").SetPrecision(18) << FArrayBox(saltstore) << std::endl;
609  amrex::PrintToFile("u_aftervvisc").SetPrecision(18)<<FArrayBox(u)<<std::endl;
610  amrex::PrintToFile("v_aftervvisc").SetPrecision(18)<<FArrayBox(v)<<std::endl;
611  }
612  } // MFiter
613 }
ROMSX::update_massflux_3d

void vert_mean_3d(const amrex::Box &bx, const int ioff, const int joff, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > phi, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > Hz, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > Hzk, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > oHz, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > Dphi_avg1, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > Akv, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > BC, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > DC, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > FC, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > CF, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > dxlen, const int nnew, const int N, const amrex::Real dt_lev)

ROMSX::rhs_t_3d

SolverChoice::test_vertical

◆ AverageDown()

void ROMSX::AverageDown ( )
private

set covered coarse cells to be the average of overlying fine cells

931 {
932  for (int lev = finest_level-1; lev >= 0; --lev)

934  AverageDownTo(lev);
935  }
936 }
ROMSX::AverageDownTo
void AverageDownTo(int crse_lev)
Definition: ROMSX.cpp:940

◆ AverageDownTo()

void ROMSX::AverageDownTo ( int  crse_lev)
private

more flexible version of AverageDown() that lets you average down across multiple levels

941 {
942  for (int var_idx = 0; var_idx < Vars::NumTypes; ++var_idx) {
943  const BoxArray& ba(vars_new[crse_lev][var_idx].boxArray());
944  if (ba[0].type() == IntVect::TheZeroVector())
945  amrex::average_down(vars_new[crse_lev+1][var_idx], vars_new[crse_lev][var_idx],
946  0, vars_new[crse_lev][var_idx].nComp(), refRatio(crse_lev));
947  else // We assume the arrays are face-centered if not cell-centered
948  amrex::average_down_faces(vars_new[crse_lev+1][var_idx], vars_new[crse_lev][var_idx],
949  refRatio(crse_lev),geom[crse_lev]);
950  }
951 }

◆ build_fine_mask()

amrex::MultiFab & ROMSX::build_fine_mask ( int  lev)

Make mask to zero out covered cells

101 {
102  // Mask for zeroing covered cells
103  AMREX_ASSERT(level > 0);
104 
105  const amrex::BoxArray& cba = grids[level-1];
106  const amrex::DistributionMapping& cdm = dmap[level-1];
107 
108  // TODO -- we should make a vector of these a member of ROMSX class
109  fine_mask.define(cba, cdm, 1, 0, amrex::MFInfo());
110  fine_mask.setVal(1.0);
111 
112  amrex::BoxArray fba = grids[level];
113  amrex::iMultiFab ifine_mask = makeFineMask(cba, cdm, fba, ref_ratio[level-1], 1, 0);
114 
115 #ifdef _OPENMP
116 #pragma omp parallel if (amrex::Gpu::notInLaunchRegion())
117 #endif
118  for (amrex::MFIter mfi(fine_mask, amrex::TilingIfNotGPU()); mfi.isValid(); ++mfi)
119  {
120  auto& fab = fine_mask[mfi];
121  auto& ifab = ifine_mask[mfi];
122  const auto arr = fab.array();
123  const auto iarr = ifab.array();
124  amrex::ParallelFor(
125  fab.box(), [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE(int i, int j, int k) noexcept {
126 #ifdef _OPENMP
127 #pragma omp atomic write
128 #endif
129  arr(i, j, k) = iarr(i, j, k);
130  });
131  }
132 
133  return fine_mask;
134 }

◆ ComputeDt()

void ROMSX::ComputeDt ( )
private

a wrapper for estTimeStep()

9 {
10  Vector<Real> dt_tmp(finest_level+1);
11 
12  for (int lev = 0; lev <= finest_level; ++lev)
13  {
14  dt_tmp[lev] = estTimeStep(lev);
15  }
16 
17  ParallelDescriptor::ReduceRealMin(&dt_tmp[0], dt_tmp.size());
18 
19  Real dt_0 = dt_tmp[0];
20  int n_factor = 1;
21  for (int lev = 0; lev <= finest_level; ++lev) {
22  dt_tmp[lev] = amrex::min(dt_tmp[lev], change_max*dt[lev]);
23  n_factor *= nsubsteps[lev];
24  dt_0 = amrex::min(dt_0, n_factor*dt_tmp[lev]);
25  }
26 
27  // Limit dt's by the value of stop_time.
28  const Real eps = 1.e-3*dt_0;
29  if (t_new[0] + dt_0 > stop_time - eps) {
30  dt_0 = stop_time - t_new[0];
31  }
32 
33  dt[0] = dt_0;
34  for (int lev = 1; lev <= finest_level; ++lev) {
35  dt[lev] = dt[lev-1] / nsubsteps[lev];
36  }
37 }
ROMSX::stop_time
amrex::Real stop_time
Definition: ROMSX.H:884
ROMSX::estTimeStep
amrex::Real estTimeStep(int lev) const
Definition: ROMSX_ComputeTimestep.cpp:40

◆ ComputeGhostCells()

AMREX_FORCE_INLINE int ROMSX::ComputeGhostCells ( const int &  spatial_order)
inlineprivate
1000  {
1001  int nGhostCells;
1002 
1003  switch (spatial_order) {
1004  case 2:
1005  nGhostCells = 2; // We need this many to compute the eddy viscosity in the ghost cells
1006  break;
1007  case 3:
1008  nGhostCells = 2;
1009  break;
1010  case 4:
1011  nGhostCells = 2;
1012  break;
1013  case 5:
1014  nGhostCells = 3;
1015  break;
1016  case 6:
1017  nGhostCells = 3;
1018  break;
1019  default:
1020  amrex::Error("Must specify spatial order to be 2,3,4,5 or 6");
1021  }
1022 
1023  return nGhostCells;
1024  }

◆ coriolis()

void ROMSX::coriolis ( const amrex::Box &  bx,
const amrex::Box &  gbx,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  uold,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  vold,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  ru,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  rv,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  Hz,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  fomn,
int  nrhs,
int  nr 
)
16 {
17  //
18  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
19  // Add in Coriolis terms.
20  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
21  //
22 
23  //Box ubx = surroundingNodes(bx,0);
24  //Box vbx = surroundingNodes(bx,1);
25  Box ubxShift = bx;
26  ((((ubxShift.growLo(0,NGROW-1)).growLo(1,NGROW)).growHi(0,NGROW)).growHi(1,NGROW-1));
27  Box vbxShift = bx;
28  ((((vbxShift.growLo(0,NGROW)).growLo(1,NGROW-1)).growHi(0,NGROW-1)).growHi(1,NGROW));
29 
30  BoxArray ba_ubxShift = intersect(BoxArray(ubxShift), gbx);
31  AMREX_ASSERT((ba_ubxShift.size() == 1));
32  ubxShift = ba_ubxShift[0];
33 
34  BoxArray ba_vbxShift = intersect(BoxArray(vbxShift), gbx);
35  AMREX_ASSERT((ba_vbxShift.size() == 1));
36  vbxShift = ba_vbxShift[0];
37 
38  amrex::ParallelFor(ubxShift,
39  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
40  {
41  Real UFx_i = 0.5 * Hz(i ,j,k) * fomn(i ,j,0) * (vold(i ,j,k,nrhs)+vold(i ,j+1,k,nrhs));
42  Real UFx_im1 = 0.5 * Hz(i-1,j,k) * fomn(i-1,j,0) * (vold(i-1,j,k,nrhs)+vold(i-1,j+1,k,nrhs));
43  ru(i,j,k,nr) += 0.5*(UFx_i + UFx_im1);
44  });
45 
46  amrex::ParallelFor(vbxShift,
47  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
48  {
49  Real VFe_j = 0.5 * Hz(i,j ,k) * fomn(i,j ,0) * (uold(i,j ,k,nrhs)+uold(i+1,j ,k,nrhs));
50  Real VFe_jm1 = 0.5 * Hz(i,j-1,k) * fomn(i,j-1,0) * (uold(i,j-1,k,nrhs)+uold(i+1,j-1,k,nrhs));
51  rv(i,j,k,nr) -= 0.5*(VFe_j + VFe_jm1);
52  });
53 }
