◆ estTimeStep()

Real ROMSX::estTimeStep ( int  lev) const

compute dt from CFL considerations

41 {
42  BL_PROFILE("ROMSX::estTimeStep()");
43 
44  amrex::Real estdt_lowM = 1.e20;
45 
46  auto const dxinv = geom[level].InvCellSizeArray();
47 
48  MultiFab ccvel(grids[level],dmap[level],3,0);
49 
50  average_face_to_cellcenter(ccvel,0,
51  Array<const MultiFab*,3>{&vars_new[level][Vars::xvel],
52  &vars_new[level][Vars::yvel],
53  &vars_new[level][Vars::zvel]});
54 
55  Real estdt_lowM_inv = amrex::ReduceMax(ccvel, 0,
56  [=] AMREX_GPU_HOST_DEVICE (Box const& b,
57  Array4<Real const> const& u) -> Real
58  {
59  Real new_lm_dt = -1.e100;
60  amrex::Loop(b, [=,&new_lm_dt] (int i, int j, int k) noexcept
61  {
62  new_lm_dt = amrex::max(((amrex::Math::abs(u(i,j,k,0)))*dxinv[0]),
63  ((amrex::Math::abs(u(i,j,k,1)))*dxinv[1]),
64  ((amrex::Math::abs(u(i,j,k,2)))*dxinv[2]), new_lm_dt);
65  });
66  return new_lm_dt;
67  });
68 
69  amrex::ParallelDescriptor::ReduceRealMax(estdt_lowM_inv);
70  if (estdt_lowM_inv > 0.0_rt)
71  estdt_lowM = cfl / estdt_lowM_inv;;
72 
73  if (verbose) {
74  if (fixed_dt <= 0.0) {
75  amrex::Print() << "Using cfl = " << cfl << std::endl;
76  if (estdt_lowM_inv > 0.0_rt) {
77  amrex::Print() << "Slow dt at level " << level << ": " << estdt_lowM << std::endl;
78  } else {
79  amrex::Print() << "Slow dt at level " << level << ": undefined " << std::endl;
80  }
81  }
82  if (fixed_dt > 0.0) {
83  amrex::Print() << "Based on cfl of 1.0 " << std::endl;
84  if (estdt_lowM_inv > 0.0_rt) {
85  amrex::Print() << "Slow dt at level " << level << " would be: " << estdt_lowM/cfl << std::endl;
86  } else {
87  amrex::Print() << "Slow dt at level " << level << " would be undefined " << std::endl;
88  }
89  amrex::Print() << "Fixed dt at level " << level << " is: " << fixed_dt << std::endl;
90  }
91  }
92 
93  if (fixed_dt > 0.0) {
94  return fixed_dt;
95  } else {
96  return estdt_lowM;
97  }
98 }
ROMSX::cfl
static amrex::Real cfl
Definition: ROMSX.H:890
ROMSX::fixed_dt
static amrex::Real fixed_dt
Definition: ROMSX.H:895

◆ Evolve()

void ROMSX::Evolve ( )

Advance solution to final time

141 {
142  Real cur_time = t_new[0];
143 
144  // Take one coarse timestep by calling timeStep -- which recursively calls timeStep
145  // for finer levels (with or without subcycling)
146  for (int step = istep[0]; step < max_step && cur_time < stop_time; ++step)
147  {
148  amrex::Print() << "\nCoarse STEP " << step+1 << " starts ..." << std::endl;
149 
150  ComputeDt();
151 
152  int lev = 0;
153  int iteration = 1;
154  timeStep(lev, cur_time, iteration);
155 
156  cur_time += dt[0];
157 
158  amrex::Print() << "Coarse STEP " << step+1 << " ends." << " TIME = " << cur_time
159  << " DT = " << dt[0] << std::endl;
160 
161  if (plot_int_1 > 0 && (step+1) % plot_int_1 == 0) {
162  last_plot_file_step_1 = step+1;
163  WritePlotFile(1,plot_var_names_1);
164  }
165  if (plot_int_2 > 0 && (step+1) % plot_int_2 == 0) {
166  last_plot_file_step_2 = step+1;
167  WritePlotFile(2,plot_var_names_2);
168  }
169 
170  if (check_int > 0 && (step+1) % check_int == 0) {
171  last_check_file_step = step+1;
172 #ifdef ROMSX_USE_NETCDF
173  if (check_type == "netcdf") {
174  WriteNCCheckpointFile();
175  }
176 #endif
177  if (check_type == "native") {
178  WriteCheckpointFile();
179  }
180  }
181 
182  post_timestep(step, cur_time, dt[0]);
183 
184 #ifdef AMREX_MEM_PROFILING
185  {
186  std::ostringstream ss;
187  ss << "[STEP " << step+1 << "]";
188  MemProfiler::report(ss.str());
189  }
190 #endif
191 
192  if (cur_time >= stop_time - 1.e-6*dt[0]) break;
193  }
194 
195  if (plot_int_1 > 0 && istep[0] > last_plot_file_step_1) {
196  WritePlotFile(1,plot_var_names_1);
197  }
198  if (plot_int_2 > 0 && istep[0] > last_plot_file_step_2) {
199  WritePlotFile(2,plot_var_names_2);
200  }
201 
202  if (check_int > 0 && istep[0] > last_check_file_step) {
203 #ifdef ROMSX_USE_NETCDF
204  if (check_type == "netcdf") {
205  WriteNCCheckpointFile();
206  }
207 #endif
208  if (check_type == "native") {
209  WriteCheckpointFile();
210  }
211  }
212 
213 }

373 {
374  BL_PROFILE_VAR("FillCoarsePatch()",FillCoarsePatch);
375  AMREX_ASSERT(lev > 0);
376 
377  int bccomp = 0;
378  amrex::Interpolater* mapper = nullptr;

381  {

◆ FillIntermediatePatch()

void ROMSX::FillIntermediatePatch ( int  lev,
amrex::Real  time,
amrex::Vector< std::reference_wrapper< amrex::MultiFab > >  mfs,
int  ng_cons,
int  ng_vel,
bool  cons_only,
int  scomp_cons,
int  ncomp_cons 
)
private

compute new multifabs by copying in data from valid region and filling ghost cells works for single level and 2-level cases (fill fine grid ghost by interpolating from coarse) unlike FillPatch, FillIntermediatePatch will use the supplied multifabs instead of fine level data. This is to support filling boundary cells at an intermediate time between old/new times on the fine level when valid data at a specific time is already available (such as at each RK stage when integrating between initial and final times at a given level). NOTE: mfs should always contain {cons, xvel, yvel, zvel} multifab data. if which_var is supplied, then only fill the specified variable in the vector of mfs

250 {
251  BL_PROFILE_VAR("FillIntermediatePatch()",FillIntermediatePatch);
252  int bccomp;
253  amrex::Interpolater* mapper;
254  TimeInterpolatedData level_data;
255 
256  // We should always pass cons, xvel, yvel, and zvel (in that order) in the mfs vector
257  AMREX_ALWAYS_ASSERT(mfs.size() == Vars::NumTypes);
258 
259  for (int imf = 0; imf < Vars::NumTypes; ++imf) {
260  level_data.add_var(&mfs[imf].get(), level_data.non_owning);
261  }
262  level_data.set_time(time);
263 
264  for (int var_idx = 0; var_idx < Vars::NumTypes; ++var_idx)
265  {
266  if (cons_only && var_idx != Vars::cons) continue;
267 
268  MultiFab& mf = mfs[var_idx].get();
269 
270  IntVect ngvect;
271  int icomp, ncomp;
272  if (var_idx == Vars::cons)
273  {
274  bccomp = 0;
275  mapper = &cell_cons_interp;
276  ngvect = IntVect(ng_cons,ng_cons,ng_cons);
277  icomp = scomp_cons;
278  ncomp = ncomp_cons;
279  }
280  else if (var_idx == Vars::xvel)
281  {
282  bccomp = NVAR;
283  mapper = &face_linear_interp;
284  ngvect = IntVect(ng_vel,ng_vel,ng_vel);
285  icomp = 0;
286  ncomp = 1;
287  }
288  else if (var_idx == Vars::yvel)
289  {
290  bccomp = NVAR+1;
291  mapper = &face_linear_interp;
292  ngvect = IntVect(ng_vel,ng_vel,ng_vel);
293  icomp = 0;
294  ncomp = 1;
295  }
296  else if (var_idx == Vars::zvel)
297  {
298  bccomp = NVAR+2;
299  mapper = &face_linear_interp;
300  ngvect = IntVect(ng_vel,ng_vel,0);
301  icomp = 0;
302  ncomp = 1;
303  }
304 
305  if (lev == 0)
306  {
307  // on lev, use the mf data and time passed to FillIntermediatePatch().
308  Vector<MultiFab*> smf { &mf };
309  Vector<Real> stime { time };
310 
311  ROMSXPhysBCFunct physbc(lev,geom[lev],
312  domain_bcs_type,domain_bcs_type_d,
313  var_idx,level_data,
314  m_bc_extdir_vals,z_phys_nd[lev],detJ_cc[lev]
315 #ifdef ROMSX_USE_NETCDF
316  ,init_type,bdy_data_xlo,bdy_data_xhi,
317  bdy_data_ylo,bdy_data_yhi,bdy_time_interval
318 #endif
319  );
320 
321  amrex::FillPatchSingleLevel(mf, ngvect, time, smf, stime, 0, icomp, ncomp,
322  geom[lev], physbc, bccomp);
323  }
324  else
325  {
326  MultiFab mf_tmp(mf.boxArray(), mf.DistributionMap(), ncomp, mf.nGrowVect());
327 
328  TimeInterpolatedData cdata = GetDataAtTime(lev-1, time);
329  Vector<MultiFab*> cmf = {&cdata.get_var(var_idx)};
330  Vector<MultiFab*> fmf = {&mf};
331  Vector<Real> ctime = {cdata.get_time()};
332  Vector<Real> ftime = {level_data.get_time()};
333 
334  ROMSXPhysBCFunct cphysbc(lev-1,geom[lev-1],
335  domain_bcs_type,domain_bcs_type_d,
336  var_idx,cdata,
337  m_bc_extdir_vals,z_phys_nd[lev-1],detJ_cc[lev-1]
338 #ifdef ROMSX_USE_NETCDF
339  ,init_type,bdy_data_xlo,bdy_data_xhi,
340  bdy_data_ylo,bdy_data_yhi,bdy_time_interval
341 #endif
342  );
343  ROMSXPhysBCFunct fphysbc(lev,geom[lev],
344  domain_bcs_type,domain_bcs_type_d,
345  var_idx,level_data,
346  m_bc_extdir_vals,z_phys_nd[lev],detJ_cc[lev]
347 #ifdef ROMSX_USE_NETCDF
348  ,init_type,bdy_data_xlo,bdy_data_xhi,
349  bdy_data_ylo,bdy_data_yhi,bdy_time_interval
350 #endif
351  );
352 
353  amrex::FillPatchTwoLevels(mf_tmp, ngvect, time, cmf, ctime, fmf, ftime,
354  0, icomp, ncomp, geom[lev-1], geom[lev],
355  cphysbc, 0, fphysbc, 0, refRatio(lev-1),
356  mapper, domain_bcs_type, bccomp);
357 
358  // Replace mf with mf_tmp
359  if (ncomp == mf.nComp())
360  std::swap(mf_tmp, mf);
361  else
362  MultiFab::Copy(mf,mf_tmp,0,0,1,mf.nGrowVect());
363  }
364  }
365 }

◆ getCPUTime()

amrex::Real ROMSX::getCPUTime ( ) const
inlineprivate
1052  {
1053  int numCores = amrex::ParallelDescriptor::NProcs();
1054 #ifdef _OPENMP
1055  numCores = numCores * omp_get_max_threads();
1056 #endif
1057 
1058  amrex::Real T =
1059  numCores * (amrex::ParallelDescriptor::second() - startCPUTime) +
1060  previousCPUTimeUsed;
1061 
1062  return T;
1063  }

◆ GetDataAtTime()

TimeInterpolatedData ROMSX::GetDataAtTime ( int  lev,
amrex::Real  time 
)
private

utility to copy in data from old and/or new state into another multifab

96 {
97  BL_PROFILE_VAR("GetDataAtTime()",GetDataAtTime);
98  TimeInterpolatedData data;
99 
100  const Real teps = (t_new[lev] - t_old[lev]) * 1.e-3;
101 
102  if (time > t_new[lev] - teps && time < t_new[lev] + teps)
103  {
104  for (int i = 0; i < Vars::NumTypes; ++i) {
105  data.add_var(&vars_new[lev][i], data.non_owning);
106  }
107  data.set_time(t_new[lev]);
108  }
109  else if (time > t_old[lev] - teps && time < t_old[lev] + teps)
110  {
111  for (int i = 0; i < Vars::NumTypes; ++i) {
112  data.add_var(&vars_old[lev][i], data.non_owning);
113  }
114  data.set_time(t_old[lev]);
115  }
116  else if (time > t_old[lev] && time < t_new[lev])
117  {
118  // do first order interpolation in time between [t_old[lev], t_new[lev]]
119  // time interpolation includes the ghost cells
120  for (int i = 0; i < Vars::NumTypes; ++i) {
121  MultiFab* mf_tmp = new MultiFab(vars_new[lev][i].boxArray(),
122  vars_new[lev][i].DistributionMap(),
123  vars_new[lev][i].nComp(), vars_new[lev][i].nGrowVect());
124  mf_tmp->setVal(0.0_rt);
125 
126  const Real dt_fraction = (time - t_old[lev]) / (t_new[lev] - t_old[lev]);
127  MultiFab::Saxpy(*mf_tmp, 1.0_rt - dt_fraction, vars_old[lev][i], 0, 0, mf_tmp->nComp(), mf_tmp->nGrowVect());
128  MultiFab::Saxpy(*mf_tmp, dt_fraction, vars_new[lev][i], 0, 0, mf_tmp->nComp(), mf_tmp->nGrowVect());
129 
130  data.add_var(mf_tmp, data.owning);
131  }
132  data.set_time(time);
133  }
134  else
135  {
136  amrex::Error("Requested data at a time outside the interval [t_old, t_new]");
137  }
138 
139  // We need to make sure to fill these before we compute the viscosity
140  for (int i = 0; i < Vars::NumTypes; ++i) {
141  data.get_var(Vars::xvel).FillBoundary(geom[lev].periodicity());
142  data.get_var(Vars::yvel).FillBoundary(geom[lev].periodicity());
143  data.get_var(Vars::zvel).FillBoundary(geom[lev].periodicity());
144  data.get_var(Vars::cons).FillBoundary(geom[lev].periodicity());
145  }
146 
147  return data;
148 }
TimeInterpolatedData::owning
const int owning
Definition: TimeInterpolatedData.H:49
Here is the call graph for this function:

◆ init_bcs()

void ROMSX::init_bcs ( )
private
10 {
11  auto f = [this] (std::string const& bcid, Orientation ori)
12  {
13  // These are simply defaults for Dirichlet faces -- they should be over-written below
14  m_bc_extdir_vals[BCVars::Rho_bc_comp][ori] = 1.0;
15  m_bc_extdir_vals[BCVars::Temp_bc_comp][ori] = -1.0; // It is important to set this negative
16  // because the sign is tested on below
17  m_bc_extdir_vals[BCVars::RhoKE_bc_comp][ori] = 0.0;
18  m_bc_extdir_vals[BCVars::RhoQKE_bc_comp][ori] = 0.0;
19  m_bc_extdir_vals[BCVars::RhoScalar_bc_comp][ori] = 0.0;
20 
21  m_bc_extdir_vals[BCVars::xvel_bc][ori] = 0.0; // default
22  m_bc_extdir_vals[BCVars::yvel_bc][ori] = 0.0;
23  m_bc_extdir_vals[BCVars::zvel_bc][ori] = 0.0;
24 
25  ParmParse pp(bcid);
26  std::string bc_type_in = "null";
27  pp.query("type", bc_type_in);
28  //if (pp.query("type", bc_type_in))
29  // amrex::Print() << "INPUT BC TYPE " << bcid << " " << bc_type_in << std::endl;
30  std::string bc_type = amrex::toLower(bc_type_in);
31 
32  if (bc_type == "symmetry")
33  {
34  // amrex::Print() << bcid << " set to symmetry.\n";
35 
36  phys_bc_type[ori] = ROMSX_BC::symmetry;
37  domain_bc_type[ori] = "Symmetry";
38  }
39  else if (bc_type == "outflow")
40  {
41  // amrex::Print() << bcid << " set to outflow.\n";
42 
43  phys_bc_type[ori] = ROMSX_BC::outflow;
44  domain_bc_type[ori] = "Outflow";
45  }
46  else if (bc_type == "inflow")
47  {
48  // amrex::Print() << bcid << " set to inflow.\n";
49 
50  phys_bc_type[ori] = ROMSX_BC::inflow;
51  domain_bc_type[ori] = "Inflow";
52 
53  std::vector<Real> v;
54  pp.getarr("velocity", v, 0, AMREX_SPACEDIM);
55  m_bc_extdir_vals[BCVars::xvel_bc][ori] = v[0];
56  m_bc_extdir_vals[BCVars::yvel_bc][ori] = v[1];
57  m_bc_extdir_vals[BCVars::zvel_bc][ori] = v[2];
58 
59  Real rho_in;
60  pp.get("density", rho_in);
61  m_bc_extdir_vals[BCVars::Rho_bc_comp][ori] = rho_in;
62 
63  Real theta_in;
64  pp.get("theta", theta_in);
65  m_bc_extdir_vals[BCVars::Temp_bc_comp][ori] = rho_in*theta_in;
66 
67  Real scalar_in = 0.;
68  if (pp.query("scalar", scalar_in))
69  m_bc_extdir_vals[BCVars::RhoScalar_bc_comp][ori] = rho_in*scalar_in;
70 
71  Real KE_in = 0.;
72  if (pp.query("KE", KE_in))
73  m_bc_extdir_vals[BCVars::RhoKE_bc_comp][ori] = rho_in*KE_in;
74 
75  Real QKE_in = 0.;
76  if (pp.query("QKE", QKE_in))
77  m_bc_extdir_vals[BCVars::RhoQKE_bc_comp][ori] = rho_in*QKE_in;
78 
79  }
80  else if (bc_type == "noslipwall")
81  {
82  // amrex::Print() << bcid <<" set to no-slip wall.\n";
83 
84  phys_bc_type[ori] = ROMSX_BC::no_slip_wall;
85  domain_bc_type[ori] = "NoSlipWall";
86 
87  std::vector<Real> v;
88 
89  // The values of m_bc_extdir_vals default to 0.
90  // But if we find "velocity" in the inputs file, use those values instead.
91  if (pp.queryarr("velocity", v, 0, AMREX_SPACEDIM))
92  {
93  v[ori.coordDir()] = 0.0;
94  m_bc_extdir_vals[BCVars::xvel_bc][ori] = v[0];
95  m_bc_extdir_vals[BCVars::yvel_bc][ori] = v[1];
96  m_bc_extdir_vals[BCVars::zvel_bc][ori] = v[2];
97  }
98 
99  Real theta_in;
100  if (pp.query("theta", theta_in))
101  {
102  m_bc_extdir_vals[BCVars::Temp_bc_comp][ori] = theta_in*m_bc_extdir_vals[BCVars::Rho_bc_comp][ori];
103  }
104  }
105  else if (bc_type == "slipwall")
106  {
107  // amrex::Print() << bcid <<" set to slip wall.\n";
108 
109  phys_bc_type[ori] = ROMSX_BC::slip_wall;
110  domain_bc_type[ori] = "SlipWall";
111 
112  Real theta_in;
113  if (pp.query("theta", theta_in))
114  {
115  m_bc_extdir_vals[BCVars::Temp_bc_comp][ori] = theta_in*m_bc_extdir_vals[BCVars::Rho_bc_comp][ori];
116  }
117 
118  }
119  else
120  {
121  phys_bc_type[ori] = ROMSX_BC::undefined;
122  }
123 
124  if (geom[0].isPeriodic(ori.coordDir())) {
125  domain_bc_type[ori] = "Periodic";
126  if (phys_bc_type[ori] == ROMSX_BC::undefined)
127  {
128  phys_bc_type[ori] = ROMSX_BC::periodic;
129  } else {
130  amrex::Abort("Wrong BC type for periodic boundary");
131  }
132  }
133 
134  if (phys_bc_type[ori] == ROMSX_BC::undefined)
135  {
136  amrex::Print() << "BC Type specified for face " << bcid << " is " << bc_type_in << std::endl;
137  amrex::Abort("This BC type is unknown");
138  }
139  };
140 
141  f("xlo", Orientation(Direction::x,Orientation::low));
142  f("xhi", Orientation(Direction::x,Orientation::high));
143  f("ylo", Orientation(Direction::y,Orientation::low));
144  f("yhi", Orientation(Direction::y,Orientation::high));
145  f("zlo", Orientation(Direction::z,Orientation::low));
146  f("zhi", Orientation(Direction::z,Orientation::high));
147 
148  // *****************************************************************************
149  //
150  // Here we translate the physical boundary conditions -- one type per face --
151  // into logical boundary conditions for each velocity component
152  //
153  // *****************************************************************************
154  {
155  domain_bcs_type.resize(AMREX_SPACEDIM+NVAR);
156  domain_bcs_type_d.resize(AMREX_SPACEDIM+NVAR);
157 
158  for (OrientationIter oit; oit; ++oit) {
159  Orientation ori = oit();
160  int dir = ori.coordDir();
161  Orientation::Side side = ori.faceDir();
162  auto const bct = phys_bc_type[ori];
163  if ( bct == ROMSX_BC::symmetry )
164  {
165  if (side == Orientation::low) {
166  for (int i = 0; i < AMREX_SPACEDIM; i++)
167  domain_bcs_type[BCVars::xvel_bc+i].setLo(dir, ROMSXBCType::reflect_even);
168  domain_bcs_type[BCVars::xvel_bc+dir].setLo(dir, ROMSXBCType::reflect_odd);
169  } else {
170  for (int i = 0; i < AMREX_SPACEDIM; i++)
171  domain_bcs_type[BCVars::xvel_bc+i].setHi(dir, ROMSXBCType::reflect_even);
172  domain_bcs_type[BCVars::xvel_bc+dir].setHi(dir, ROMSXBCType::reflect_odd);
173  }
174  }
175  else if (bct == ROMSX_BC::outflow)
176  {
177  if (side == Orientation::low) {
178  for (int i = 0; i < AMREX_SPACEDIM; i++)
179  domain_bcs_type[BCVars::xvel_bc+i].setLo(dir, ROMSXBCType::foextrap);
180  } else {
181  for (int i = 0; i < AMREX_SPACEDIM; i++)
182  domain_bcs_type[BCVars::xvel_bc+i].setHi(dir, ROMSXBCType::foextrap);
183  }
184  }
185  else if (bct == ROMSX_BC::inflow)
186  {
187  if (side == Orientation::low) {
188  for (int i = 0; i < AMREX_SPACEDIM; i++) {
189  domain_bcs_type[BCVars::xvel_bc+i].setLo(dir, ROMSXBCType::ext_dir);
190  }
191  } else {
192  for (int i = 0; i < AMREX_SPACEDIM; i++) {
193  domain_bcs_type[BCVars::xvel_bc+i].setHi(dir, ROMSXBCType::ext_dir);
194  }
195  }
196  }
197  else if (bct == ROMSX_BC::no_slip_wall)
198  {
199  if (side == Orientation::low) {
200  for (int i = 0; i < AMREX_SPACEDIM; i++)
201  domain_bcs_type[BCVars::xvel_bc+i].setLo(dir, ROMSXBCType::ext_dir);
202  } else {
203  for (int i = 0; i < AMREX_SPACEDIM; i++)
204  domain_bcs_type[BCVars::xvel_bc+i].setHi(dir, ROMSXBCType::ext_dir);
205  }
206  }
207  else if (bct == ROMSX_BC::slip_wall)
208  {
209  if (side == Orientation::low) {
210  for (int i = 0; i < AMREX_SPACEDIM; i++)
211  domain_bcs_type[BCVars::xvel_bc+i].setLo(dir, ROMSXBCType::foextrap);
212  // Only normal direction has ext_dir
213  domain_bcs_type[BCVars::xvel_bc+dir].setLo(dir, ROMSXBCType::ext_dir);
214 
215  } else {
216  for (int i = 0; i < AMREX_SPACEDIM; i++)
217  domain_bcs_type[BCVars::xvel_bc+i].setHi(dir, ROMSXBCType::foextrap);
218  // Only normal direction has ext_dir
219  domain_bcs_type[BCVars::xvel_bc+dir].setHi(dir, ROMSXBCType::ext_dir);
220  }
221  }
222  else if (bct == ROMSX_BC::periodic)
223  {
224  if (side == Orientation::low) {
225  for (int i = 0; i < AMREX_SPACEDIM; i++)
226  domain_bcs_type[BCVars::xvel_bc+i].setLo(dir, ROMSXBCType::int_dir);
227  } else {
228  for (int i = 0; i < AMREX_SPACEDIM; i++)
229  domain_bcs_type[BCVars::xvel_bc+i].setHi(dir, ROMSXBCType::int_dir);
230  }
231  }
232  }
233  }
234 
235  // *****************************************************************************
236  //
237  // Here we translate the physical boundary conditions -- one type per face --
238  // into logical boundary conditions for each cell-centered variable
239  //
240  // *****************************************************************************
241  {
242  for (OrientationIter oit; oit; ++oit) {
243  Orientation ori = oit();
244  int dir = ori.coordDir();
245  Orientation::Side side = ori.faceDir();
246  auto const bct = phys_bc_type[ori];
247  if ( bct == ROMSX_BC::symmetry )
248  {
249  if (side == Orientation::low) {
250  for (int i = 0; i < NVAR; i++)
251  domain_bcs_type[BCVars::cons_bc+i].setLo(dir, ROMSXBCType::reflect_even);
252  } else {
253  for (int i = 0; i < NVAR; i++)
254  domain_bcs_type[BCVars::cons_bc+i].setHi(dir, ROMSXBCType::reflect_even);
255  }
256  }
257  else if ( bct == ROMSX_BC::outflow )
258  {
259  if (side == Orientation::low) {
260  for (int i = 0; i < NVAR; i++)
261  domain_bcs_type[BCVars::cons_bc+i].setLo(dir, ROMSXBCType::foextrap);
262  } else {
263  for (int i = 0; i < NVAR; i++)
264  domain_bcs_type[BCVars::cons_bc+i].setHi(dir, ROMSXBCType::foextrap);
265  }
266  }
267  else if ( bct == ROMSX_BC::no_slip_wall)
268  {
269  if (side == Orientation::low) {
270  for (int i = 0; i < NVAR; i++)
271  domain_bcs_type[BCVars::cons_bc+i].setLo(dir, ROMSXBCType::foextrap);
272  if (m_bc_extdir_vals[BCVars::Temp_bc_comp][ori] > 0.)
273  domain_bcs_type[BCVars::Temp_bc_comp].setLo(dir, ROMSXBCType::ext_dir);
274  } else {
275  for (int i = 0; i < NVAR; i++)
276  domain_bcs_type[BCVars::cons_bc+i].setHi(dir, ROMSXBCType::foextrap);
277  if (m_bc_extdir_vals[BCVars::Temp_bc_comp][ori] > 0.)
278  domain_bcs_type[BCVars::Temp_bc_comp].setHi(dir, ROMSXBCType::ext_dir);
279  }
280  }
281  else if (bct == ROMSX_BC::slip_wall)
282  {
283  if (side == Orientation::low) {
284  for (int i = 0; i < NVAR; i++)
285  domain_bcs_type[BCVars::cons_bc+i].setLo(dir, ROMSXBCType::foextrap);
286  if (m_bc_extdir_vals[BCVars::Temp_bc_comp][ori] > 0.)
287  domain_bcs_type[BCVars::Temp_bc_comp].setLo(dir, ROMSXBCType::ext_dir);
288  } else {
289  for (int i = 0; i < NVAR; i++)
290  domain_bcs_type[BCVars::cons_bc+i].setHi(dir, ROMSXBCType::foextrap);
291  if (m_bc_extdir_vals[BCVars::Temp_bc_comp][ori] > 0.)
292  domain_bcs_type[BCVars::Temp_bc_comp].setHi(dir, ROMSXBCType::ext_dir);
293  }
294  }
295  else if (bct == ROMSX_BC::inflow)
296  {
297  if (side == Orientation::low) {
298  for (int i = 0; i < NVAR; i++) {
299  domain_bcs_type[BCVars::cons_bc+i].setLo(dir, ROMSXBCType::ext_dir);
300  }
301  } else {
302  for (int i = 0; i < NVAR; i++) {
303  domain_bcs_type[BCVars::cons_bc+i].setHi(dir, ROMSXBCType::ext_dir);
304  }
305  }
306  }
307  else if (bct == ROMSX_BC::periodic)
308  {
309  if (side == Orientation::low) {
310  for (int i = 0; i < NVAR; i++)
311  domain_bcs_type[BCVars::cons_bc+i].setLo(dir, ROMSXBCType::int_dir);
312  } else {
313  for (int i = 0; i < NVAR; i++)
314  domain_bcs_type[BCVars::cons_bc+i].setHi(dir, ROMSXBCType::int_dir);
315  }
316  }
317  }
318  }
319 
320 #ifdef AMREX_USE_GPU
321  Gpu::htod_memcpy
322  (domain_bcs_type_d.data(), domain_bcs_type.data(),
323  sizeof(amrex::BCRec)*(NVAR+AMREX_SPACEDIM));
324 #else
325  std::memcpy
326  (domain_bcs_type_d.data(), domain_bcs_type.data(),
327  sizeof(amrex::BCRec)*(NVAR+AMREX_SPACEDIM));
328 #endif
329 }

ROMSXBCType::ext_dir

◆ init_custom()

void ROMSX::init_custom ( int  lev)
private
330 {
331  auto& lev_new = vars_new[lev];
332  MultiFab r_hse(base_state[lev], make_alias, 0, 1); // r_0 is first component
333  MultiFab p_hse(base_state[lev], make_alias, 1, 1); // p_0 is second component
334  std::unique_ptr<MultiFab>& mf_z_w = vec_z_w[lev];
335  std::unique_ptr<MultiFab>& mf_z_r = vec_z_r[lev];
336  std::unique_ptr<MultiFab>& mf_Hz = vec_Hz[lev];
337  std::unique_ptr<MultiFab>& mf_h = vec_hOfTheConfusingName[lev];
338  std::unique_ptr<MultiFab>& mf_Zt_avg1 = vec_Zt_avg1[lev];
339 
340 #ifdef _OPENMP
341 #pragma omp parallel if (amrex::Gpu::notInLaunchRegion())
342 #endif
343  for (MFIter mfi(lev_new[Vars::cons], TilingIfNotGPU()); mfi.isValid(); ++mfi)
344  {
345  const Box &bx = mfi.tilebox();
346  const auto &cons_arr = lev_new[Vars::cons].array(mfi);
347  const auto &xvel_arr = lev_new[Vars::xvel].array(mfi);
348  const auto &yvel_arr = lev_new[Vars::yvel].array(mfi);
349  const auto &zvel_arr = lev_new[Vars::zvel].array(mfi);
350 
351  Array4<Real const> z_nd_arr = (solverChoice.use_terrain) ? z_phys_nd[lev]->const_array(mfi) : Array4<Real const>{};
352  Array4<Real const> z_cc_arr = (solverChoice.use_terrain) ? z_phys_cc[lev]->const_array(mfi) : Array4<Real const>{};
353 
354  Array4<const Real> const& z_w_arr = (mf_z_w)->array(mfi);
355  Array4<const Real> const& z_r_arr = (mf_z_r)->array(mfi);
356  Array4<const Real> const& Hz_arr = (mf_Hz)->array(mfi);
357  Array4<const Real> const& h_arr = (mf_h)->array(mfi);
358  Array4<const Real> const& Zt_avg1_arr = (mf_Zt_avg1)->array(mfi);
359 
360  Array4<Real> r_hse_arr = r_hse.array(mfi);
361  Array4<Real> p_hse_arr = p_hse.array(mfi);
362 
363  init_custom_prob(bx, cons_arr, xvel_arr, yvel_arr, zvel_arr,
364  r_hse_arr, p_hse_arr, z_nd_arr, z_cc_arr,
365  z_w_arr, z_r_arr, Hz_arr, h_arr, Zt_avg1_arr, geom[lev].data());
366 
367  } //mfi
368 
369  set_2darrays(lev);
370 
371 }

◆ init_only()

void ROMSX::init_only ( int  lev,
amrex::Real  time 
)

Init (NOT restart or regrid)

665 {
666  t_new[lev] = time;
667  t_old[lev] = time - 1.e200;
668 
669  auto& lev_new = vars_new[lev];
670 
671  // Loop over grids at this level to initialize our grid data
672  lev_new[Vars::cons].setVal(0.0);
673  lev_new[Vars::xvel].setVal(0.0);
674  lev_new[Vars::yvel].setVal(0.0);
675  lev_new[Vars::zvel].setVal(0.0);
676 
677  if (init_type == "custom") {
678  init_custom(lev);
679 #ifdef ROMSX_USE_NETCDF
680  } else if (init_type == "ideal" || init_type == "real") {
681  init_from_wrfinput(lev);
682 #endif
683  }
684 
685  // Ensure that the face-based data are the same on both sides of a periodic domain.
686  // The data associated with the lower grid ID is considered the correct value.
687  lev_new[Vars::xvel].OverrideSync(geom[lev].periodicity());
688  lev_new[Vars::yvel].OverrideSync(geom[lev].periodicity());
689  lev_new[Vars::zvel].OverrideSync(geom[lev].periodicity());
690 }
ROMSX::init_custom
void init_custom(int lev)

◆ InitData()

void ROMSX::InitData ( )

Initialize multilevel data

243 {
244  // Initialize the start time for our CPU-time tracker
245  startCPUTime = amrex::ParallelDescriptor::second();
246 
247  // Map the words in the inputs file to BC types, then translate
248  // those types into what they mean for each variable
249  init_bcs();
250 
251  last_plot_file_step_1 = -1;
252  last_plot_file_step_2 = -1;
253  last_check_file_step = -1;
254 
255  if (restart_chkfile == "") {
256  // start simulation from the beginning
257 
258  const Real time = 0.0;
259  InitFromScratch(time);
260 
261 #ifdef ROMSX_USE_MULTIBLOCK
262  // Multiblock: hook to set BL & comms once ba/dm are known
263  if(domain_p[0].bigEnd(0) < 500 ) {
264  m_mbc->SetBoxLists();
265  m_mbc->SetBlockCommMetaData();
266  }
267 #endif
268 
269  // For now we initialize rho_KE to 0
270  for (int lev = finest_level-1; lev >= 0; --lev)
271  vars_new[lev][Vars::cons].setVal(0.0,RhoKE_comp,1,0);
272 
273  if (solverChoice.use_terrain) {
274  if (init_type != "real") {
275  for (int lev = 0; lev <= finest_level; lev++)
276  {
277  init_custom_terrain(geom[lev],*z_phys_nd[lev],time);
278  init_terrain_grid(geom[lev],*z_phys_nd[lev]);
279  make_metrics(geom[lev],*z_phys_nd[lev],*z_phys_cc[lev],*detJ_cc[lev]);
280  }
281  }
282  }
283 
284  for (int lev = 0; lev <= finest_level; lev++)
285  init_only(lev, time);
286 
287  AverageDown();
288 
289  if(solverChoice.use_terrain) {
290  if (init_type == "real") {
291  for (int lev = 0; lev <= finest_level; lev++)
292  {
293  make_metrics(geom[lev],*z_phys_nd[lev],*z_phys_cc[lev],*detJ_cc[lev]);
294  }
295  }
296  }
297 
298  } else { // Restart from a checkpoint
299 
300  restart();
301 
302  if(solverChoice.use_terrain) {
303  // This must come after the call to restart because that
304  // is where we read in the mesh data
305  for (int lev = finest_level-1; lev >= 0; --lev)
306  make_metrics(geom[lev],*z_phys_nd[lev],*z_phys_cc[lev],*detJ_cc[lev]);
307  }
308  }
309 
310  // Initialize flux registers (whether we start from scratch or restart)
311  if (do_reflux) {
312  flux_registers[0] = 0;
313  for (int lev = 1; lev <= finest_level; lev++)
314  {
315  flux_registers[lev] = new FluxRegister(grids[lev], dmap[lev], ref_ratio[lev-1], lev, NVAR);
316  }
317  }
318 
319  if (restart_chkfile == "" && check_int > 0)
320  {
321 #ifdef ROMSX_USE_NETCDF
322  if (check_type == "netcdf") {
323  WriteNCCheckpointFile();
324  }
325 #endif
326  if (check_type == "native") {
327  WriteCheckpointFile();
328  }
329  last_check_file_step = 0;
330  }
331 
332  if ( (restart_chkfile == "") ||
333  (restart_chkfile != "" && plot_file_on_restart) )
334  {
335  if (plot_int_1 > 0)
336  {
337  WritePlotFile(1,plot_var_names_1);
338  last_plot_file_step_1 = istep[0];
339  }
340  if (plot_int_2 > 0)
341  {
342  WritePlotFile(2,plot_var_names_2);
343  last_plot_file_step_2 = istep[0];
344  }
345  }
346 
347  if (is_it_time_for_action(istep[0], t_new[0], dt[0], sum_interval, sum_per)) {
348  sum_integrated_quantities(t_new[0]);
349  }
350 
351  ComputeDt();
352 
353  // Fill ghost cells/faces
354  for (int lev = 0; lev <= finest_level; ++lev)
355  {
356  auto& lev_new = vars_new[lev];
357  auto& lev_old = vars_old[lev];
358 
359  FillPatch(lev, t_new[lev], lev_new);
360 
361  // Copy from new into old just in case
362  int ngs = lev_new[Vars::cons].nGrow();
363  int ngvel = lev_new[Vars::xvel].nGrow();
364  MultiFab::Copy(lev_old[Vars::cons],lev_new[Vars::cons],0,0,NVAR,ngs);
365  MultiFab::Copy(lev_old[Vars::xvel],lev_new[Vars::xvel],0,0,1,ngvel);
366  MultiFab::Copy(lev_old[Vars::yvel],lev_new[Vars::yvel],0,0,1,ngvel);
367  MultiFab::Copy(lev_old[Vars::zvel],lev_new[Vars::zvel],0,0,1,IntVect(ngvel,ngvel,0));
368  }
369 }

◆ is_it_time_for_action()

bool ROMSX::is_it_time_for_action ( int  nstep,
amrex::Real  time,
amrex::Real  dt,
int  action_interval,
amrex::Real  action_per 
)
138 {
139  bool int_test = (action_interval > 0 && nstep % action_interval == 0);
140 
141  bool per_test = false;
142  if (action_per > 0.0) {
143  const int num_per_old = static_cast<int>(amrex::Math::floor((time - dtlev) / action_per));
144  const int num_per_new = static_cast<int>(amrex::Math::floor((time) / action_per));
145 
146  if (num_per_old != num_per_new) {
147  per_test = true;
148  }
149  }
150 
151  return int_test || per_test;
152 }

◆ MakeHorizontalAverages()

void ROMSX::MakeHorizontalAverages ( )
829 {
830  // We need to create horizontal averages for 5 variables:
831  // density, temperature, pressure, qc, qv (if present)
832 
833  // First, average down all levels
834  AverageDown();
835 
836  // get the number of cells in z at level 0
837  int dir_z = AMREX_SPACEDIM-1;
838  auto domain = geom[0].Domain();
839  int size_z = domain.length(dir_z);
840  int start_z = domain.smallEnd()[dir_z];
841  Real area_z = static_cast<Real>(domain.length(0));
842  area_z *= domain.length(1);
843 
844  // resize the level 0 horizontal average vectors
845  h_havg_density.resize(size_z, 0.0_rt);
846  h_havg_temperature.resize(size_z, 0.0_rt);
847 #ifdef ROMSX_USE_MOISTURE
848  h_havg_qv.resize(size_z, 0.0_rt);
849  h_havg_qc.resize(size_z, 0.0_rt);
850 #endif
851 
852  // get the cell centered data and construct sums
853  auto& mf_cons = vars_new[0][Vars::cons];
854 #ifdef _OPENMP
855 #pragma omp parallel if (amrex::Gpu::notInLaunchRegion())
856 #endif
857  for (MFIter mfi(mf_cons); mfi.isValid(); ++mfi) {
858  const Box& box = mfi.validbox();
859  const IntVect& se = box.smallEnd();
860  const IntVect& be = box.bigEnd();
861  auto arr_cons = mf_cons[mfi].array();
862 
863 #ifdef ROMSX_USE_MOISTURE
864  FArrayBox fab_reduce(box, 5);
865 #else
866  FArrayBox fab_reduce(box, 3);
867 #endif
868  Elixir elx_reduce = fab_reduce.elixir();
869  auto arr_reduce = fab_reduce.array();
870 
871  ParallelFor(box, [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k) {
872  Real dens = arr_cons(i, j, k, Cons::Rho);
873  arr_reduce(i, j, k, 0) = dens;
874  arr_reduce(i, j, k, 1) = arr_cons(i, j, k, Cons::Temp) / dens;
875 #ifdef ROMSX_USE_MOISTURE
876  arr_reduce(i, j, k, 3) = arr_cons(i, j, k, Cons::RhoQv) / dens;
877  arr_reduce(i, j, k, 4) = arr_cons(i, j, k, Cons::RhoQc) / dens;
878 #endif
879  });
880 
881  for (int k=se[dir_z]; k <= be[dir_z]; ++k) {
882  Box kbox(box); kbox.setSmall(dir_z,k); kbox.setBig(dir_z,k);
883  h_havg_density [k-start_z] += fab_reduce.sum<RunOn::Device>(kbox,0);
884  h_havg_temperature [k-start_z] += fab_reduce.sum<RunOn::Device>(kbox,1);
885 #ifdef ROMSX_USE_MOISTURE
886  h_havg_qv [k-start_z] += fab_reduce.sum<RunOn::Device>(kbox,3);
887  h_havg_qc [k-start_z] += fab_reduce.sum<RunOn::Device>(kbox,4);
888 #endif
889  }
890  }
891 
892  // combine sums from different MPI ranks
893  ParallelDescriptor::ReduceRealSum(h_havg_density.dataPtr(), h_havg_density.size());
894  ParallelDescriptor::ReduceRealSum(h_havg_temperature.dataPtr(), h_havg_temperature.size());
895 #ifdef ROMSX_USE_MOISTURE
896  ParallelDescriptor::ReduceRealSum(h_havg_qv.dataPtr(), h_havg_qv.size());
897  ParallelDescriptor::ReduceRealSum(h_havg_qc.dataPtr(), h_havg_qc.size());
898 #endif
899 
900  // divide by the total number of cells we are averaging over
901  for (int k = 0; k < size_z; ++k) {
902  h_havg_density[k] /= area_z;
903  h_havg_temperature[k] /= area_z;
904 #ifdef ROMSX_USE_MOISTURE
905  h_havg_qv[k] /= area_z;
906  h_havg_qc[k] /= area_z;
907 #endif
908  }
909 
910  // resize device vectors
911  d_havg_density.resize(size_z, 0.0_rt);
912  d_havg_temperature.resize(size_z, 0.0_rt);
913  d_havg_pressure.resize(size_z, 0.0_rt);
914 #ifdef ROMSX_USE_MOISTURE
915  d_havg_qv.resize(size_z, 0.0_rt);
916  d_havg_qc.resize(size_z, 0.0_rt);
917 #endif
918 
919  // copy host vectors to device vectors
920  amrex::Gpu::copy(amrex::Gpu::hostToDevice, h_havg_density.begin(), h_havg_density.end(), d_havg_density.begin());
921  amrex::Gpu::copy(amrex::Gpu::hostToDevice, h_havg_temperature.begin(), h_havg_temperature.end(), d_havg_temperature.begin());
922 #ifdef ROMSX_USE_MOISTURE
923  amrex::Gpu::copy(amrex::Gpu::hostToDevice, h_havg_qv.begin(), h_havg_qv.end(), d_havg_qv.begin());
924  amrex::Gpu::copy(amrex::Gpu::hostToDevice, h_havg_qc.begin(), h_havg_qc.end(), d_havg_qc.begin());
925 #endif
926 }
ROMSX::d_havg_pressure
amrex::Gpu::DeviceVector< amrex::Real > d_havg_pressure
Definition: ROMSX.H:983
ROMSX::d_havg_density
amrex::Gpu::DeviceVector< amrex::Real > d_havg_density
Definition: ROMSX.H:981

amrex::Vector< amrex::Real > h_havg_density
Definition: ROMSX.H:978
ROMSX::d_havg_temperature
amrex::Gpu::DeviceVector< amrex::Real > d_havg_temperature
Definition: ROMSX.H:982

Cons::Temp

void ROMSX::MakeNewLevelFromCoarse ( int  lev,

394  const auto& crse_new = vars_new[lev-1];
395  auto& lev_new = vars_new[lev];
396  auto& lev_old = vars_old[lev];
397 
398  lev_new[Vars::cons].define(ba, dm, crse_new[Vars::cons].nComp(), crse_new[Vars::cons].nGrowVect());
399  lev_old[Vars::cons].define(ba, dm, crse_new[Vars::cons].nComp(), crse_new[Vars::cons].nGrowVect());

ROMSX::FillCoarsePatchAllVars

◆ MakeNewLevelFromScratch()

void ROMSX::MakeNewLevelFromScratch ( int  lev,
amrex::Real  time,
const amrex::BoxArray &  ba,
const amrex::DistributionMapping &  dm 
)
overridevirtual

Make a new level from scratch using provided BoxArray and DistributionMapping. Only used during initialization. Overrides the pure virtual function in AmrCore

475 {
476  // Set BoxArray grids and DistributionMapping dmap in AMReX_AmrMesh.H class
477  SetBoxArray(lev, ba);
478  SetDistributionMap(lev, dm);
479 
480  // The number of ghost cells for density must be 1 greater than that for velocity
481  // so that we can go back in forth between velocity and momentum on all faces
482 #if NGROW==2
483  int ngrow_state = ComputeGhostCells(solverChoice.spatial_order)+1;
484  int ngrow_vels = ComputeGhostCells(solverChoice.spatial_order);
485 #else
486  int ngrow_state = ComputeGhostCells(solverChoice.spatial_order)+2;
487  int ngrow_vels = ComputeGhostCells(solverChoice.spatial_order)+2;
488 #endif
489 
490  auto& lev_new = vars_new[lev];
491  auto& lev_old = vars_old[lev];
492 
493  lev_new[Vars::cons].define(ba, dm, Cons::NumVars, ngrow_state);
494  lev_old[Vars::cons].define(ba, dm, Cons::NumVars, ngrow_state);
495 
496  lev_new[Vars::xvel].define(convert(ba, IntVect(1,0,0)), dm, 1, ngrow_vels);
497  lev_old[Vars::xvel].define(convert(ba, IntVect(1,0,0)), dm, 1, ngrow_vels);
498 
499  lev_new[Vars::yvel].define(convert(ba, IntVect(0,1,0)), dm, 1, ngrow_vels);
500  lev_old[Vars::yvel].define(convert(ba, IntVect(0,1,0)), dm, 1, ngrow_vels);
501 
502  lev_new[Vars::zvel].define(convert(ba, IntVect(0,0,1)), dm, 1, IntVect(ngrow_vels,ngrow_vels,0));
503  lev_old[Vars::zvel].define(convert(ba, IntVect(0,0,1)), dm, 1, IntVect(ngrow_vels,ngrow_vels,0));
504 
505  z_phys_nd.resize(lev+1);
506  z_phys_cc.resize(lev+1);
507  detJ_cc.resize(lev+1);
508 
509  BoxList bl2d = ba.boxList();
510  for (auto& b : bl2d) {
511  b.setRange(2,0);
512  }
513  BoxArray ba2d(std::move(bl2d));
514 
515  BoxList bl1d = ba.boxList();
516  for (auto& b : bl1d) {
517  b.setRange(0,0);
518  b.setRange(1,0);
519  }
520  BoxArray ba1d(std::move(bl1d));
521 
522  mapfac_m.resize(lev+1);
523  mapfac_u.resize(lev+1);
524  mapfac_v.resize(lev+1);
525  mapfac_m[lev].reset(new MultiFab(ba2d,dm,1,0));
526  mapfac_u[lev].reset(new MultiFab(convert(ba2d,IntVect(1,0,0)),dm,1,0));
527  mapfac_v[lev].reset(new MultiFab(convert(ba2d,IntVect(0,1,0)),dm,1,0));
528  mapfac_m[lev]->setVal(1.);
529  mapfac_u[lev]->setVal(1.);
530  mapfac_v[lev]->setVal(1.);
531 
532  // Base state holds r_0, pres_0, pi_0 (in that order)
533  base_state.resize(lev+1);
534  base_state[lev].define(ba,dm,3,1);
535  base_state[lev].setVal(0.);
536 
537  if (solverChoice.use_terrain) {
538  z_phys_cc[lev].reset(new MultiFab(ba,dm,1,1));
539  detJ_cc[lev].reset(new MultiFab(ba,dm,1,1));
540 
541  BoxArray ba_nd(ba);
542  ba_nd.surroundingNodes();
543 
544  // We need this to be one greater than the ghost cells to handle levels > 0
545  int ngrow = ComputeGhostCells(solverChoice.spatial_order)+2;
546  z_phys_nd[lev].reset(new MultiFab(ba_nd,dm,1,IntVect(ngrow,ngrow,1)));
547 
548  } else {
549  z_phys_nd[lev] = nullptr;
550  z_phys_cc[lev] = nullptr;
551  detJ_cc[lev] = nullptr;
552  }
553 
554  vec_hOfTheConfusingName.resize(lev+1);
555  vec_Zt_avg1.resize(lev+1);
556  vec_s_r.resize(lev+1);
557  vec_z_w.resize(lev+1);
558  vec_z_r.resize(lev+1);
559  vec_y_r.resize(lev+1);
560  vec_x_r.resize(lev+1);
561  vec_Hz.resize(lev+1);
562  vec_Huon.resize(lev+1);
563  vec_Hvom.resize(lev+1);
564  vec_Akv.resize(lev+1);
565  vec_visc3d_r.resize(lev+1);
566  vec_visc2_p.resize(lev+1);
567  vec_visc2_r.resize(lev+1);
568  vec_diff2_salt.resize(lev+1);
569  vec_diff2_temp.resize(lev+1);
570  vec_ru.resize(lev+1);
571  vec_rv.resize(lev+1);
572  vec_rufrc.resize(lev+1);
573  vec_rvfrc.resize(lev+1);
574  vec_sustr.resize(lev+1);
575  vec_svstr.resize(lev+1);
576  vec_rdrag.resize(lev+1);
577  vec_bustr.resize(lev+1);
578  vec_bvstr.resize(lev+1);
579 
580  vec_DU_avg1.resize(lev+1);
581  vec_DU_avg2.resize(lev+1);
582  vec_DV_avg1.resize(lev+1);
583  vec_DV_avg2.resize(lev+1);
584  vec_rubar.resize(lev+1);
585  vec_rvbar.resize(lev+1);
586  vec_rzeta.resize(lev+1);
587  vec_ubar.resize(lev+1);
588  vec_vbar.resize(lev+1);
589  vec_zeta.resize(lev+1);
590  vec_t3.resize(lev+1);
591  vec_s3.resize(lev+1);
592 
593  vec_hOfTheConfusingName[lev].reset(new MultiFab(ba2d,dm,1,IntVect(NGROW,NGROW,0))); //2d, depth (double check if negative)
594  vec_Zt_avg1[lev].reset(new MultiFab(ba2d,dm,1,IntVect(NGROW,NGROW,0))); //2d, average of the free surface (zeta)
595  vec_s_r[lev].reset(new MultiFab(ba1d,dm,1,IntVect(0,0,0))); // scaled vertical coordinate [0,1] , transforms to z
596  vec_z_w[lev].reset(new MultiFab(ba,dm,1,IntVect(NGROW,NGROW,0))); // z at w points
597  vec_z_r[lev].reset(new MultiFab(ba,dm,1,IntVect(NGROW,NGROW,0))); // z at r points
598  vec_y_r[lev].reset(new MultiFab(ba2d,dm,1,IntVect(NGROW,NGROW,0))); // y at r points
599  vec_x_r[lev].reset(new MultiFab(ba2d,dm,1,IntVect(NGROW,NGROW,0))); // x at r points
600  vec_Hz[lev].reset(new MultiFab(ba,dm,1,IntVect(NGROW+1,NGROW+1,NGROW+1))); // like in ROMS, thickness of cell in z
601  vec_Huon[lev].reset(new MultiFab(ba,dm,1,IntVect(NGROW,NGROW,0))); // mass flux for u component
602  Print() << "ba " << ba << std::endl;
603  vec_Hvom[lev].reset(new MultiFab(ba,dm,1,IntVect(NGROW,NGROW,0))); // mass flux for v component
604  vec_Akv[lev].reset(new MultiFab(ba,dm,1,IntVect(NGROW,NGROW,0))); // vertical mixing coefficient (.in)
605  vec_visc3d_r[lev].reset(new MultiFab(ba,dm,1,IntVect(NGROW,NGROW,0))); // not used
606  // check dimensionality
607  vec_visc2_p[lev].reset(new MultiFab(ba,dm,1,IntVect(NGROW,NGROW,0))); // harmonic viscosity at psi points -- difference to 3d?
608  vec_visc2_r[lev].reset(new MultiFab(ba,dm,1,IntVect(NGROW,NGROW,0))); // harmonic viscosity at rho points
609  vec_diff2_salt[lev].reset(new MultiFab(ba,dm,1,IntVect(NGROW,NGROW,0))); // harmonic diffusivity salt
610  vec_diff2_temp[lev].reset(new MultiFab(ba,dm,1,IntVect(NGROW,NGROW,0))); // harmonic diffusivity temperature
611  // maybe TODO: clean up component indexing in prestep?
612  vec_ru[lev].reset(new MultiFab(ba,dm,2,IntVect(NGROW,NGROW,NGROW))); // RHS u (incl horizontal and vertical advection)
613  vec_rv[lev].reset(new MultiFab(ba,dm,2,IntVect(NGROW,NGROW,NGROW))); // RHS v
614  vec_rufrc[lev].reset(new MultiFab(ba2d,dm,2,IntVect(NGROW,NGROW,0))); //2d, (incl advection terms and surface/bottom stresses, integral over the whole columnn, k=0)
615  vec_rvfrc[lev].reset(new MultiFab(ba2d,dm,2,IntVect(NGROW,NGROW,0))); //2d, same as above but v
616  vec_sustr[lev].reset(new MultiFab(ba2d,dm,1,IntVect(NGROW,NGROW,0))); //2d, surface stress
617  vec_svstr[lev].reset(new MultiFab(ba2d,dm,1,IntVect(NGROW,NGROW,0))); //2d
618  vec_rdrag[lev].reset(new MultiFab(ba2d,dm,1,IntVect(NGROW,NGROW,0))); //2d, linear drag coefficient [m/s], defined at rho, somehow related to rdrg
619  vec_bustr[lev].reset(new MultiFab(ba2d,dm,1,IntVect(NGROW,NGROW,0))); //2d, bottom stress
620  vec_bvstr[lev].reset(new MultiFab(ba2d,dm,1,IntVect(NGROW,NGROW,0)));
621 
622  //all 2d -- all associated with the 2D advance
623  vec_DU_avg1[lev].reset(new MultiFab(ba2d,dm,1,IntVect(NGROW,NGROW,0))); //2d DU: sum(height[incl free surface?] * u)
624  vec_DU_avg2[lev].reset(new MultiFab(ba2d,dm,1,IntVect(NGROW,NGROW,0))); //2d like above, but correct(or)?
625  vec_DV_avg1[lev].reset(new MultiFab(ba2d,dm,1,IntVect(NGROW,NGROW,0)));
626  vec_DV_avg2[lev].reset(new MultiFab(ba2d,dm,1,IntVect(NGROW,NGROW,0)));
627  vec_rubar[lev].reset(new MultiFab(ba2d,dm,4,IntVect(NGROW,NGROW,0))); // 2d RHS ubar
628  vec_rvbar[lev].reset(new MultiFab(ba2d,dm,4,IntVect(NGROW,NGROW,0)));
629  vec_rzeta[lev].reset(new MultiFab(ba2d,dm,4,IntVect(NGROW,NGROW,0))); // 2d RHS zeta
630  vec_ubar[lev].reset(new MultiFab(ba2d,dm,3,IntVect(NGROW,NGROW,0))); // starts off kind of like a depth-averaged u, but exists at more points and more timesteps (b/c fast 2D update) than full u
631  vec_vbar[lev].reset(new MultiFab(ba2d,dm,3,IntVect(NGROW,NGROW,0)));
632  vec_zeta[lev].reset(new MultiFab(ba2d,dm,3,IntVect(NGROW,NGROW,0))); // 2d free surface
633 
634  vec_t3[lev].reset(new MultiFab(ba,dm,1,IntVect(NGROW,NGROW,0))); //tempstore
635  vec_s3[lev].reset(new MultiFab(ba,dm,1,IntVect(NGROW,NGROW,0))); //saltstore
636 
637  set_depth(lev);
638  set_vmix(lev);
639  set_hmixcoef(lev);
640  set_weights(lev);
641 
642  //consider tracking ru and rv indexes more specifically or more similarly to indx
643  vec_ru[lev]->setVal(0.0);
644  vec_rv[lev]->setVal(0.0);
645 
646  vec_DU_avg1[lev]->setVal(0.0);
647  vec_DU_avg2[lev]->setVal(0.0);
648  vec_DV_avg1[lev]->setVal(0.0);
649  vec_DV_avg2[lev]->setVal(0.0);
650  vec_rubar[lev]->setVal(0.0);
651  vec_rvbar[lev]->setVal(0.0);
652  vec_rzeta[lev]->setVal(0.0);
653 
654  vec_ubar[lev]->setVal(0.0);
655  vec_vbar[lev]->setVal(0.0);
656  vec_zeta[lev]->setVal(0.0);
657 
658  // Hard-coded initial drag value as in ROMS input file
659  vec_rdrag[lev]->setVal(3e-4);
660 
661 }
ROMSX::vec_x_r
amrex::Vector< std::unique_ptr< amrex::MultiFab > > vec_x_r

◆ post_timestep()

void ROMSX::post_timestep ( int  nstep,
amrex::Real  time,
amrex::Real  dt_lev 
)

Called after every level 0 timestep

218 {
219  BL_PROFILE("ROMSX::post_timestep()");
220 
221  if (do_reflux)
222  {
223  for (int lev = finest_level-1; lev >= 0; lev--)
224  {
225  // This call refluxes from the lev/lev+1 interface onto lev
226  get_flux_reg(lev+1).Reflux(vars_new[lev][Vars::cons],1.0, 0, 0, NVAR, geom[lev]);
227 
228  // We need to do this before anything else because refluxing changes the
229  // values of coarse cells underneath fine grids with the assumption they'll
230  // be over-written by averaging down
231  AverageDownTo(lev);
232  }
233  }
234 
235  if (is_it_time_for_action(nstep, time, dt_lev0, sum_interval, sum_per)) {
236  sum_integrated_quantities(time);
237  }
238 }
ROMSX::get_flux_reg
AMREX_FORCE_INLINE amrex::FluxRegister & get_flux_reg(int lev)
Definition: ROMSX.H:1028

◆ prestep()

void ROMSX::prestep ( int  lev,
amrex::MultiFab &  mf_uold,
amrex::MultiFab &  mf_vold,
amrex::MultiFab &  mf_u,
amrex::MultiFab &  mf_v,
std::unique_ptr< amrex::MultiFab > &  mf_ru,
std::unique_ptr< amrex::MultiFab > &  mf_rv,
amrex::MultiFab &  mf_tempold,
amrex::MultiFab &  mf_saltold,
amrex::MultiFab &  mf_temp,
amrex::MultiFab &  mf_salt,
std::unique_ptr< amrex::MultiFab > &  mf_Hz,
std::unique_ptr< amrex::MultiFab > &  mf_Akv,
std::unique_ptr< amrex::MultiFab > &  mf_Huon,
std::unique_ptr< amrex::MultiFab > &  mf_Hvom,
amrex::MultiFab &  mf_W,
amrex::MultiFab &  mf_DC,
std::unique_ptr< amrex::MultiFab > &  mf_t3,
std::unique_ptr< amrex::MultiFab > &  mf_s3,
std::unique_ptr< amrex::MultiFab > &  mf_z_r,
std::unique_ptr< amrex::MultiFab > &  mf_sustr,
std::unique_ptr< amrex::MultiFab > &  mf_svstr,
std::unique_ptr< amrex::MultiFab > &  mf_bustr,
std::unique_ptr< amrex::MultiFab > &  mf_bvstr,
const int  iic,
const int  nfirst,
const int  nnew,
int  nstp,
int  nrhs,
int  N,
const amrex::Real  dt_lev 
)

Wrapper function for prestep

30 {
31  const auto prob_lo = Geom(lev).ProbLoArray();
32  const auto dxi = Geom(lev).InvCellSizeArray();
33  const auto dx = Geom(lev).CellSizeArray();
34  const int Mm = Geom(lev).Domain().size()[1];
35  auto geomdata = Geom(lev).data();
36 
37  const BoxArray& ba = mf_uold.boxArray();
38  const DistributionMapping& dm = mf_uold.DistributionMap();
39 
40  // Maybe not the best way to do this, but need to cache salt and temp since
41  // they get rewritten by prestep_t
42  MultiFab mf_saltcache(ba,dm,1,IntVect(NGROW,NGROW,0));
43  MultiFab mf_tempcache(ba,dm,1,IntVect(NGROW,NGROW,0));
44  MultiFab::Copy(mf_saltcache,mf_salt,0,0,mf_salt.nComp(),IntVect(NGROW,NGROW,0)); //mf_salt.nGrowVect());
45  MultiFab::Copy(mf_tempcache,mf_temp,0,0,mf_temp.nComp(),IntVect(NGROW,NGROW,0));
46 
47  for ( MFIter mfi(mf_u, TilingIfNotGPU()); mfi.isValid(); ++mfi )
48  {
49  Array4<Real> const& DC = mf_DC.array(mfi);
50  Array4<Real> const& Akv = (vec_Akv[lev])->array(mfi);
51  Array4<Real> const& Hz = (vec_Hz[lev])->array(mfi);
52  Array4<Real> const& Huon = (vec_Huon[lev])->array(mfi);
53  Array4<Real> const& Hvom = (vec_Hvom[lev])->array(mfi);
54  Array4<Real> const& z_r = (mf_z_r)->array(mfi);
55  Array4<Real> const& uold = (mf_uold).array(mfi);
56  Array4<Real> const& vold = (mf_vold).array(mfi);
57  Array4<Real> const& u = (mf_u).array(mfi);
58  Array4<Real> const& v = (mf_v).array(mfi);
59  Array4<Real> const& tempold = (mf_tempold).array(mfi);
60  Array4<Real> const& saltold = (mf_saltold).array(mfi);
61  Array4<Real> const& temp = (mf_temp).array(mfi);
62  Array4<Real> const& salt = (mf_salt).array(mfi);
63  Array4<Real> const& tempstore = (vec_t3[lev])->array(mfi);
64  Array4<Real> const& saltstore = (vec_s3[lev])->array(mfi);
65  Array4<Real> const& ru = (mf_ru)->array(mfi);
66  Array4<Real> const& rv = (mf_rv)->array(mfi);
67  Array4<Real> const& W = (mf_W).array(mfi);
68  Array4<Real> const& sustr = (mf_sustr)->array(mfi);
69  Array4<Real> const& svstr = (mf_svstr)->array(mfi);
70  Array4<Real> const& bustr = (mf_bustr)->array(mfi);
71  Array4<Real> const& bvstr = (mf_bvstr)->array(mfi);
72  Array4<Real> const& tempcache = (mf_tempcache).array(mfi);
73  Array4<Real> const& saltcache = (mf_saltcache).array(mfi);
74 
75  Real lambda = 1.0;
76 
77  Box bx = mfi.tilebox();
78  Box gbx = mfi.growntilebox();
79  Box gbx1 = mfi.growntilebox(IntVect(NGROW-1,NGROW-1,0));
80  Box gbx2 = mfi.growntilebox(IntVect(NGROW,NGROW,0));
81  Box gbx11 = mfi.growntilebox(IntVect(NGROW-1,NGROW-1,NGROW-1));
82  //copy the tilebox
83  Box tbxp1 = bx;
84  Box tbxp11 = bx;
85  Box tbxp2 = bx;
86  //TODO: adjust for tiling
87  //Box gbx3uneven(IntVect(AMREX_D_DECL(bx.smallEnd(0)-3,bx.smallEnd(1)-3,bx.smallEnd(2))),
88  // IntVect(AMREX_D_DECL(bx.bigEnd(0)+2,bx.bigEnd(1)+2,bx.bigEnd(2))));
89  //Box gbx2uneven(IntVect(AMREX_D_DECL(bx.smallEnd(0)-2,bx.smallEnd(1)-2,bx.smallEnd(2))),
90  // IntVect(AMREX_D_DECL(bx.bigEnd(0)+1,bx.bigEnd(1)+1,bx.bigEnd(2))));
91  Box ubx = surroundingNodes(bx,0);
92  Box vbx = surroundingNodes(bx,1);
93  //make only gbx be grown to match multifabs
94  tbxp2.grow(IntVect(NGROW,NGROW,0));
95  tbxp1.grow(IntVect(NGROW-1,NGROW-1,0));
96  tbxp11.grow(IntVect(NGROW-1,NGROW-1,NGROW-1));
97 
98  Box bxD = bx;
99  bxD.makeSlab(2,0);
100  Box gbx1D = gbx1;
101  gbx1D.makeSlab(2,0);
102  Box gbx2D = gbx2;
103  gbx2D.makeSlab(2,0);
104 
105  Box tbxp1D = tbxp1;
106  tbxp1D.makeSlab(2,0);
107  Box tbxp2D = tbxp2;
108  tbxp2D.makeSlab(2,0);
109 
110  FArrayBox fab_FC(tbxp2,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena()); //3D
111  FArrayBox fab_FX(gbx2,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena()); //3D
112  FArrayBox fab_FE(gbx2,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena()); //3D
113  FArrayBox fab_pn(tbxp2D,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena());
114  FArrayBox fab_pm(tbxp2D,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena());
115  FArrayBox fab_on_u(tbxp2D,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena());
116  FArrayBox fab_om_v(tbxp2D,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena());
117  FArrayBox fab_om_u(tbxp2D,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena());
118  FArrayBox fab_on_v(tbxp2D,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena());
119  FArrayBox fab_om_r(tbxp2D,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena());
120  FArrayBox fab_on_r(tbxp2D,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena());
121  FArrayBox fab_om_p(tbxp2D,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena());
122  FArrayBox fab_on_p(tbxp2D,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena());
123  FArrayBox fab_pmon_u(tbxp2D,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena());
124  FArrayBox fab_pnom_u(tbxp2D,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena());
125  FArrayBox fab_pmon_v(tbxp2D,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena());
126  FArrayBox fab_pnom_v(tbxp2D,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena());
127  FArrayBox fab_fomn(tbxp2D,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena());
128  //FArrayBox fab_oHz(gbx11,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena());
129 
130  auto FC=fab_FC.array();
131  auto FX=fab_FX.array();
132  auto FE=fab_FE.array();
133  auto pn=fab_pn.array();
134  auto pm=fab_pm.array();
135  auto on_u=fab_on_u.array();
136  auto om_v=fab_om_v.array();
137  auto om_u=fab_om_u.array();
138  auto on_v=fab_on_v.array();
139  auto om_r=fab_om_r.array();
140  auto on_r=fab_on_r.array();
141  auto om_p=fab_om_p.array();
142  auto on_p=fab_on_p.array();
143  auto pmon_u=fab_pmon_u.array();
144  auto pnom_u=fab_pnom_u.array();
145  auto pmon_v=fab_pmon_v.array();
146  auto pnom_v=fab_pnom_v.array();
147  auto fomn=fab_fomn.array();
148 
149  amrex::ParallelFor(tbxp2D,
150  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int )
151  {
152  pm(i,j,0)=dxi[0];
153  pn(i,j,0)=dxi[1];
154  //defined UPWELLING
155  Real f0=-8.26e-5;
156  Real beta=0.0;
157  Real Esize=1000*(Mm);
158  Real y = prob_lo[1] + (j + 0.5) * dx[1];
159  Real f=fomn(i,j,0)=f0+beta*(y-.5*Esize);
160  fomn(i,j,0)=f*(1.0/(pm(i,j,0)*pn(i,j,0)));
161  });
162 
163  amrex::ParallelFor(tbxp2D,
164  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int )
165  {
166  //Note: are the comment definitons right? Don't seem to match metrics.f90
167  om_v(i,j,0)=1.0/dxi[0]; // 2/(pm(i,j-1)+pm(i,j))
168  on_u(i,j,0)=1.0/dxi[1]; // 2/(pm(i,j-1)+pm(i,j))
169  om_r(i,j,0)=1.0/dxi[0]; // 1/pm(i,j)
170  on_r(i,j,0)=1.0/dxi[1]; // 1/pn(i,j)
171  //todo: om_p on_p
172  om_p(i,j,0)=1.0/dxi[0]; // 4/(pm(i-1,j-1)+pm(i-1,j)+pm(i,j-1)+pm(i,j))
173  on_p(i,j,0)=1.0/dxi[1]; // 4/(pn(i-1,j-1)+pn(i-1,j)+pn(i,j-1)+pn(i,j))
174  on_v(i,j,0)=1.0/dxi[1]; // 2/(pn(i-1,j)+pn(i,j))
175  om_u(i,j,0)=1.0/dxi[0]; // 2/(pm(i-1,j)+pm(i,j))
176  pmon_u(i,j,0)=1.0; // (pm(i-1,j)+pm(i,j))/(pn(i-1,j)+pn(i,j))
177  pnom_u(i,j,0)=1.0; // (pn(i-1,j)+pn(i,j))/(pm(i-1,j)+pm(i,j))
178  pmon_v(i,j,0)=1.0; // (pm(i,j-1)+pm(i,j))/(pn(i,j-1)+pn(i,j))
179  pnom_v(i,j,0)=1.0; // (pn(i,j-1)+pn(i,j))/(pm(i,j-1)+pm(i,j))
180  });
181  if (verbose >= 2) {
182  amrex::PrintToFile("temp_preprestep").SetPrecision(18)<<FArrayBox(temp)<<std::endl;
183  amrex::PrintToFile("tempstore_preprestep").SetPrecision(18)<<FArrayBox(tempstore)<<std::endl;
184  amrex::PrintToFile("salt_preprestep").SetPrecision(18)<<FArrayBox(salt)<<std::endl;
185  amrex::PrintToFile("saltstore_preprestep").SetPrecision(18)<<FArrayBox(saltstore)<<std::endl;
186  amrex::PrintToFile("saltold_preprestep").SetPrecision(18)<<FArrayBox(saltold)<<std::endl;
187  amrex::PrintToFile("tempold_preprestep").SetPrecision(18)<<FArrayBox(tempold)<<std::endl;
188  }
189 
190  if (verbose > 0) {
191  Print() << "Akv box " << Box(Akv) << std::endl;
192  }
193  prestep_t_3d(bx, gbx, uold, vold, u, v, tempold, saltold, temp, salt, tempcache,ru, rv, Hz, Akv, on_u, om_v, Huon, Hvom,
194  pm, pn, W, DC, FC, tempstore, saltstore, FX, FE, z_r, iic, ntfirst, nnew, nstp, nrhs, N,
195  lambda, dt_lev);
196  prestep_t_3d(bx, gbx, uold, vold, u, v, saltold, saltold, salt, salt, saltcache, ru, rv, Hz, Akv, on_u, om_v, Huon, Hvom,
197  pm, pn, W, DC, FC, saltstore, saltstore, FX, FE, z_r, iic, ntfirst, nnew, nstp, nrhs, N,
198  lambda, dt_lev);
199 
200  if (verbose >= 2) {
201  amrex::PrintToFile("u").SetPrecision(18)<<FArrayBox(u)<<std::endl;
202  amrex::PrintToFile("u").SetPrecision(18)<<FArrayBox(u)<<std::endl;
203  amrex::PrintToFile("v").SetPrecision(18)<<FArrayBox(v)<<std::endl;
204  amrex::PrintToFile("uold").SetPrecision(18)<<FArrayBox(uold)<<std::endl;
205  amrex::PrintToFile("vold").SetPrecision(18)<<FArrayBox(vold)<<std::endl;
206  amrex::PrintToFile("temp").SetPrecision(18)<<FArrayBox(temp)<<std::endl;
207  amrex::PrintToFile("tempstore").SetPrecision(18)<<FArrayBox(tempstore)<<std::endl;
208  amrex::PrintToFile("salt").SetPrecision(18)<<FArrayBox(salt)<<std::endl;
209  amrex::PrintToFile("saltstore").SetPrecision(18)<<FArrayBox(saltstore)<<std::endl;
210  }
211  //
212  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
213  // prestep_uv_3d
214  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
215  //
216  //updates u,v,ru,rv (ru and rv have multiple components)
217  prestep_uv_3d(bx, gbx, uold, vold, u, v, ru, rv, Hz, Akv, on_u, om_v, Huon, Hvom,
218  pm, pn, W, DC, FC, z_r, sustr, svstr, bustr, bvstr, iic, ntfirst, nnew, nstp, nrhs, N,
219  lambda, dt_lev);
220  if (verbose >= 2) {
221  amrex::PrintToFile("u_after_prestep").SetPrecision(18)<<FArrayBox(u)<<std::endl;
222  amrex::PrintToFile("v_after_prestep").SetPrecision(18)<<FArrayBox(v)<<std::endl;
223  amrex::PrintToFile("ru_after_prestep").SetPrecision(18)<<FArrayBox(ru)<<std::endl;
224  amrex::PrintToFile("rv_after_prestep").SetPrecision(18)<<FArrayBox(rv)<<std::endl;
225  amrex::PrintToFile("temp_afterprestep").SetPrecision(18)<<FArrayBox(temp)<<std::endl;
226  amrex::PrintToFile("tempstore_afterprestep").SetPrecision(18)<<FArrayBox(tempstore)<<std::endl;
227  amrex::PrintToFile("salt_afterprestep").SetPrecision(18)<<FArrayBox(salt)<<std::endl;
228  amrex::PrintToFile("saltstore_afterprestep").SetPrecision(18)<<FArrayBox(saltstore)<<std::endl;
229  amrex::PrintToFile("saltold_afterprestep").SetPrecision(18)<<FArrayBox(saltold)<<std::endl;
230  amrex::PrintToFile("tempold_afterprestep").SetPrecision(18)<<FArrayBox(tempold)<<std::endl;
231  }
232  }
233 }
ROMSX::prestep_t_3d
void prestep_t_3d(const amrex::Box &tbx, const amrex::Box &gbx, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > uold, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > vold, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > u, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > v, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > tempold, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > saltold, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > temp, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > salt, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > tempcache, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > ru, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > rv, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > Hz, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > Akv, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > on_u, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > om_v, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > Huon, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > Hvom, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > pm, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > pn, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > W, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > DC, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > FC, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > tempstore, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > saltstore, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > FE, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > FX, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > z_r, int iic, int ntfirst, int nnew, int nstp, int nrhs, int N, const amrex::Real lambda, const amrex::Real dt_lev)
Definition: ROMSX_prestep_t_3d.cpp:11
ROMSX::prestep_uv_3d
void prestep_uv_3d(const amrex::Box &bx, const amrex::Box &gbx, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > uold, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > vold, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > u, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > v, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > ru, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > rv, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > Hz, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > Akv, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > on_u, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > om_v, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > Huon, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > Hvom, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > pm, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > pn, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > W, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > DC, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > FC, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > z_r, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > sustr, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > svstr, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > bustr, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > bvstr, int iic, int ntfirst, int nnew, int nstp, int nrhs, int N, const amrex::Real lambda, const amrex::Real dt_lev)
Definition: ROMSX_prestep_uv_3d.cpp:11

◆ prestep_t_3d()

void ROMSX::prestep_t_3d ( const amrex::Box &  tbx,
const amrex::Box &  gbx,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  uold,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  vold,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  u,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  v,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  tempold,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  saltold,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  temp,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  salt,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  tempcache,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  ru,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  rv,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  Hz,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  Akv,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  on_u,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  om_v,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  Huon,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  Hvom,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  pm,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  pn,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  W,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  DC,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  FC,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  tempstore,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  saltstore,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  FE,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  FX,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  z_r,
int  iic,
int  ntfirst,
int  nnew,
int  nstp,
int  nrhs,
int  N,
const amrex::Real  lambda,
const amrex::Real  dt_lev 
)

Prestep calculations for the tracers

28 {
29  //copy the tilebox
30  Box gbx1 = tbx;
31  Box gbx2 = tbx;
32  Box tbxp1 = tbx;
33  Box tbxp2 = tbx;
34 
35  tbxp1.grow(IntVect(NGROW-1,NGROW-1,0));
36  tbxp2.grow(IntVect(NGROW,NGROW,0));
37  FArrayBox fab_FX(tbxp2,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena()); //3D
38  FArrayBox fab_FE(tbxp2,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena()); //3D
39 
40  auto FX=fab_FX.array();
41  auto FE=fab_FE.array();
42 
43 
44  Box ubx = surroundingNodes(tbx,0);
45  Box vbx = surroundingNodes(tbx,1);
46 
47  Box gbx3uneven_init(IntVect(AMREX_D_DECL(tbx.smallEnd(0)-3,tbx.smallEnd(1)-3,tbx.smallEnd(2))),
48  IntVect(AMREX_D_DECL(tbx.bigEnd(0)+2,tbx.bigEnd(1)+2,tbx.bigEnd(2))));
49  BoxArray ba_gbx3uneven = intersect(BoxArray(gbx3uneven_init), gbx);
50  AMREX_ASSERT((ba_gbx3uneven.size() == 1));
51  Box gbx3uneven = ba_gbx3uneven[0];
52 
53  gbx2.grow(IntVect(NGROW,NGROW,0));
54  BoxArray ba_gbx2 = intersect(BoxArray(gbx2), gbx);
55  AMREX_ASSERT((ba_gbx2.size() == 1));
56  gbx2 = ba_gbx2[0];
57 
58  gbx1.grow(IntVect(NGROW-1,NGROW-1,0));
59  BoxArray ba_gbx1 = intersect(BoxArray(gbx1), gbx);
60  AMREX_ASSERT((ba_gbx1.size() == 1));
61  gbx1 = ba_gbx1[0];
62 
63  //------------------------------------------------------------------------
64  // Vertically integrate horizontal mass flux divergence.
65  //------------------------------------------------------------------------
66  //
67  //Should really use gbx3uneven
68  amrex::ParallelFor(Box(W),
69  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
70  {
71  // Starting with zero vertical velocity at the bottom, integrate
72  // from the bottom (k=0) to the free-surface (k=N). The w(:,:,N(ng))
73  // contains the vertical velocity at the free-surface, d(zeta)/d(t).
74  // Notice that barotropic mass flux divergence is not used directly.
75  //
76  W(i,j,k)=0.0;
77  });
78  amrex::ParallelFor(gbx1,
79  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
80  {
81  // Starting with zero vertical velocity at the bottom, integrate
82  // from the bottom (k=0) to the free-surface (k=N). The w(:,:,N(ng))
83  // contains the vertical velocity at the free-surface, d(zeta)/d(t).
84  // Notice that barotropic mass flux divergence is not used directly.
85  //
86  if(k==0) {
87  W(i,j,k)=0.0;
88  } else {
89  W(i,j,k) = - (Huon(i+1,j,k)-Huon(i,j,k));
90  }
91  });
92  amrex::ParallelFor(gbx1,
93  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
94  {
95  // Starting with zero vertical velocity at the bottom, integrate
96  // from the bottom (k=0) to the free-surface (k=N). The w(:,:,N(ng))
97  // contains the vertical velocity at the free-surface, d(zeta)/d(t).
98  // Notice that barotropic mass flux divergence is not used directly.
99  //
100  if(k==0) {
101  W(i,j,k)=W(i,j,k);
102  } else {
103  W(i,j,k) = W(i,j,k)- (Hvom(i,j+1,k)-Hvom(i,j,k));
104  }
105  });
106  amrex::ParallelFor(gbx3uneven,
107  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
108  {
109  // Starting with zero vertical velocity at the bottom, integrate
110  // from the bottom (k=0) to the free-surface (k=N). The w(:,:,N(ng))
111  // contains the vertical velocity at the free-surface, d(zeta)/d(t).
112  // Notice that barotropic mass flux divergence is not used directly.
113  //
114  if(k==0) {
115  W(i,j,k)=W(i,j,k);
116  } else {
117  W(i,j,k) = W(i,j,k) + W(i,j,k-1);
118  }
119  });
120  FArrayBox fab_Akt(tbxp2,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena());
121  auto Akt= fab_Akt.array();
122 
123  //From ini_fields and .in file
124  //fab_Akt.setVal(1e-6);
125  FArrayBox fab_stflux(tbxp2,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena());
126  auto stflux= fab_stflux.array();
127  FArrayBox fab_btflux(tbxp2,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena());
128  auto btflux= fab_btflux.array();
129 
130  //From ini_fields and .in file
131  //fab_stflux.setVal(0.0);
132  //also set btflux=0 (as in ana_btflux.H)
133 
134  amrex::ParallelFor(tbxp2,
135  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
136  {
137  Akt(i,j,k)=1e-6;
138  stflux(i,j,k)=0.0;
139  btflux(i,j,k)=0.0;
140  });
141  if (verbose > 0) {
142  amrex::AllPrint() << "Box(Huon) " << Box(Huon) << std::endl;
143  amrex::AllPrint() << "Box(Hvom) " << Box(Hvom) << std::endl;
144  }
145 
146  //Use FC and DC as intermediate arrays for FX and FE
147  //First pass do centered 2d terms
148 
149  amrex::ParallelFor(tbxp2,
150  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
151  {
152  FX(i,j,k)=Box(tempold).contains(i-1,j,k) ? Huon(i,j,k)*
153  0.5*(tempold(i-1,j,k)+
154  tempold(i ,j,k)) : 1e34;
155  });
156  amrex::ParallelFor(tbxp2,
157  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
158  {
159  FE(i,j,k)=Box(tempold).contains(i,j-1,k) ? Hvom(i,j,k)*
160  0.5*(tempold(i,j-1,k)+
161  tempold(i,j,k)) : 1e34;
162  });
163 
164  //Intermediate tracer at 3
165  //
166  // Time-step horizontal advection (m Tunits).
167  //
168 
169  Real cff1 = 0.0, cff2 = 0.0, cff;
170 
171  int indx=0; //nrhs-3
172  Real GammaT = 1.0/6.0;
173 
174  if (iic==ntfirst)
175  {
176  cff=0.5*dt_lev;
177  cff1=1.0;
178  cff2=0.0;
179  } else {
180  cff=(1-GammaT)*dt_lev;
181  cff1=0.5+GammaT;
182  cff2=0.5-GammaT;
183  }
184  if (verbose > 0) {
185  Print() << std::endl;
186  Print()<<(Box(tempstore))<<std::endl;
187  Print()<<Box(Hz)<<std::endl;
188  Print()<<Box(tempold)<<std::endl;
189  Print()<<(Box(FX))<<std::endl;
190  Print()<<(Box(FE))<<std::endl;
191  }
192  amrex::ParallelFor(tbxp1,
193  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
194  {
195  tempstore(i,j,k)=Hz(i,j,k)*(cff1*tempold(i,j,k)+
196  cff2*tempcache(i,j,k))-
197  cff*pm(i,j,0)*pn(i,j,0)*
198  (FX(i+1,j,k)-FX(i,j,k)+
199  FE(i,j+1,k)-FE(i,j,k));
200  /*
201  tempstore(i,j,k,3)=Hz(i,j,k)*(cff1*tempold(i,j,k,nstp)+
202  cff2*temp(i,j,k,nnew))-
203  cff*pm(i,j,0)*pn(i,j,0)*
204  (FC(i+1,j)-FC(i,j)+
205  DC(i,j+1)-DC(i,j));*/
206  });
207 
208  //
209  // Time-step vertical advection of tracers (Tunits). Impose artificial
210  // continuity equation.
211  //
212  amrex::ParallelFor(tbxp2,
213  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
214  {
215  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
216  // Add in vertical advection.
217  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
218 
219  Real cff1=0.5;
220  Real cff2=7.0/12.0;
221  Real cff3=1.0/12.0;
222 
223  if (k>=1 && k<=N-2)
224  {
225  FC(i,j,k)=( cff2*(tempold(i ,j,k ,nrhs)+ tempold(i,j,k+1,nrhs))
226  -cff3*(tempold(i ,j,k-1,nrhs)+ tempold(i,j,k+2,nrhs)) )*
227  ( W(i,j,k));
228  }
229  else // this needs to be split up so that the following can be concurrent
230  {
231  FC(i,j,N)=0.0;
232 
233  FC(i,j,N-1)=( cff2*tempold(i ,j,N-1,nrhs)+ cff1*tempold(i,j,N ,nrhs)
234  -cff3*tempold(i ,j,N-2,nrhs) )*
235  ( W(i ,j,N-1));
236 
237  FC(i,j,0)=( cff2*tempold(i ,j,1,nrhs)+ cff1*tempold(i,j,0,nrhs)
238  -cff3*tempold(i ,j,2,nrhs) )*
239  ( W(i ,j,0));
240 
241  // FC(i,0,-1)=0.0;
242  }
243 
244  });
245 /*
246  Real cff;
247 
248  int indx=0; //nrhs-3
249  Real GammaT = 1.0/6.0;
250 
251  if (iic==ntfirst)
252  {
253  cff=0.5*dt_lev;
254  } else {
255  cff=(1-GammaT)*dt_lev;
256  }*/
257 
258  amrex::ParallelFor(tbxp1,
259  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
260  {
261  if(k-1>=0) {
262  DC(i,j,k)=1.0/(Hz(i,j,k)-
263  cff*pm(i,j,0)*pn(i,j,0)*
264  (Huon(i+1,j,k)-Huon(i,j,k)+
265  Hvom(i,j+1,k)-Hvom(i,j,k)+
266  (W(i,j,k)-W(i,j,k-1))));
267  } else {
268  DC(i,j,k)=1.0/(Hz(i,j,k)-
269  cff*pm(i,j,0)*pn(i,j,0)*
270  (Huon(i+1,j,k)-Huon(i,j,k)+
271  Hvom(i,j+1,k)-Hvom(i,j,k)+
272  (W(i,j,k))));
273  }
274 
275  /*
276  tempstore(i,j,k,3)=Hz(i,j,k)*(cff1*tempold(i,j,k,nstp)+
277  cff2*temp(i,j,k,nnew))-
278  cff*pm(i,j,0)*pn(i,j,0)*
279  (FC(i+1,j)-FC(i,j)+
280  DC(i,j+1)-DC(i,j));*/
281  });
282 
283  amrex::ParallelFor(tbxp1,
284  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
285  {
286  Real cff1=cff*pm(i,j,0)*pn(i,j,0);
287  Real cff4;
288  if(k-1>=0) {
289  cff4=FC(i,j,k)-FC(i,j,k-1);
290  } else {
291  cff4=FC(i,j,k);
292  }
293  tempstore(i,j,k)=DC(i,j,k)*(tempstore(i,j,k)-cff1*cff4);
294 // temp(i,j,k)=tempold(i,j,k);
295  });
296 
297  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
298  // Start computation of tracers at n+1 time-step, t(i,j,k,nnew,itrc).
299  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
300  //
301  // Compute vertical diffusive fluxes "FC" of the tracer fields at
302  update_vel_3d(tbxp1, gbx, 0, 0, temp, tempstore, ru, Hz, Akt, DC, FC,
303  stflux, btflux, z_r, pm, pn, iic, iic, nnew, nstp, nrhs, N, lambda, dt_lev);
304 }
ROMSX::update_vel_3d
void update_vel_3d(const amrex::Box &bx, const amrex::Box &gbx, const int ioff, const int joff, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > vel, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > vel_old, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > rvel, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > Hz, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > Akv, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > pm, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > pn, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > DC, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > FC, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > sstr, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > bstr, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > z_r, const int iic, const int ntfirst, const int nnew, int nstp, int nrhs, int N, const amrex::Real lambda, const amrex::Real dt_lev)
Definition: ROMSX_update_vel_3d.cpp:20

◆ prestep_uv_3d()

void ROMSX::prestep_uv_3d ( const amrex::Box &  bx,
const amrex::Box &  gbx,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  uold,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  vold,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  u,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  v,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  ru,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  rv,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  Hz,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  Akv,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  on_u,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  om_v,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  Huon,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  Hvom,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  pm,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  pn,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  W,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  DC,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  FC,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  z_r,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  sustr,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  svstr,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  bustr,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  bvstr,
int  iic,
int  ntfirst,
int  nnew,
int  nstp,
int  nrhs,
int  N,
const amrex::Real  lambda,
const amrex::Real  dt_lev 
)

Prestep calculations for momentum

25 {
26  //copy the tilebox
27  Box gbx1 = tbx;
28  Box gbx2 = tbx;
29  Box tbxp1 = tbx;
30  Box tbxp2 = tbx;
31 
32  tbxp1.grow(IntVect(NGROW-1,NGROW-1,0));
33  tbxp2.grow(IntVect(NGROW,NGROW,0));
34 
35  //make only gbx be grown to match multifabs
36  gbx2.grow(IntVect(NGROW,NGROW,0));
37  gbx1.grow(IntVect(NGROW-1,NGROW-1,0));
38 
39  if (verbose > 0) {
40  amrex::AllPrint() << "Box(Huon) " << Box(Huon) << std::endl;
41  amrex::AllPrint() << "Box(Hvom) " << Box(Hvom) << std::endl;
42  }
43 
44  //Need to include pre_step3d.F terms
45 
46  update_vel_3d(tbxp1, gbx, 1, 0, u, uold, ru, Hz, Akv, DC, FC,
47  sustr, bustr, z_r, pm, pn, iic, ntfirst, nnew, nstp, nrhs, N, lambda, dt_lev);
48 
49  update_vel_3d(tbxp1, gbx, 0, 1, v, vold, rv, Hz, Akv, DC, FC,
50  svstr, bvstr, z_r, pm, pn, iic, ntfirst, nnew, nstp, nrhs, N, lambda, dt_lev);
51 }

◆ ReadCheckpointFile()

void ROMSX::ReadCheckpointFile ( )
private
181 {
182  amrex::Print() << "Restart from checkpoint " << restart_chkfile << "\n";
183 
184  // Header
185  std::string File(restart_chkfile + "/Header");
186 
187  VisMF::IO_Buffer io_buffer(VisMF::GetIOBufferSize());
188 
189  Vector<char> fileCharPtr;
190  ParallelDescriptor::ReadAndBcastFile(File, fileCharPtr);
191  std::string fileCharPtrString(fileCharPtr.dataPtr());
192  std::istringstream is(fileCharPtrString, std::istringstream::in);
193 
194  std::string line, word;
195 
196  int chk_ncomp;
197 
198  // read in title line
199  std::getline(is, line);
200 
201  // read in finest_level
202  is >> finest_level;
203  GotoNextLine(is);
204 
205  // read the number of components
206  // for each variable we store
207 
208  // conservative, cell-centered vars
209  is >> chk_ncomp;
210  GotoNextLine(is);
211  AMREX_ASSERT(chk_ncomp == Cons::NumVars);
212 
213  // x-velocity on faces
214  is >> chk_ncomp;
215  GotoNextLine(is);
216  AMREX_ASSERT(chk_ncomp == 1);
217 
218  // y-velocity on faces
219  is >> chk_ncomp;
220  GotoNextLine(is);
221  AMREX_ASSERT(chk_ncomp == 1);
222 
223  // z-velocity on faces
224  is >> chk_ncomp;
225  GotoNextLine(is);
226  AMREX_ASSERT(chk_ncomp == 1);
227 
228  is >> chk_ncomp;
229  GotoNextLine(is);
230  AMREX_ASSERT(chk_ncomp == 2);
231 
232  is >> chk_ncomp;
233  GotoNextLine(is);
234  AMREX_ASSERT(chk_ncomp == 2);
235 
236  is >> chk_ncomp;
237  GotoNextLine(is);
238  AMREX_ASSERT(chk_ncomp == 3);
239 
240  is >> chk_ncomp;
241  GotoNextLine(is);
242  AMREX_ASSERT(chk_ncomp == 3);
243 
244  // read in array of istep
245  std::getline(is, line);
246  {
247  std::istringstream lis(line);
248  int i = 0;
249  while (lis >> word) {
250  istep[i++] = std::stoi(word);
251  }
252  }
253 
254  // read in array of dt
255  std::getline(is, line);
256  {
257  std::istringstream lis(line);
258  int i = 0;
259  while (lis >> word) {
260  dt[i++] = std::stod(word);
261  }
262  }
263 
264  // read in array of t_new
265  std::getline(is, line);
266  {
267  std::istringstream lis(line);
268  int i = 0;
269  while (lis >> word) {
270  t_new[i++] = std::stod(word);
271  }
272  }
273 
274  for (int lev = 0; lev <= finest_level; ++lev) {
275 
276  // read in level 'lev' BoxArray from Header
277  BoxArray ba;
278  ba.readFrom(is);
279  GotoNextLine(is);
280 
281  // create a distribution mapping
282  DistributionMapping dm { ba, ParallelDescriptor::NProcs() };
283 
284  MakeNewLevelFromScratch (lev, t_new[lev], ba, dm);
285  }
286 
287  // read in the MultiFab data
288  for (int lev = 0; lev <= finest_level; ++lev)
289  {
290  BoxList bl2d = grids[lev].boxList();
291  for (auto& b : bl2d) {
292  b.setRange(2,0);
293  }
294  BoxArray ba2d(std::move(bl2d));
295 
296  MultiFab cons(grids[lev],dmap[lev],Cons::NumVars,0);
297  VisMF::Read(cons, amrex::MultiFabFileFullPrefix(lev, restart_chkfile, "Level_", "Cell"));
298  MultiFab::Copy(vars_new[lev][Vars::cons],cons,0,0,NVAR,0);
299 
300  MultiFab xvel(convert(grids[lev],IntVect(1,0,0)),dmap[lev],1,0);
301  VisMF::Read(xvel, amrex::MultiFabFileFullPrefix(lev, restart_chkfile, "Level_", "XFace"));
302  MultiFab::Copy(vars_new[lev][Vars::xvel],xvel,0,0,1,0);
303 
304  MultiFab yvel(convert(grids[lev],IntVect(0,1,0)),dmap[lev],1,0);
305  VisMF::Read(yvel, amrex::MultiFabFileFullPrefix(lev, restart_chkfile, "Level_", "YFace"));
306  MultiFab::Copy(vars_new[lev][Vars::yvel],yvel,0,0,1,0);
307 
308  MultiFab zvel(convert(grids[lev],IntVect(0,0,1)),dmap[lev],1,0);
309  VisMF::Read(zvel, amrex::MultiFabFileFullPrefix(lev, restart_chkfile, "Level_", "ZFace"));
310  MultiFab::Copy(vars_new[lev][Vars::zvel],zvel,0,0,1,0);
311 
312  if (solverChoice.use_terrain) {
313  // Note that we read the ghost cells of z_phys_nd (unlike above)
314  MultiFab z_height(convert(grids[lev],IntVect(NGROW-1,NGROW-1,NGROW-1)),dmap[lev],1,1);
315  VisMF::Read(z_height, amrex::MultiFabFileFullPrefix(lev, restart_chkfile, "Level_", "Z_Phys_nd"));
316  MultiFab::Copy(*z_phys_nd[lev],z_height,0,0,1,1);
317  }
318 
319  MultiFab mf_ru(grids[lev],dmap[lev],2,0);
320  VisMF::Read(mf_ru, amrex::MultiFabFileFullPrefix(lev, restart_chkfile, "Level_", "XRHS"));
321  MultiFab::Copy(*(vec_ru[lev]),mf_ru,0,0,2,0);
322 
323  MultiFab mf_rv(grids[lev],dmap[lev],2,0);
324  VisMF::Read(mf_rv, amrex::MultiFabFileFullPrefix(lev, restart_chkfile, "Level_", "YRHS"));
325  MultiFab::Copy(*(vec_rv[lev]),mf_rv,0,0,2,0);
326 
327  vec_ru[lev]->FillBoundary(geom[lev].periodicity());
328  vec_rv[lev]->FillBoundary(geom[lev].periodicity());
329 
330  MultiFab mf_ubar(ba2d,dmap[lev],3,0);
331  VisMF::Read(mf_ubar, amrex::MultiFabFileFullPrefix(lev, restart_chkfile, "Level_", "XBar"));
332  MultiFab::Copy(*(vec_ubar[lev]),mf_ubar,0,0,3,0);
333 
334  MultiFab mf_vbar(ba2d,dmap[lev],3,0);
335  VisMF::Read(mf_vbar, amrex::MultiFabFileFullPrefix(lev, restart_chkfile, "Level_", "YBar"));
336  MultiFab::Copy(*(vec_vbar[lev]),mf_vbar,0,0,3,0);
337 
338  vec_ubar[lev]->FillBoundary(geom[lev].periodicity());
339  vec_vbar[lev]->FillBoundary(geom[lev].periodicity());
340 
341  VisMF::Read(*(vec_rufrc[lev]), amrex::MultiFabFileFullPrefix(lev, restart_chkfile, "Level_", "rufrc"));
342  VisMF::Read(*(vec_rvfrc[lev]), amrex::MultiFabFileFullPrefix(lev, restart_chkfile, "Level_", "rvfrc"));
343  vec_rufrc[lev]->FillBoundary(geom[lev].periodicity());
344  vec_rvfrc[lev]->FillBoundary(geom[lev].periodicity());
345 
346  VisMF::Read(*(vec_sustr[lev]), amrex::MultiFabFileFullPrefix(lev, restart_chkfile, "Level_", "sustr"));
347  VisMF::Read(*(vec_svstr[lev]), amrex::MultiFabFileFullPrefix(lev, restart_chkfile, "Level_", "svstr"));
348  vec_sustr[lev]->FillBoundary(geom[lev].periodicity());
349  vec_svstr[lev]->FillBoundary(geom[lev].periodicity());
350 
351  VisMF::Read(*(vec_rdrag[lev]), amrex::MultiFabFileFullPrefix(lev, restart_chkfile, "Level_", "rdrag"));
352  vec_rdrag[lev]->FillBoundary(geom[lev].periodicity());
353 
354  VisMF::Read(*(vec_bustr[lev]), amrex::MultiFabFileFullPrefix(lev, restart_chkfile, "Level_", "bustr"));
355  VisMF::Read(*(vec_bvstr[lev]), amrex::MultiFabFileFullPrefix(lev, restart_chkfile, "Level_", "bvstr"));
356  vec_bustr[lev]->FillBoundary(geom[lev].periodicity());
357  vec_bvstr[lev]->FillBoundary(geom[lev].periodicity());
358 
359  VisMF::Read(*(vec_DU_avg1[lev]), amrex::MultiFabFileFullPrefix(lev, restart_chkfile, "Level_", "DU_avg1"));
360  VisMF::Read(*(vec_DU_avg2[lev]), amrex::MultiFabFileFullPrefix(lev, restart_chkfile, "Level_", "DU_avg2"));
361  VisMF::Read(*(vec_DV_avg1[lev]), amrex::MultiFabFileFullPrefix(lev, restart_chkfile, "Level_", "DV_avg1"));
362  VisMF::Read(*(vec_DV_avg2[lev]), amrex::MultiFabFileFullPrefix(lev, restart_chkfile, "Level_", "DV_avg2"));
363  vec_DU_avg1[lev]->FillBoundary(geom[lev].periodicity());
364  vec_DU_avg2[lev]->FillBoundary(geom[lev].periodicity());
365  vec_DV_avg1[lev]->FillBoundary(geom[lev].periodicity());
366  vec_DV_avg2[lev]->FillBoundary(geom[lev].periodicity());
367 
368  VisMF::Read(*(vec_zeta[lev]), amrex::MultiFabFileFullPrefix(lev, restart_chkfile, "Level_", "zeta"));
369  VisMF::Read(*(vec_Zt_avg1[lev]), amrex::MultiFabFileFullPrefix(lev, restart_chkfile, "Level_", "Zt_avg1"));
370  vec_zeta[lev]->FillBoundary(geom[lev].periodicity());
371  vec_Zt_avg1[lev]->FillBoundary(geom[lev].periodicity());
372  }
373 }
ROMSX::GotoNextLine
static void GotoNextLine(std::istream &is)

virtual void MakeNewLevelFromScratch(int lev, amrex::Real time, const amrex::BoxArray &ba, const amrex::DistributionMapping &dm) override
