◆ ReadParameters()

void ROMSX::ReadParameters ( )
private

read in some parameters from inputs file

695 {
696  {
697  ParmParse pp; // Traditionally, max_step and stop_time do not have prefix.
698  pp.query("max_step", max_step);
699  pp.query("stop_time", stop_time);
700  }
701 
702  ParmParse pp(pp_prefix);
703  {
704  // The type of the file we restart from
705  pp.query("restart_type", restart_type);
706 
707  pp.query("regrid_int", regrid_int);
708  pp.query("check_file", check_file);
709  pp.query("check_type", check_type);
710  pp.query("check_int", check_int);
711 
712  pp.query("restart", restart_chkfile);
713 
714  if (pp.contains("data_log"))
715  {
716  int num_datalogs = pp.countval("data_log");
717  datalog.resize(num_datalogs);
718  datalogname.resize(num_datalogs);
719  pp.queryarr("data_log",datalogname,0,num_datalogs);
720  for (int i = 0; i < num_datalogs; i++)
721  setRecordDataInfo(i,datalogname[i]);
722  }
723 
724  // Verbosity
725  pp.query("v", verbose);
726 
727  // Frequency of diagnostic output
728  pp.query("sum_interval", sum_interval);
729  pp.query("sum_period" , sum_per);
730 
731  // Time step controls
732  pp.query("cfl", cfl);
733  pp.query("init_shrink", init_shrink);
734  pp.query("change_max", change_max);
735 
736  pp.query("fixed_dt", fixed_dt);
737  pp.query("fixed_fast_dt", fixed_fast_dt);
738 
739  pp.query("fixed_ndtfast_ratio", fixed_ndtfast_ratio);
740 
741  // If all three are specified, they must be consistent
742  if (fixed_dt > 0. && fixed_fast_dt > 0. && fixed_ndtfast_ratio > 0)
743  {
744  if (fixed_dt / fixed_fast_dt != fixed_ndtfast_ratio)
745  {
746  amrex::Abort("Dt is over-specfied");
747  }
748  }
749  // If two are specified, initialize fixed_ndtfast_ratio
750  else if (fixed_dt > 0. && fixed_fast_dt > 0. && fixed_ndtfast_ratio <= 0)
751  {
752  fixed_ndtfast_ratio = fixed_dt / fixed_fast_dt;
753  }
754 
755 
756  AMREX_ASSERT(cfl > 0. || fixed_dt > 0.);
757 
758  // Mesh refinement
759  do_reflux = 0;
760  do_avg_down = 0;
761 
762  // How to initialize
763  pp.query("init_type",init_type);
764  if (init_type != "custom" &&
765  init_type != "ideal" &&
766  init_type != "real")
767  {
768  amrex::Error("init_type must be custom, ideal, or real ");
769  }
770 
771  // We use this to keep track of how many boxes we read in from WRF initialization
772  num_files_at_level.resize(max_level+1,0);
773 
774  // We use this to keep track of how many boxes are specified thru the refinement indicators
775  num_boxes_at_level.resize(max_level+1,0);
776  boxes_at_level.resize(max_level+1);
777 
778  // We always have exactly one file at level 0
779  num_boxes_at_level[0] = 1;
780 
781 #ifdef ROMSX_USE_NETCDF
782  nc_init_file.resize(max_level+1);
783 
784  // NetCDF wrfinput initialization files -- possibly multiple files at each of multiple levels
785  // but we always have exactly one file at level 0
786  for (int lev = 0; lev <= max_level; lev++)
787  {
788  const std::string nc_file_names = amrex::Concatenate("nc_init_file_",lev,1);
789  if (pp.contains(nc_file_names.c_str()))
790  {
791  int num_files = pp.countval(nc_file_names.c_str());
792  num_files_at_level[lev] = num_files;
793  nc_init_file[lev].resize(num_files);
794  pp.queryarr(nc_file_names.c_str(), nc_init_file[lev],0,num_files);
795  for (int j = 0; j < num_files; j++)
796  amrex::Print() << "Reading NC init file names at level " << lev << " and index " << j << " : " << nc_init_file[lev][j] << std::endl;
797  }
798  }
799 
800  // NetCDF wrfbdy lateral boundary file
801  pp.query("nc_bdy_file", nc_bdy_file);
802 #endif
803 
804  // Output format
805  pp.query("plotfile_type", plotfile_type);
806  if (plotfile_type != "amrex" &&
807  plotfile_type != "netcdf" && plotfile_type != "NetCDF" &&
808  plotfile_type != "hdf5" && plotfile_type != "HDF5" )
809  {
810  amrex::Print() << "User selected plotfile_type = " << plotfile_type << std::endl;
811  amrex::Abort("Dont know this plotfile_type");
812  }
813  pp.query("plot_file_1", plot_file_1);
814  pp.query("plot_file_2", plot_file_2);
815  pp.query("plot_int_1", plot_int_1);
816  pp.query("plot_int_2", plot_int_2);
817  }
818 
819 #ifdef ROMSX_USE_MULTIBLOCK
820  solverChoice.pp_prefix = pp_prefix;
821 #endif
822 
823  solverChoice.init_params();
824 }

◆ refinement_criteria_setup()

void ROMSX::refinement_criteria_setup ( )
private
24 {
25  if (max_level > 0)
26  {
27  ParmParse pp(pp_prefix);
28  Vector<std::string> refinement_indicators;
29  pp.queryarr("refinement_indicators",refinement_indicators,0,pp.countval("refinement_indicators"));
30 
31  for (int i=0; i<refinement_indicators.size(); ++i)
32  {
33  std::string ref_prefix = pp_prefix + "." + refinement_indicators[i];
34 
35  ParmParse ppr(ref_prefix);
36  RealBox realbox;
37  int lev_for_box;
38  if (ppr.countval("in_box_lo")) {
39  std::vector<Real> box_lo(3), box_hi(3);
40  ppr.get("max_level",lev_for_box);
41  if (lev_for_box <= max_level)
42  {
43  ppr.getarr("in_box_lo",box_lo,0,2);
44  ppr.getarr("in_box_hi",box_hi,0,2);
45  box_lo[2] = geom[0].ProbLo(2);
46  box_hi[2] = geom[0].ProbHi(2);
47  realbox = RealBox(&(box_lo[0]),&(box_hi[0]));
48 
49  amrex::Print() << "Reading " << realbox << " at level " << lev_for_box << std::endl;
50  num_boxes_at_level[lev_for_box] += 1;
51 
52  auto dx = geom[lev_for_box].CellSize();
53  int ilo = static_cast<int>(box_lo[0]/dx[0]);
54  int jlo = static_cast<int>(box_lo[1]/dx[1]);
55  int klo = static_cast<int>(box_lo[2]/dx[2]);
56  int ihi = static_cast<int>(box_hi[0]/dx[0]-1);
57  int jhi = static_cast<int>(box_hi[1]/dx[1]-1);
58  int khi = static_cast<int>(box_hi[2]/dx[2]-1);
59  Box bx(IntVect(ilo,jlo,klo),IntVect(ihi,jhi,khi));
60  if ( (ilo%ref_ratio[lev_for_box-1][0] != 0) || ((ihi+1)%ref_ratio[lev_for_box-1][0] != 0) ||
61  (jlo%ref_ratio[lev_for_box-1][1] != 0) || ((jhi+1)%ref_ratio[lev_for_box-1][1] != 0) )
62  amrex::Error("Fine box is not legit with this ref_ratio");
63  boxes_at_level[lev_for_box].push_back(bx);
64  amrex::Print() << "Saving in 'boxes at level' as " << bx << std::endl;
65  } // lev
66  if (init_type == "real") {
67  if (num_boxes_at_level[lev_for_box] != num_files_at_level[lev_for_box]) {
68  amrex::Error("Number of boxes does not match number of wrfinput files");
69 
70  }
71  }
72  }
73 
74  AMRErrorTagInfo info;
75 
76  if (realbox.ok()) {
77  info.SetRealBox(realbox);
78  }
79  if (ppr.countval("start_time") > 0) {
80  Real ref_min_time; ppr.get("start_time",ref_min_time);
81  info.SetMinTime(ref_min_time);
82  }
83  if (ppr.countval("end_time") > 0) {
84  Real ref_max_time; ppr.get("end_time",ref_max_time);
85  info.SetMaxTime(ref_max_time);
86  }
87  if (ppr.countval("max_level") > 0) {
88  int ref_max_level; ppr.get("max_level",ref_max_level);
89  info.SetMaxLevel(ref_max_level);
90  }
91 
92  if (ppr.countval("value_greater")) {
93  int num_val = ppr.countval("value_greater");
94  Vector<Real> value(num_val);
95  ppr.getarr("value_greater",value,0,num_val);
96  std::string field; ppr.get("field_name",field);
97  ref_tags.push_back(AMRErrorTag(value,AMRErrorTag::GREATER,field,info));
98  }
99  else if (ppr.countval("value_less")) {
100  int num_val = ppr.countval("value_less");
101  Vector<Real> value(num_val);
102  ppr.getarr("value_less",value,0,num_val);
103  std::string field; ppr.get("field_name",field);
104  ref_tags.push_back(AMRErrorTag(value,AMRErrorTag::LESS,field,info));
105  }
106  else if (ppr.countval("adjacent_difference_greater")) {
107  int num_val = ppr.countval("adjacent_difference_greater");
108  Vector<Real> value(num_val);
109  ppr.getarr("adjacent_difference_greater",value,0,num_val);
110  std::string field; ppr.get("field_name",field);
111  ref_tags.push_back(AMRErrorTag(value,AMRErrorTag::GRAD,field,info));
112  }
113  else if (realbox.ok())
114  {
115  ref_tags.push_back(AMRErrorTag(info));
116  } else {
117  Abort(std::string("Unrecognized refinement indicator for " + refinement_indicators[i]).c_str());
118  }
119  } // loop over criteria
120  } // if max_level > 0
121 }

◆ RemakeLevel()

void ROMSX::RemakeLevel ( int  lev,
amrex::Real  time,
const amrex::BoxArray &  ba,
const amrex::DistributionMapping &  dm 
)
overridevirtual

Remake an existing level using provided BoxArray and DistributionMapping and fill with existing fine and coarse data. Overrides the pure virtual function in AmrCore

421 {
422  Vector<MultiFab> tmp_lev_new(Vars::NumTypes);
423  Vector<MultiFab> tmp_lev_old(Vars::NumTypes);
424 #if NGROW==2
425  int ngrow_state = ComputeGhostCells(solverChoice.spatial_order)+1;
426  int ngrow_vels = ComputeGhostCells(solverChoice.spatial_order);
427 #else
428  int ngrow_state = ComputeGhostCells(solverChoice.spatial_order)+2;
429  int ngrow_vels = ComputeGhostCells(solverChoice.spatial_order)+2;
430 #endif
431 
432  tmp_lev_new[Vars::cons].define(ba, dm, Cons::NumVars, ngrow_state);
433  tmp_lev_old[Vars::cons].define(ba, dm, Cons::NumVars, ngrow_state);
434 
435  tmp_lev_new[Vars::xvel].define(convert(ba, IntVect(1,0,0)), dm, 1, ngrow_vels);
436  tmp_lev_old[Vars::xvel].define(convert(ba, IntVect(1,0,0)), dm, 1, ngrow_vels);
437 
438  tmp_lev_new[Vars::yvel].define(convert(ba, IntVect(0,1,0)), dm, 1, ngrow_vels);
439  tmp_lev_old[Vars::yvel].define(convert(ba, IntVect(0,1,0)), dm, 1, ngrow_vels);
440 
441  tmp_lev_new[Vars::zvel].define(convert(ba, IntVect(0,0,1)), dm, 1, IntVect(ngrow_vels,ngrow_vels,0));
442  tmp_lev_old[Vars::zvel].define(convert(ba, IntVect(0,0,1)), dm, 1, IntVect(ngrow_vels,ngrow_vels,0));
443 
444  // This will fill the temporary MultiFabs with data from vars_new
445  FillPatch(lev, time, tmp_lev_new);
446  FillPatch(lev, time, tmp_lev_old);
447 
448  for (int var_idx = 0; var_idx < Vars::NumTypes; ++var_idx) {
449  std::swap(tmp_lev_new[var_idx], vars_new[lev][var_idx]);
450  std::swap(tmp_lev_old[var_idx], vars_old[lev][var_idx]);
451  }
452 
453  t_new[lev] = time;
454  t_old[lev] = time - 1.e200;
455 }

◆ restart()

void ROMSX::restart ( )

Restart

373 {
374 #ifdef ROMSX_USE_NETCDF
375  if (restart_type == "netcdf") {
376  ReadNCCheckpointFile();
377  }
378 #endif
379  if (restart_type == "native") {
380  ReadCheckpointFile();
381  }
382 
383  // We set this here so that we don't over-write the checkpoint file we just started from
384  last_check_file_step = istep[0];
385 }
ROMSX::ReadCheckpointFile
void ReadCheckpointFile()
Definition: Checkpoint.cpp:180

◆ rho_eos()

void ROMSX::rho_eos ( const amrex::Box &  bx,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  temp,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  salt,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  rho,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  rhoA,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  rhoS,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  pden,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  Hz,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  z_w,
const int  nrhs,
const int  N 
)
17 {
18  const int Mn = Geom(0).Domain().size()[0];
19  const int Mm = Geom(0).Domain().size()[1];
20  auto phi_bxD=phi_bx;
21  phi_bxD.makeSlab(2,0);
22  //hardcode these for now instead of reading them from inputs
23  Real T0=14.0;
24  Real S0=35.0;
25  Real R0=1027;
26  Real Tcoef=1.7e-4;
27  Real Scoef=0.0;
28  Real rho0=1025.0;
29 
30 //
31 //=======================================================================
32 // Linear equation of state.
33 //=======================================================================
34 //
35 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
36 // Compute "in situ" density anomaly (kg/m3 - 1000) using the linear
37 // equation of state.
38 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
39 //
40  amrex::ParallelFor(phi_bx,
41  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
42  {
43  rho(i,j,k)=R0-
44  R0*Tcoef*(temp(i,j,k,nrhs)-T0);
45  rho(i,j,k)=rho(i,j,k)+
46  R0*Scoef*(salt(i,j,k,nrhs)-S0);
47  rho(i,j,k)=rho(i,j,k)-1000.0_rt;
48  pden(i,j,k)=rho(i,j,k);
49  });
50 //
51 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
52 // Compute vertical averaged density (rhoA) and density perturbation
53 // used (rhoS) in barotropic pressure gradient.
54 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
55 //
56  amrex::ParallelFor(phi_bxD,
57  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
58  {
59  Real cff1=rho(i,j,N-1)*Hz(i,j,N);
60  rhoS(i,j,0)=0.5_rt*cff1*Hz(i,j,N);
61  rhoA(i,j,0)=cff1;
62  });
63  amrex::ParallelFor(phi_bx,
64  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
65  {
66  if(k!=0) {
67  Real cff1=rho(i,j,N-k)*Hz(i,j,N-k);
68  rhoS(i,j,0)=rhoS(i,j,0)+Hz(i,j,N-k)*(rhoA(i,j,0)+0.5_rt*cff1);
69  rhoA(i,j,0)=rhoA(i,j,0)+cff1;
70  }
71  });
72  amrex::ParallelFor(phi_bxD,
73  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
74  {
75  Real cff2=1.0_rt/rho0;
76  Real cff1=1.0_rt/(z_w(i,j,N)-z_w(i,j,0));
77  rhoA(i,j,0)=cff2*cff1*rhoA(i,j,0);
78  rhoS(i,j,0)=2.0_rt*cff1*cff1*cff2*rhoS(i,j,0);
79  });
80 
81 }

◆ rhs_2d()

void ROMSX::rhs_2d ( const amrex::Box &  bx,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  uold,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  vold,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  ru,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  rv,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  Huon,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  Hvom,
int  nrhs,
int  N 
)
23 {
24  //copy the tilebox
25  Box gbx1 = bx;
26  Box gbx2 = bx;
27 
28  Box ubx = surroundingNodes(bx,0);
29  Box vbx = surroundingNodes(bx,1);
30 
31  //make only gbx be grown to match multifabs
32  gbx2.grow(IntVect(NGROW,NGROW,0));
33  gbx1.grow(IntVect(NGROW-1,NGROW-1,0));
34 
35  //
36  // Scratch space
37  //
38  FArrayBox fab_Huee(gbx2,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena()); //fab_Huee.setVal(0.0);
39  FArrayBox fab_uee(gbx2,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena()); //fab_uee.setVal(0.0);
40 
41  FArrayBox fab_Hvee(gbx2,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena()); //fab_Hvee.setVal(0.0);
42  FArrayBox fab_vee(gbx2,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena()); //fab_vee.setVal(0.0);
43 
44  FArrayBox fab_Hvxx(gbx2,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena()); //fab_Hvxx.setVal(0.0);
45  FArrayBox fab_uxx(gbx2,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena()); //fab_uxx.setVal(0.0);
46 
47  FArrayBox fab_Huxx(gbx2,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena()); //fab_Huxx.setVal(0.0);
48  FArrayBox fab_vxx(gbx2,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena()); //fab_vxx.setVal(0.0);
49 
50  FArrayBox fab_UFx(gbx2,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena()); //fab_UFx.setVal(0.0);
51  FArrayBox fab_UFe(gbx2,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena()); //fab_UFe.setVal(0.0);
52  FArrayBox fab_VFx(gbx2,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena()); //fab_VFx.setVal(0.0);
53  FArrayBox fab_VFe(gbx2,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena()); //fab_VFe.setVal(0.0);
54 
55  auto Huxx=fab_Huxx.array();
56  auto Hvxx=fab_Hvxx.array();
57  auto Huee=fab_Huee.array();
58  auto Hvee=fab_Hvee.array();
59  auto uxx=fab_uxx.array();
60  auto uee=fab_uee.array();
61  auto vxx=fab_vxx.array();
62  auto vee=fab_vee.array();
63  auto UFx=fab_UFx.array();
64  auto UFe=fab_UFe.array();
65  auto VFx=fab_VFx.array();
66  auto VFe=fab_VFe.array();
67 
68  //check this////////////
69  const Real Gadv = 1.0;
70  //uxx, uold AKA grad, ubar
71  //Huxx, Huon AKA Dgrad, Duon
72  //nrhs AKA krhs
73  amrex::ParallelFor(gbx2,
74  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
75  {
76  Huee(i,j,k)=0.0;
77  uee(i,j,k)=0.0;
78  Hvee(i,j,k)=0.0;
79  vee(i,j,k)=0.0;
80 
81  Huxx(i,j,k)=0.0;
82  uxx(i,j,k)=0.0;
83  Hvxx(i,j,k)=0.0;
84  vxx(i,j,k)=0.0;
85 
86  UFx(i,j,k)=0.0;
87  UFe(i,j,k)=0.0;
88  VFx(i,j,k)=0.0;
89  VFe(i,j,k)=0.0;
90  });
91 
92  amrex::ParallelFor(gbx1,
93  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
94  {
95  //should not include grow cells
96  uxx(i,j,k)=uold(i-1,j,k,nrhs)-2.0*uold(i,j,k,nrhs)+uold(i+1,j,k,nrhs);
97 
98  //neglecting terms about periodicity since testing only periodic for now
99  Huxx(i,j,k)=Huon(i-1,j,k)-2.0*Huon(i,j,k)+Huon(i+1,j,k);
100  });
101  amrex::ParallelFor(gbx1,
102  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
103  {
104  Real cff=1.0/6.0;
105  Real cff1=uold(i ,j,k,nrhs)+uold(i+1,j,k,nrhs);
106 
107  Real cff3=uxx(i,j,k)+uxx(i+1,j,k);
108 
109  UFx(i,j,k)=0.25*(cff1-cff*cff3) * (Huon(i,j,k)+ Huon(i+1,j,k)-cff*(Huxx(i,j,k)+ Huxx(i+1,j,k)));
110 
111  //should not include grow cells
112  uee(i,j,k)=uold(i,j-1,k,nrhs)-2.0*uold(i,j,k,nrhs)+uold(i,j+1,k,nrhs);
113  });
114 
115  amrex::ParallelFor(gbx1,
116  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
117  {
118  /////////////MIGHT NEED NEW LOOP HERE
119  //neglecting terms about periodicity since testing only periodic for now
120  Hvxx(i,j,k)=Hvom(i-1,j,k)-2.0*Hvom(i,j,k)+Hvom(i+1,j,k);
121  });
122 
123  amrex::ParallelFor(gbx1,
124  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
125  {
126  Real cff=1.0/6.0;
127  Real cff1=uold(i,j ,k,nrhs)+uold(i,j-1,k,nrhs);
128  Real cff2=Hvom(i,j,k)+Hvom(i-1,j,k);
129  Real cff3=uee(i,j-1,k)+uee(i,j,k);
130 
131  UFe(i,j,k)=0.25*(cff1-cff3*cff)*
132  (cff2-cff*(Hvxx(i ,j,k)+Hvxx(i-1,j,k)));
133 
134  vxx(i,j,k)=vold(i-1,j,k,nrhs)-2.0*vold(i,j,k,nrhs)+
135  vold(i+1,j,k,nrhs);
136  //neglecting terms about periodicity since testing only periodic for now
137  Huee(i,j,k)=Huon(i,j-1,k)-2.0*Huon(i,j,k)+Huon(i,j+1,k);
138  cff1=vold(i ,j,k,nrhs)+vold(i-1,j,k,nrhs);
139  cff2=Huon(i,j,k)+Huon(i,j-1,k);
140  cff3=vxx(i-1,j,k)+vxx(i,j,k);
141 
142  VFx(i,j,k)=0.25*(cff1-cff3*cff)* (cff2-cff*(Huee(i,j,k)+ Huee(i,j-1,k)));
143  vee(i,j,k)=vold(i,j-1,k,nrhs)-2.0*vold(i,j,k,nrhs)+
144  vold(i,j+1,k,nrhs);
145  Hvee(i,j,k)=Hvom(i,j-1,k)-2.0*Hvom(i,j,k)+Hvom(i,j+1,k);
146  });
147 
148  amrex::ParallelFor(gbx1,
149  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
150  {
151  //neglecting terms about periodicity since testing only periodic for now
152  Real cff=1.0/6.0;
153  Real cff1=vold(i,j ,k,nrhs)+vold(i,j+1,k,nrhs);
154  Real cff3=vee(i,j,k)+vee(i,j+1,k);
155 
156  VFe(i,j,k) = 0.25 * (cff1-cff3*cff) * (Hvom(i,j ,k)+ Hvom(i,j+1,k) -
157  cff * (Hvee(i,j ,k)+ Hvee(i,j+1,k)));
158  });
159 
160  amrex::ParallelFor(gbx1,
161  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
162  {
163  //
164  // Add in horizontal advection.
165  //
166  Real cff1=UFx(i,j ,k)-UFx(i-1,j,k);
167  Real cff2=UFe(i,j+1,k)-UFe(i ,j,k);
168  Real cff=cff1+cff2;
169  //passing in rhs_ubar so need 0 index here
170  ru(i,j,k) -= cff;
171 
172  cff1=VFx(i+1,j,k)-VFx(i ,j,k);
173  cff2=VFe(i ,j,k)-VFe(i,j-1,k);
174  cff=cff1+cff2;
175  //passing in rhs_vbar so need 0 index here
176  rv(i,j,k) -= cff;
177  });
178 
179 }

◆ rhs_3d()

void ROMSX::rhs_3d ( const amrex::Box &  bx,
const amrex::Box &  gbx,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  uold,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  vold,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  ru,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  rv,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  rufrc,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  rvfrc,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  sustr,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  svstr,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  bustr,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  bvstr,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  Huon,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  Hvom,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  on_u,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  om_v,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  om_u,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  on_v,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  W,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  FC,
int  nrhs,
int  N 
)

Calculation of the RHS

22 {
23  if (verbose >= 2) {
24  amrex::PrintToFile("ru_begin_rhs3d").SetPrecision(18)<<FArrayBox(ru)<<std::endl;
25  amrex::PrintToFile("rv_begin_rhs3d").SetPrecision(18)<<FArrayBox(rv)<<std::endl;
26  amrex::PrintToFile("rufrc_begin_rhs3d").SetPrecision(18)<<FArrayBox(rufrc)<<std::endl;
27  amrex::PrintToFile("rvfrc_begin_rhs3d").SetPrecision(18)<<FArrayBox(rvfrc)<<std::endl;
28  }
29  //copy the tilebox
30  Box tbxp1 = bx;
31  Box tbxp2 = bx;
32  //make only gbx be grown to match multifabs
33  tbxp1.grow(IntVect(NGROW-1,NGROW-1,0));
34  tbxp2.grow(IntVect(NGROW,NGROW,0));
35 
36  BoxArray ba_gbx1 = intersect(BoxArray(tbxp1), gbx);
37  AMREX_ASSERT((ba_gbx1.size() == 1));
38  Box gbx1 = ba_gbx1[0];
39 
40  BoxArray ba_gbx2 = intersect(BoxArray(tbxp2), gbx);
41  AMREX_ASSERT((ba_gbx2.size() == 1));
42  Box gbx2 = ba_gbx2[0];
43 
44  Box ubx = surroundingNodes(bx,0);
45  Box vbx = surroundingNodes(bx,1);
46 
47 
48  Box bxD = bx;
49  bxD.makeSlab(2,0);
50  Box gbx1D = gbx1;
51  gbx1D.makeSlab(2,0);
52 
53  //
54  // Scratch space
55  //
56  FArrayBox fab_Huee(tbxp2,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena()); //fab_Huee.setVal(0.0);
57  FArrayBox fab_uee(tbxp2,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena()); //fab_uee.setVal(0.0);
58 
59  FArrayBox fab_Hvee(tbxp2,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena()); //fab_Hvee.setVal(0.0);
60  FArrayBox fab_vee(tbxp2,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena()); //fab_vee.setVal(0.0);
61 
62  FArrayBox fab_Hvxx(tbxp2,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena()); //fab_Hvxx.setVal(0.0);
63  FArrayBox fab_uxx(tbxp2,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena()); //fab_uxx.setVal(0.0);
64 
65  FArrayBox fab_Huxx(tbxp2,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena()); //fab_Huxx.setVal(0.0);
66  FArrayBox fab_vxx(tbxp2,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena()); //fab_vxx.setVal(0.0);
67 
68  FArrayBox fab_UFx(tbxp2,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena()); //fab_UFx.setVal(0.0);
69  FArrayBox fab_UFe(tbxp2,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena()); //fab_UFe.setVal(0.0);
70  FArrayBox fab_VFx(tbxp2,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena()); //fab_VFx.setVal(0.0);
71  FArrayBox fab_VFe(tbxp2,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena()); //fab_VFe.setVal(0.0);
72 
73  auto Huxx=fab_Huxx.array();
74  auto Hvxx=fab_Hvxx.array();
75  auto Huee=fab_Huee.array();
76  auto Hvee=fab_Hvee.array();
77  auto uxx=fab_uxx.array();
78  auto uee=fab_uee.array();
79  auto vxx=fab_vxx.array();
80  auto vee=fab_vee.array();
81  auto UFx=fab_UFx.array();
82  auto UFe=fab_UFe.array();
83  auto VFx=fab_VFx.array();
84  auto VFe=fab_VFe.array();
85 
86  //check this////////////
87  const Real Gadv = -0.25;
88 
89  amrex::ParallelFor(tbxp2,
90  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
91  {
92  Huee(i,j,k)=0.0;
93  uee(i,j,k)=0.0;
94  Hvee(i,j,k)=0.0;
95  vee(i,j,k)=0.0;
96 
97  Huxx(i,j,k)=0.0;
98  uxx(i,j,k)=0.0;
99  Hvxx(i,j,k)=0.0;
100  vxx(i,j,k)=0.0;
101 
102  UFx(i,j,k)=0.0;
103  UFe(i,j,k)=0.0;
104  VFx(i,j,k)=0.0;
105  VFe(i,j,k)=0.0;
106  });
107 
108  amrex::ParallelFor(tbxp1,
109  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
110  {
111  //should not include grow cells
112  uxx(i,j,k)=uold(i-1,j,k,nrhs)-2.0*uold(i,j,k,nrhs)+uold(i+1,j,k,nrhs);
113 
114  //neglecting terms about periodicity since testing only periodic for now
115  Huxx(i,j,k)=Huon(i-1,j,k)-2.0*Huon(i,j,k)+Huon(i+1,j,k);
116  });
117 
118  amrex::ParallelFor(tbxp1,
119  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
120  {
121  Real cff;
122  Real cff1=uold(i ,j,k,nrhs)+uold(i+1,j,k,nrhs);
123 
124  if (cff1 > 0.0) {
125  cff=uxx(i,j,k);
126  } else {
127  cff=uxx(i+1,j,k);
128  }
129 
130  UFx(i,j,k)=0.25*(cff1+Gadv*cff) * (Huon(i,j,k)+ Huon(i+1,j,k)+
131  Gadv*0.5*(Huxx(i,j,k)+ Huxx(i+1,j,k)));
132 
133  //should not include grow cells
134  uee(i,j,k)=uold(i,j-1,k,nrhs)-2.0*uold(i,j,k,nrhs)+uold(i,j+1,k,nrhs);
135  });
136 
137  amrex::ParallelFor(tbxp1,
138  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
139  {
140  /////////////MIGHT NEED NEW LOOP HERE
141  //neglecting terms about periodicity since testing only periodic for now
142  Hvxx(i,j,k)=Hvom(i-1,j,k)-2.0*Hvom(i,j,k)+Hvom(i+1,j,k);
143  });
144 
145  amrex::ParallelFor(tbxp1,
146  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
147  {
148  Real cff;
149  Real cff1=uold(i,j ,k,nrhs)+uold(i,j-1,k,nrhs);
150  Real cff2=Hvom(i,j,k)+Hvom(i-1,j,k);
151  if (cff2>0.0) {
152  cff=uee(i,j-1,k);
153  } else {
154  cff=uee(i,j,k);
155  }
156 
157  UFe(i,j,k)=0.25*(cff1+Gadv*cff)*
158  (cff2+Gadv*0.5*(Hvxx(i ,j,k)+Hvxx(i-1,j,k)));
159 
160  vxx(i,j,k)=vold(i-1,j,k,nrhs)-2.0*vold(i,j,k,nrhs)+
161  vold(i+1,j,k,nrhs);
162  //neglecting terms about periodicity since testing only periodic for now
163  Huee(i,j,k)=Huon(i,j-1,k)-2.0*Huon(i,j,k)+Huon(i,j+1,k);
164  cff1=vold(i ,j,k,nrhs)+vold(i-1,j,k,nrhs);
165  cff2=Huon(i,j,k)+Huon(i,j-1,k);
166  if (cff2>0.0) {
167  cff=vxx(i-1,j,k);
168  } else {
169  cff=vxx(i,j,k);
170  }
171  VFx(i,j,k)=0.25*(cff1+Gadv*cff)* (cff2+Gadv*0.5*(Huee(i,j,k)+ Huee(i,j-1,k)));
172  vee(i,j,k)=vold(i,j-1,k,nrhs)-2.0*vold(i,j,k,nrhs)+
173  vold(i,j+1,k,nrhs);
174  Hvee(i,j,k)=Hvom(i,j-1,k)-2.0*Hvom(i,j,k)+Hvom(i,j+1,k);
175  });
176 
177  amrex::ParallelFor(tbxp1,
178  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
179  {
180  //neglecting terms about periodicity since testing only periodic for now
181  Real cff;
182  Real cff1=vold(i,j ,k,nrhs)+vold(i,j+1,k,nrhs);
183  if (cff1>0.0) {
184  cff=vee(i,j,k);
185  } else {
186  cff=vee(i,j+1,k);
187  }
188 
189  VFe(i,j,k) = 0.25 * (cff1+Gadv*cff) * (Hvom(i,j ,k)+ Hvom(i,j+1,k) +
190  0.5 * Gadv * (Hvee(i,j ,k)+ Hvee(i,j+1,k)));
191  });
192  //This uses W being an extra grow cell sized
193  amrex::ParallelFor(gbx1,
194  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
195  {
196  //
197  // Add in horizontal advection.
198  //
199 
200  Real cff1=UFx(i,j ,k)-UFx(i-1,j,k);
201  Real cff2=UFe(i,j+1,k)-UFe(i ,j,k);
202  Real cff=cff1+cff2;
203 
204  ru(i,j,k,nrhs) -= cff;
205 
206  cff1=VFx(i+1,j,k)-VFx(i ,j,k);
207  cff2=VFe(i ,j,k)-VFe(i,j-1,k);
208  cff=cff1+cff2;
209  rv(i,j,k,nrhs) -= cff;
210 
211  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
212  // Add in vertical advection.
213  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
214  cff1=9.0/16.0;
215  cff2=1.0/16.0;
216  // if(i>=0)
217  if (k>=1 && k<=N-2)
218  {
219  FC(i,j,k)=( cff1*(uold(i ,j,k ,nrhs)+ uold(i,j,k+1,nrhs))
220  -cff2*(uold(i ,j,k-1,nrhs)+ uold(i,j,k+2,nrhs)) )*
221  ( cff1*( W(i ,j,k)+ W(i-1,j,k))
222  -cff2*( W(i+1,j,k)+ W(i-2,j,k)) );
223  }
224  else // this needs to be split up so that the following can be concurrent
225  {
226  FC(i,j,N)=0.0;
227 
228  FC(i,j,N-1)=( cff1*(uold(i ,j,N-1,nrhs)+ uold(i,j,N ,nrhs))
229  -cff2*(uold(i ,j,N-2,nrhs)+ uold(i,j,N ,nrhs)) )*
230  ( cff1*( W(i ,j,N-1)+ W(i-1,j,N-1))
231  -cff2*( W(i+1,j,N-1)+ W(i-2,j,N-1)) );
232 
233  FC(i,j,0)=( cff1*(uold(i ,j,1,nrhs)+ uold(i,j,2,nrhs))
234  -cff2*(uold(i ,j,1,nrhs)+ uold(i,j,3,nrhs)) )*
235  ( cff1*( W(i ,j,1)+ W(i-1,j,1))
236  -cff2*( W(i+1,j,1)+ W(i-2,j,1)) );
237 
238  // FC(i,0,-1)=0.0;
239  }
240 
241  if(k-1>=0) {
242  cff=FC(i,j,k)-FC(i,j,k-1);
243  } else {
244  cff=FC(i,j,k);
245  }
246 
247  ru(i,j,k,nrhs) -= cff;
248 
249  if (k>=1 && k<=N-2)
250  {
251  FC(i,j,k)=( cff1*(vold(i,j,k ,nrhs)+ vold(i,j,k+1,nrhs))
252  -cff2*(vold(i,j,k-1,nrhs)+ vold(i,j,k+2,nrhs)) )*
253  ( cff1*(W(i,j ,k)+ W(i,j-1,k))
254  -cff2*(W(i,j+1,k)+ W(i,j-2,k)) );
255  }
256  else // this needs to be split up so that the following can be concurrent
257  {
258  FC(i,j,N)=0.0;
259  FC(i,j,N-1)=( cff1*(vold(i,j,N-1,nrhs)+ vold(i,j,N ,nrhs))
260  -cff2*(vold(i,j,N-2,nrhs)+ vold(i,j,N ,nrhs)) )*
261  ( cff1*(W(i,j ,N-1)+ W(i,j-1,N-1))
262  -cff2*(W(i,j+1,N-1)+ W(i,j-2,N-1)) );
263 
264  FC(i,j,0)=( cff1*(vold(i,j,1,nrhs)+ vold(i,j,2,nrhs))
265  -cff2*(vold(i,j,1,nrhs)+ vold(i,j,3,nrhs)) )*
266  ( cff1*(W(i,j ,1)+ W(i,j-1,1))
267  -cff2*(W(i,j+1,1)+ W(i,j-2,1)) );
268 
269  // FC(i,0,-1)=0.0;
270  }
271 
272  if(k-1>=0) {
273  cff=FC(i,j,k)-FC(i,j,k-1);
274  } else {
275  cff=FC(i,j,k);
276  }
277  rv(i,j,k,nrhs) -= cff;
278 
279  //Recursive summation:
280  rufrc(i,j,0)+=ru(i,j,k,nrhs);
281  rvfrc(i,j,0)+=rv(i,j,k,nrhs);
282 // This toggles whether to upate forcing terms on slabbed box or not. Slabbing it changes plotfile to machine precision
283 #if 1
284  //These forcing terms should possibly be updated on a slabbed box
285  cff=om_u(i,j,0)*on_u(i,j,0);
286  if(k==N) // this is consistent with update_vel_3d
287  cff1=sustr(i,j,0)*cff;
288  else
289  cff1=0.0;
290  if(k==0) //should this be k==-1?
291  cff2=-bustr(i,j,0)*cff;
292  else
293  cff2=0.0;
294  rufrc(i,j,0)+=cff1+cff2;
295 
296  //These forcing terms should possibly be updated on a slabbed box
297  cff=om_v(i,j,0)*on_v(i,j,0);
298  if(k==N) // this is consistent with update_vel_3d
299  cff1=svstr(i,j,0)*cff;
300  else
301  cff1=0.0;
302  if(k==0) //should this be k==-1?
303  cff2=-bvstr(i,j,0)*cff;
304  else
305  cff2=0.0;
306  rvfrc(i,j,0)+=cff1+cff2;
307 #else
308  });
309  amrex::ParallelFor(gbx1D,
310  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int )
311  {
312  Real cff=om_u(i,j,0)*on_u(i,j,0);
313  Real cff1=sustr(i,j,0)*cff;
314  Real cff2=-bustr(i,j,0)*cff;
315 
316  rufrc(i,j,0) += cff1+cff2;
317 
318  cff=om_v(i,j,0)*on_v(i,j,0);
319  cff1=svstr(i,j,0)*cff;
320  cff2=-bvstr(i,j,0)*cff;
321 
322  rvfrc(i,j,0)+=cff1+cff2;
323 #endif
324  });
325  if (verbose >= 2) {
326  amrex::PrintToFile("rufrc_rhs3d").SetPrecision(18)<<FArrayBox(rufrc)<<std::endl;
327  amrex::PrintToFile("rvfrc_rhs3d").SetPrecision(18)<<FArrayBox(rvfrc)<<std::endl;
328  amrex::PrintToFile("sustr_rhs3d").SetPrecision(18)<<FArrayBox(sustr)<<std::endl;
329  amrex::PrintToFile("svstr_rhs3d").SetPrecision(18)<<FArrayBox(svstr)<<std::endl;
330  amrex::PrintToFile("bustr_rhs3d").SetPrecision(18)<<FArrayBox(bustr)<<std::endl;
331  amrex::PrintToFile("bvstr_rhs3d").SetPrecision(18)<<FArrayBox(bvstr)<<std::endl;
332  amrex::PrintToFile("ru_rhs3d").SetPrecision(18)<<FArrayBox(ru)<<std::endl;
333  amrex::PrintToFile("rv_rhs3d").SetPrecision(18)<<FArrayBox(rv)<<std::endl;
334  }
335 }

◆ rhs_t_3d()

void ROMSX::rhs_t_3d ( const amrex::Box &  bx,
const amrex::Box &  gbx,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  told,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  t,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  tempstore,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  Huon,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  Hvom,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  Hz,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  oHz,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  pn,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  pm,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  W,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  FC,
int  nrhs,
int  nnew,
int  N,
const amrex::Real  dt_lev 
)
18 {
19  //copy the tilebox
20  Box tbxp1 = bx;
21  Box tbxp2 = bx;
22 
23  Box ubx = surroundingNodes(bx,0);
24  Box vbx = surroundingNodes(bx,1);
25 
26  //make only gbx be grown to match multifabs
27  tbxp2.grow(IntVect(NGROW,NGROW,0));
28  tbxp1.grow(IntVect(NGROW-1,NGROW-1,0));
29 
30  BoxArray ba_gbx1 = intersect(BoxArray(tbxp1),gbx);
31  AMREX_ASSERT((ba_gbx1.size() == 1));
32  Box gbx1 = ba_gbx1[0];
33 
34  BoxArray ba_gbx2 = intersect(BoxArray(tbxp2),gbx);
35  AMREX_ASSERT((ba_gbx2.size() == 1));
36  Box gbx2 = ba_gbx2[0];
37 
38  //
39  // Scratch space
40  //
41  FArrayBox fab_grad(tbxp2,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena()); //fab_grad.setVal(0.0);
42  FArrayBox fab_uee(tbxp2,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena()); //fab_uee.setVal(0.0);
43 
44  FArrayBox fab_uxx(tbxp2,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena()); //fab_uxx.setVal(0.0);
45 
46  FArrayBox fab_curv(tbxp2,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena()); //fab_curv.setVal(0.0);
47 
48  FArrayBox fab_FX(tbxp2,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena()); //fab_FX.setVal(0.0);
49  FArrayBox fab_FE(tbxp2,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena()); //fab_FE.setVal(0.0);
50 
51  auto curv=fab_curv.array();
52  auto grad=fab_grad.array();
53  auto uxx=fab_uxx.array();
54  auto uee=fab_uee.array();
55  auto FX=fab_FX.array();
56  auto FE=fab_FE.array();
57 
58  //check this////////////
59  const Real Gadv = -0.25;
60 
61  amrex::ParallelFor(tbxp2,
62  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
63  {
64  grad(i,j,k)=0.0;
65  uee(i,j,k)=0.0;
66 
67  curv(i,j,k)=0.0;
68  uxx(i,j,k)=0.0;
69 
70  FX(i,j,k)=0.0;
71  FE(i,j,k)=0.0;
72  });
73  amrex::ParallelFor(bx,
74  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
75  {
76  oHz(i,j,k) = 1.0/ Hz(i,j,k);
77  });
78 
79  amrex::ParallelFor(tbxp1,
80  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
81  {
82  //should be t index 3
83  FX(i,j,k)=tempstore(i,j,k,nrhs)-tempstore(i-1,j,k,nrhs);
84  });
85  Real cffa=1.0/6.0;
86  Real cffb=1.0/3.0;
87  if (solverChoice.Hadv_scheme == AdvectionScheme::upstream3) {
88  amrex::ParallelFor(tbxp1,
89  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
90  {
91  //Upstream3
92  curv(i,j,k)=-FX(i,j,k)+FX(i+1,j,k);
93  });
94  //HACK to avoid using the wrong index of t (using upstream3)
95  Real max_Huon=FArrayBox(Huon).max<RunOn::Device>();
96  Real min_Huon=FArrayBox(Huon).min<RunOn::Device>();
97  amrex::ParallelFor(tbxp1,
98  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
99  {
100  FX(i,j,k)=Huon(i,j,k)*0.5*(tempstore(i,j,k)+tempstore(i-1,j,k))+
101  cffa*(curv(i,j,k)*min_Huon+ curv(i-1,j,k)*max_Huon);
102  });
103  }
104  else if (solverChoice.Hadv_scheme == AdvectionScheme::centered4) {
105  amrex::ParallelFor(tbxp1,
106  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
107  {
108  //Centered4
109  grad(i,j,k)=0.5*(FX(i,j,k)+FX(i+1,j,k));
110  });
111  amrex::ParallelFor(tbxp1,
112  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
113  {
114  FX(i,j,k)=Huon(i,j,k)*0.5*(tempstore(i,j,k)+tempstore(i-1,j,k))+
115  cffb*(grad(i,j,k)+ grad(i-1,j,k));
116  });
117  }
118  else {
119  Error("Not a valid horizontal advection scheme");
120  }
121  if (verbose >= 2)
122  PrintToFile("FX_set1").SetPrecision(18) << FArrayBox(FX) << std::endl;
123 
124  amrex::ParallelFor(tbxp1,
125  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
126  {
127  //should be t index 3
128  FE(i,j,k)=tempstore(i,j,k,nrhs)-tempstore(i,j-1,k,nrhs);
129  });
130 
131  cffa=1.0/6.0;
132  cffb=1.0/3.0;
133  if (solverChoice.Hadv_scheme == AdvectionScheme::upstream3) {
134  amrex::ParallelFor(tbxp1,
135  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
136  {
137  curv(i,j,k)=-FE(i,j,k)+FE(i,j+1,k);
138  });
139  //HACK to avoid using the wrong index of t (using upstream3)
140  Real max_Hvom=FArrayBox(Hvom).max<RunOn::Device>();
141  Real min_Hvom=FArrayBox(Hvom).min<RunOn::Device>();
142  amrex::ParallelFor(tbxp1,
143  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
144  {
145  FE(i,j,k)=Hvom(i,j,k)*0.5*(tempstore(i,j,k)+tempstore(i,j-1,k))+
146  cffa*(curv(i,j,k)*min_Hvom+ curv(i,j-1,k)*max_Hvom);
147  });
148  }
149  else if (solverChoice.Hadv_scheme == AdvectionScheme::centered4) {
150  amrex::ParallelFor(tbxp1,
151  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
152  {
153  grad(i,j,k)=0.5*(FE(i,j,k)+FE(i,j+1,k));
154  });
155  amrex::ParallelFor(tbxp1,
156  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
157  {
158  FE(i,j,k)=Hvom(i,j,k)*0.5*(tempstore(i,j,k)+tempstore(i,j-1,k))+
159  cffb*(grad(i,j,k)+ grad(i,j-1,k));
160  });
161  }
162  else {
163  Error("Not a valid horizontal advection scheme");
164  }
165 
166  amrex::ParallelFor(gbx1,
167  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
168  {
169  //
170  // Add in horizontal advection.
171  //
172  Real cff = dt_lev*pm(i,j,0)*pn(i,j,0);
173  Real cff1=cff*(FX(i+1,j,k)-FX(i,j,k));
174  Real cff2=cff*(FE(i,j+1,k)-FE(i,j,k));
175  Real cff3=cff1+cff2;
176 
177  t(i,j,k,nnew) -= cff3;
178  });
179 
180  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
181  // Time-step vertical advection term.
182  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
183  //Check which type of differences:
184  //
185  // Fourth-order, central differences vertical advective flux
186  // (Tunits m3/s).
187  //
188  amrex::ParallelFor(bx,
189  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
190  {
191  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
192  // Add in vertical advection.
193  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
194 
195  Real cff1=0.5;
196  Real cff2=7.0/12.0;
197  Real cff3=1.0/12.0;
198 
199  if (k>=1 && k<=N-2)
200  {
201  FC(i,j,k)=( cff2*(tempstore(i ,j,k )+ tempstore(i,j,k+1))
202  -cff3*(tempstore(i ,j,k-1)+ tempstore(i,j,k+2)) )*
203  ( W(i,j,k));
204  }
205  else // this needs to be split up so that the following can be concurrent
206  {
207  FC(i,j,N)=0.0;
208 
209  FC(i,j,N-1)=( cff2*tempstore(i ,j,N-1)+ cff1*tempstore(i,j,N )
210  -cff3*tempstore(i ,j,N-2) )*
211  ( W(i ,j,N-1));
212 
213  FC(i,j,0)=( cff2*tempstore(i ,j,1)+ cff1*tempstore(i,j,0)
214  -cff3*tempstore(i ,j,2) )*
215  ( W(i ,j,0));
216 
217  // FC(i,0,-1)=0.0;
218  }
219 
220  });
221  amrex::ParallelFor(bx,
222  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
223  {
224  Real cff1=dt_lev*pm(i,j,0)*pn(i,j,0);
225  Real cff4;
226  if(k-1>=0) {
227  cff4=FC(i,j,k)-FC(i,j,k-1);
228  } else {
229  cff4=FC(i,j,k);
230  }
231  t(i,j,k)=oHz(i,j,k)*(t(i,j,k)-cff1*cff4);
232  // if(i==2&&j==2&&k==2) {
233  // Print()<<i<<j<<k<<t(i,j,k)<<"\t"<<oHz(i,j,k)<<"\t"<<cff1<<"\t"<<cff4<<std::endl;
234  // Abort("any nans?");
235  //}
236  });
237 }
AdvectionScheme::upstream3
@ upstream3
AdvectionScheme::centered4
@ centered4
SolverChoice::Hadv_scheme
AdvectionScheme Hadv_scheme
Definition: DataStruct.H:319

◆ romsx_advance()

void ROMSX::romsx_advance ( int  level,
amrex::MultiFab &  cons_old,
amrex::MultiFab &  cons_new,
amrex::MultiFab &  xvel_old,
amrex::MultiFab &  yvel_old,
amrex::MultiFab &  zvel_old,
amrex::MultiFab &  xvel_new,
amrex::MultiFab &  yvel_new,
amrex::MultiFab &  zvel_new,
amrex::MultiFab &  source,
const amrex::Geometry  fine_geom,
const amrex::Real  dt,
const amrex::Real  time 
)

Interface for advancing the data at one level by one "slow" timestep

◆ set_2darrays()

void ROMSX::set_2darrays ( int  lev)
13 {
14  auto& lev_new = vars_new[lev];
15  auto& lev_old = vars_old[lev];
16  std::unique_ptr<MultiFab>& mf_x_r = vec_x_r[lev];
17  std::unique_ptr<MultiFab>& mf_y_r = vec_y_r[lev];
18  auto N = Geom(lev).Domain().size()[2]-1; // Number of vertical "levs" aka, NZ
19 
20  for ( MFIter mfi(*(mf_x_r), TilingIfNotGPU()); mfi.isValid(); ++mfi )
21  {
22 
23  Array4<Real> const& x_r = (mf_x_r)->array(mfi);
24  Array4<Real> const& y_r = (mf_y_r)->array(mfi);
25  const Box& bx = mfi.growntilebox();
26  const auto & geomdata = Geom(lev).data();
27  int ncomp = 1;
28  Gpu::synchronize();
29  amrex::ParallelFor(bx, ncomp,
30  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k, int n)
31  {
32  const auto prob_lo = geomdata.ProbLo();
33  const auto dx = geomdata.CellSize();
34 
35  x_r(i,j,0) = prob_lo[0] + (i + 0.5) * dx[0];
36  y_r(i,j,0) = prob_lo[1] + (j + 0.5) * dx[1];
37  // const Real z = prob_lo[2] + (k + 0.5) * dx[2];
38 
39  });
40  }
41  // x_r[lev]->FillBoundary(geom[lev].periodicity());
42  // y_r[lev]->FillBoundary(geom[lev].periodicity());
43 
44  MultiFab& U_old = vars_new[lev][Vars::xvel];
45  MultiFab& V_old = vars_new[lev][Vars::yvel];
46  MultiFab& W_old = vars_new[lev][Vars::zvel];
47  std::unique_ptr<MultiFab>& mf_ubar = vec_ubar[lev];
48  std::unique_ptr<MultiFab>& mf_vbar = vec_vbar[lev];
49  std::unique_ptr<MultiFab>& mf_Hz = vec_Hz[lev];
50  int nstp = 0;
51  int kstp = 0;
52  int knew = 0;
53  int ncomp = 1;
54  for ( MFIter mfi(U_old, TilingIfNotGPU()); mfi.isValid(); ++mfi )
55  {
56  Array4<Real> const& ubar = (mf_ubar)->array(mfi);
57  Array4<Real> const& vbar = (mf_vbar)->array(mfi);
58  Array4<Real> const& Hz = (mf_Hz)->array(mfi);
59  Array4<Real> const& u = (U_old).array(mfi);
60  Array4<Real> const& v = (V_old).array(mfi);
61 
62  Box bx = mfi.tilebox();
63  //copy the tilebox
64  Box gbx1 = bx;
65  Box gbx11 = bx;
66  Box gbx2 = bx;
67  //make only gbx be grown to match multifabs
68  gbx2.grow(IntVect(NGROW,NGROW,0));
69  gbx1.grow(IntVect(NGROW-1,NGROW-1,0));
70  gbx11.grow(IntVect(NGROW-1,NGROW-1,NGROW-1));
71  Box gbx1D = gbx1;
72  gbx1D.makeSlab(2,0);
73 
74  FArrayBox fab_DC(gbx11,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena());
75  FArrayBox fab_CF(gbx11,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena());
76  auto DC=fab_DC.array();
77  auto CF=fab_CF.array();
78 
79  //fab_DC.setVal(0.0);
80  //fab_CF.setVal(0.0);
81  amrex::ParallelFor(gbx11, ncomp,
82  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k, int n)
83  {
84  DC(i,j,k)=0.0;
85  CF(i,j,k)=0.0;
86  });
87  Gpu::streamSynchronize();
88  amrex::ParallelFor(gbx1D, ncomp,
89  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int , int )
90  {
91  for(int k=0; k<=N; k++) {
92  DC(i,j,k)=0.5*(Hz(i,j,k)+Hz(i-1,j,k));
93  DC(i,j,-1)=DC(i,j,-1)+DC(i,j,k);
94  CF(i,j,-1)=CF(i,j,-1)+DC(i,j,k)*u(i,j,k,nstp);
95  }
96  });
97  amrex::ParallelFor(gbx1,
98  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
99  {
100  Real cff1=1.0/DC(i,j,-1);
101  Real cff2=CF(i,j,-1)*cff1;
102  ubar(i,j,0,kstp)=cff2;
103  ubar(i,j,0,knew)=cff2;
104  });
105 
106  //fab_DC.setVal(0.0);
107  //fab_CF.setVal(0.0);
108  amrex::ParallelFor(gbx11, ncomp,
109  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k, int n)
110  {
111  DC(i,j,k)=0.0;
112  CF(i,j,k)=0.0;
113  });
114  Gpu::streamSynchronize();
115  amrex::ParallelFor(gbx1D,
116  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int )
117  {
118  for(int k=0; k<=N; k++) {
119  DC(i,j,k)=0.5*(Hz(i,j,k)+Hz(i,j-1,k));
120  DC(i,j,-1)=DC(i,j,-1)+DC(i,j,k);
121  CF(i,j,-1)=CF(i,j,-1)+DC(i,j,k)*v(i,j,k,nstp);
122  }
123  });
124  amrex::ParallelFor(gbx1,
125  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
126  {
127  Real cff1=1.0/DC(i,j,-1);
128  Real cff2=CF(i,j,-1)*cff1;
129  vbar(i,j,0,kstp)=cff2;
130  vbar(i,j,0,knew)=cff2;
131  });
132  }
133  vec_ubar[lev]->FillBoundary(geom[lev].periodicity());
134  vec_vbar[lev]->FillBoundary(geom[lev].periodicity());
135 }

◆ set_depth()

void ROMSX::set_depth ( int  lev)
205 {
206  auto& lev_new = vars_new[lev];
207  auto& lev_old = vars_old[lev];
208  std::unique_ptr<MultiFab>& mf_z_w = vec_z_w[lev];
209  std::unique_ptr<MultiFab>& mf_z_r = vec_z_r[lev];
210  std::unique_ptr<MultiFab>& mf_s_r = vec_s_r[lev];
211  std::unique_ptr<MultiFab>& mf_Hz = vec_Hz[lev];
212  std::unique_ptr<MultiFab>& mf_h = vec_hOfTheConfusingName[lev];
213  mf_h->setVal(geom[lev].ProbHi(2));
214  Real depth = geom[lev].ProbHi(2);
215  const int Lm = Geom(lev).Domain().size()[0];
216  const int Mm = Geom(lev).Domain().size()[1];
217  std::unique_ptr<MultiFab>& mf_Zt_avg1 = vec_Zt_avg1[lev];
218  mf_Zt_avg1->setVal(0.0);
219  auto N_loop = Geom(lev).Domain().size()[2]-1; // Number of vertical "levs" aka, NZ
220 
221  for ( MFIter mfi(lev_new[Vars::cons], TilingIfNotGPU()); mfi.isValid(); ++mfi )
222  {
223 
224  Array4<Real> const& z_w = (mf_z_w)->array(mfi);
225  Array4<Real> const& z_r = (mf_z_r)->array(mfi);
226  Array4<Real> const& s_r = (mf_s_r)->array(mfi);
227  Array4<Real> const& Hz = (mf_Hz)->array(mfi);
228  Box bx = mfi.tilebox();
229  Box gbx2 = bx;
230  gbx2.grow(IntVect(NGROW,NGROW,0));
231  Box gbx21 = bx;
232  gbx21.grow(IntVect(NGROW,NGROW,NGROW-1));
233  Box gbx22 = bx;
234  gbx22.grow(IntVect(NGROW,NGROW,NGROW));
235  Box gbx2D = gbx2;
236  gbx2D.makeSlab(2,0);
237 
238  Array4<Real> const& h = (mf_h)->array(mfi);
239  Array4<Real> const& Zt_avg1 = (mf_Zt_avg1)->array(mfi);
240  const auto & geomdata = Geom(lev).data();
241 
242  int ncomp = 1;
243  Box subdomain;
244  if (lev == 0) {
245  subdomain = geom[lev].Domain();
246  } else {
247  amrex::Abort("Geometry information needs to be updated for multilevel");
248  }
249 
250  int nx = subdomain.length(0);
251  int ny = subdomain.length(1);
252  int nz = subdomain.length(2);
253 
254  auto N = nz; // Number of vertical "levels" aka, NZ
255  //forcing tcline to be the same as probhi for now, one in DataStruct.H other in inputs
256  Real hc=-min(geomdata.ProbHi(2),-solverChoice.tcline); // Do we need to enforce min here?
257  bool NSPeriodic = geomdata.isPeriodic(1);
258  bool EWPeriodic = geomdata.isPeriodic(0);
259  const auto local_theta_s = solverChoice.theta_s;
260  const auto local_theta_b = solverChoice.theta_b;
261 
262  if(!solverChoice.flat_bathymetry) {
263  Gpu::streamSynchronize();
264  amrex::ParallelFor(gbx2, ncomp,
265  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k, int n)
266  {
267  Real val1, val2;
268  int iFort = i+1;
269  int jFort = j+1;
270  if(NSPeriodic) {
271  if (iFort<=Lm/2.0)
272  val1=iFort;
273  else
274  val1=Lm+1-iFort;
275  val2=min(-geomdata.ProbLo(2),(84.5+66.526*std::tanh((val1-10.0)/7.0)));
276  h(i,j,0) = val2;
277  }
278  else if(EWPeriodic) {
279  if (jFort<=Mm/2.0)
280  val1=jFort;
281  else
282  val1=Mm+1-jFort;
283  val2=min(-geomdata.ProbLo(2),(84.5+66.526*std::tanh((val1-10.0)/7.0)));
284  h(i,j,0) = val2;
285  }
286  z_w(i,j,k) = h(i,j,0);
287  });
288  } else {
289  Gpu::streamSynchronize();
290  amrex::ParallelFor(gbx2, ncomp,
291  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k, int n)
292  {
293  h(i,j,0) = -geomdata.ProbLo(2);
294  z_w(i,j,k) = h(i,j,0);
295  });
296  }
297 
298  // ROMS Transform 2
299  Gpu::streamSynchronize();
300  amrex::ParallelFor(gbx2D, ncomp,
301  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int , int )
302  {
303  for(int k=0; k<=N_loop; k++) {
304  // const Real z = prob_lo[2] + (k + 0.5) * dx[2];
305  const auto prob_lo = geomdata.ProbLo();
306  const auto dx = geomdata.CellSize();
307  //This is the z for the bottom of the cell this k corresponds to
308  // if we weren't stretching and transforming
309  const Real z = prob_lo[2] + (k) * dx[2];
310  // h(i,j,0) = -prob_lo[2]; // conceptually
311 
312  ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
313  //ROMS Stretching 4
314  // Move this block to it's own function for maintainability if needed
315  // Information about the problem dimension would need to be added
316  // This file would need a k dependent function to return the
317  // stretching scalars, or access to 4 vectors of length prob_length(2)
318  /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
319  Real ds = 1.0_rt / Real(N);
320 
321  Real cff_r, cff_w, cff1_r, cff1_w, cff2_r, cff2_w, Csur, Cbot;
322  Real sc_r,sc_w,Cs_r,Cs_w;
323 
324  if(k==N) // end of array // pretend we're storing 0?
325  {
326  sc_w=0.0; //sc_w / hc
327  Cs_w=0.0; //Cs_w
328  }
329  else if (k==0) // beginning of array
330  {
331  sc_w=-1.0; //sc_w / hc
332  Cs_w=-1.0; //Cs_w
333  }
334  else
335  {
336  sc_w=ds*(k-N);
337  if (local_theta_s > 0.0_rt)
338  Csur=(1.0_rt-std::cosh(local_theta_s*sc_w))/
339  (std::cosh(local_theta_s)-1.0_rt);
340  else
341  Csur=-sc_w*sc_w;
342  if (local_theta_b > 0.0_rt)
343  {
344  Cbot=(std::exp(local_theta_b*Csur)-1.0_rt)/
345  (1.0_rt-std::exp(-local_theta_b));
346  Cs_w=Cbot;
347  }
348  else
349  Cs_w=Csur;
350  }
351 
352  cff_w=hc*sc_w;
353  cff1_w=Cs_w;
354 
355  //cff_r => sc_r *hc
356  //cff1_r => Cs_r
357  //Don't do anything special for first/last index
358  {
359  sc_r=ds*(k-N+0.5_rt);
360  if (local_theta_s > 0.0_rt)
361  Csur=(1.0_rt-std::cosh(local_theta_s*sc_r))/
362  (std::cosh(local_theta_s)-1.0_rt);
363  else
364  Csur=-sc_r*sc_r;
365  if (local_theta_b > 0.0_rt)
366  {
367  Cbot=(std::exp(local_theta_b*Csur)-1.0_rt)/
368  (1.0_rt-std::exp(-local_theta_b));
369  Cs_r=Cbot;
370  }
371  else
372  Cs_r=Csur;
373  }
374  if(i==0&&j==0&&k<N&&k>=0)
375  s_r(0,0,k) = sc_r;
376  cff_r=hc*sc_r;
377  cff1_r=Cs_r;
378 
379  ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
380  Real hwater=h(i,j,0);
381  /*
382  if(k==0)
383  {
384  //extra guess added (maybe not actually defined in ROMS)
385  Real hinv=1.0_rt/(hc+hwater);
386  cff2_r=(cff_r+cff1_r*hwater)*hinv;
387  // z_w(i,j,k-2) = hwater;
388  // z_w(i,j,k-1)= -hwater;
389 
390  z_r(i,j,k) = Zt_avg1(i,j,0)+(Zt_avg1(i,j,0)+hwater)*cff2_r;
391  Hz(i,j,k)=z_w(i,j,k)+hwater;//-z_w(i,j,k-1);
392  }
393  else
394  */
395  {
396  //Note, we are not supporting ICESHELF flag
397  Real hinv=1.0_rt/(hc+hwater);
398  cff2_r=(cff_r+cff1_r*hwater)*hinv;
399  cff2_w=(cff_w+cff1_w*hwater)*hinv;
400 
401  if(k==0) {
402  z_w(i,j,N-1)=0.0;
403  }
404  else
405  z_w(i,j,k-1)=Zt_avg1(i,j,0)+(Zt_avg1(i,j,0)+hwater)*cff2_w;
406  z_r(i,j,k)=Zt_avg1(i,j,0)+(Zt_avg1(i,j,0)+hwater)*cff2_r;
407  }
408  }
409  });
410  Gpu::streamSynchronize();
411  amrex::ParallelFor(gbx2D, ncomp,
412  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int , int )
413  {
414  for(int k=0; k<=N_loop; k++) {
415  if(k==0) {
416  Hz(i,j,k)=z_w(i,j,k)+h(i,j,0);
417  }
418  else
419  Hz(i,j,k)=z_w(i,j,k)-z_w(i,j,k-1);
420  }
421  //Note, we are not supporting ICESHELF flag
422  });
423  } // mf
424 
425  vec_z_w[lev]->FillBoundary(geom[lev].periodicity());
426  vec_z_r[lev]->FillBoundary(geom[lev].periodicity());
427  vec_s_r[lev]->FillBoundary(geom[lev].periodicity());
428  vec_Hz[lev]->FillBoundary(geom[lev].periodicity());
429  vec_hOfTheConfusingName[lev]->FillBoundary(geom[lev].periodicity());
430  vec_Zt_avg1[lev]->FillBoundary(geom[lev].periodicity());
431 
432 }
Coord::z
@ z
SolverChoice::flat_bathymetry
bool flat_bathymetry
Definition: DataStruct.H:312
SolverChoice::theta_b
amrex::Real theta_b
Definition: DataStruct.H:325
SolverChoice::theta_s
amrex::Real theta_s
Definition: DataStruct.H:324
SolverChoice::tcline
amrex::Real tcline
Definition: DataStruct.H:326

◆ set_drag()

void ROMSX::set_drag ( int  lev)

Set drag coefficients

470  {
471  std::unique_ptr<MultiFab>& mf_rdrag = vec_rdrag[lev];
472  std::unique_ptr<MultiFab>& mf_hOfTheConfusingName = vec_hOfTheConfusingName[lev];
473 
474  for ( MFIter mfi(*(mf_rdrag), TilingIfNotGPU()); mfi.isValid(); ++mfi )
475  {
476  Array4<Real> const& rdrag = (mf_rdrag)->array(mfi);
477  Array4<Real> const& hOfTheConfusingName = (mf_hOfTheConfusingName)->array(mfi);

480  int ncomp = 1;

483  // Functional form given in ana_drag.h, ifdef UPWELLING and UV_LDRAG
484  amrex::ParallelFor(bx, ncomp,
485  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k, int n)
486  {
487  rdrag(i,j,k)=0.002*(1.0-std::tanh(hOfTheConfusingName(i,j,k)/150.));
488  });
489  }
490 }

◆ set_hmixcoef()

void ROMSX::set_hmixcoef ( int  lev)

Set horizontal mixing coefficients

437  {
438  std::unique_ptr<MultiFab>& mf_visc2_p = vec_visc2_p[lev];
439  std::unique_ptr<MultiFab>& mf_visc2_r = vec_visc2_r[lev];
440  std::unique_ptr<MultiFab>& mf_diff2_salt = vec_diff2_salt[lev];
441  std::unique_ptr<MultiFab>& mf_diff2_temp = vec_diff2_temp[lev];
442 
443  for ( MFIter mfi(*(mf_visc2_p), TilingIfNotGPU()); mfi.isValid(); ++mfi )
444  {

448  Array4<Real> const& diff2_temp = (mf_diff2_temp)->array(mfi);

455  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k, int n)
456  {

458  visc2_p(i,j,k) = 5.0;
459  visc2_r(i,j,k) = 5.0;
460  // Also defined in ana_hmixcoef.h but values for diffusion2 are set in mod_scalars.F (tl_tnu2)
461  diff2_salt(i,j,k) = 0.0;
462  diff2_temp(i,j,k) = 0.0;
463  });
464  }
465 }

◆ set_massflux_3d()

void ROMSX::set_massflux_3d ( const amrex::Box &  bx,
const int  ioff,
const int  joff,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  phi,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  Hphi,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  Hz,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  on_u_or_om_v,
const int  nnew 
)
12 {
13  const int Mn = Geom(0).Domain().size()[0];
14  const int Mm = Geom(0).Domain().size()[1];
15  //
16  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
17  // Compute horizontal mass fluxes, Hz*u/n and Hz*v/m.
18  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
19  //
20  amrex::ParallelFor(phi_bx,
21  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
22  {
23  if (Box(Hz).contains(i-ioff,j-joff,k))
24  {
25  Hphi(i,j,k)=0.5*(Hz(i,j,k)+Hz(i-ioff,j-joff,k))*phi(i,j,k,nrhs)* om_v_or_on_u(i,j,0);
26  } else {
27  Hphi(i,j,k)=(Hz(i,j,k))*phi(i,j,k,nrhs)* om_v_or_on_u(i,j,0);
28  }
29  });
30 }

◆ set_smflux()

void ROMSX::set_smflux ( int  lev,
amrex::Real  time 
)
165 {
166  std::unique_ptr<MultiFab>& mf_sustr = vec_sustr[lev];
167  std::unique_ptr<MultiFab>& mf_svstr = vec_svstr[lev];
168  auto geomdata = Geom(lev).data();
169  bool NSPeriodic = geomdata.isPeriodic(1);
170  bool EWPeriodic = geomdata.isPeriodic(0);
171  //If we had wind stress and bottom stress we would need to set these:
172  Real pi = 3.14159265359;
173  Real tdays=time/(24.0*60.0*60.0);
174  amrex::Print()<<"Hacking in time offset for fixed dt=300"<<std::endl;
175  //this is a hack because time is off by dt. this needs to be fixed for non-fixed dt
176  Real dstart=0.0;//-300.0/(24.0*60.0*60.0);
177  Real rho0=parms.rho0;
178  Real windamp;
179  amrex::Print()<<tdays<<" "<<dstart<<" "<<rho0<<std::endl;
180  //It's possible these should be set to be nonzero only at the boundaries they affect
181  if(NSPeriodic) {
182  mf_sustr->setVal(0.0);
183  }
184  else if(EWPeriodic) {
185  if ((tdays-dstart)<=2.0)
186  windamp=-0.1*sin(pi*(tdays-dstart)/4.0)/rho0;
187  else
188  windamp=-0.1/rho0;
189  mf_sustr->setVal(windamp);
190  }
191  if(NSPeriodic) {
192  if ((tdays-dstart)<=2.0)
193  windamp=-0.1*sin(pi*(tdays-dstart)/4.0)/rho0;
194  else
195  windamp=-0.1/rho0;
196  mf_svstr->setVal(windamp);
197  }
198  else if(EWPeriodic) {
199  mf_svstr->setVal(0.0);
200  }
201 
202 }

◆ set_vmix()

void ROMSX::set_vmix ( int  lev)
138 {
139  auto& lev_new = vars_new[lev];
140  auto& lev_old = vars_old[lev];
141  std::unique_ptr<MultiFab>& mf_Akv = vec_Akv[lev];
142  std::unique_ptr<MultiFab>& mf_z_w = vec_z_w[lev];
143 
144  for ( MFIter mfi(*(mf_Akv), TilingIfNotGPU()); mfi.isValid(); ++mfi )
145  {
146  Array4<Real> const& Akv = (mf_Akv)->array(mfi);
147  Array4<Real> const& z_w = (mf_z_w)->array(mfi);
148  Box bx = mfi.tilebox();
149  bx.grow(IntVect(NGROW,NGROW,0));
150  const auto & geomdata = Geom(lev).data();
151  int ncomp = 1;
152  Gpu::streamSynchronize();
153  amrex::ParallelFor(bx, ncomp,
154  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k, int n)
155  {
156 
157  Akv(i,j,k) = 2.0e-03+8.0e-03*std::exp(z_w(i,j,k)/150.0);
158 
159  });
160  }
161 }

◆ set_weights()

void ROMSX::set_weights ( int  lev)
494  {
495 
496  int i,j,iter;
497  Real gamma, scale;
498  Real cff1, cff2;
499  Real wsum, shift, cff;
500 
501  //HACK should possibly store fixed_ndtfast elsewhere
502  int ndtfast=fixed_ndtfast_ratio>0 ? fixed_ndtfast_ratio : fixed_fast_dt / fixed_dt;
503 
504  //From mod_scalars
505  Real Falpha = 2.0_rt;
506  Real Fbeta = 4.0_rt;
507  Real Fgamma = 0.284_rt;
508 
509  vec_weight1.resize(2*ndtfast+1);
510  vec_weight2.resize(2*ndtfast+1);
511 
512  auto weight1 = vec_weight1.dataPtr();
513  auto weight2 = vec_weight2.dataPtr();
514 
515 //
516 //=======================================================================
517 // Compute time-averaging filter for barotropic fields.
518 //=======================================================================
519 //
520 // Initialize both sets of weights to zero.
521 //
522  nfast=0;
523  for(int i=1;i<=2*ndtfast;i++) {
524  weight1[i-1]=0.0_rt;
525  weight2[i-1]=0.0_rt;
526  }
527 //
528 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
529 // Power-law shape filters.
530 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
531 //
532 // The power-law shape filters are given by:
533 //
534 // F(xi)=xi^Falpha*(1-xi^Fbeta)-Fgamma*xi
535 //
536 // where xi=scale*i/ndtfast; and scale, Falpha, Fbeta, Fgamma, and
537 // normalization are chosen to yield the correct zeroth-order
538 // (normalization), first-order (consistency), and second-order moments,
539 // resulting in overall second-order temporal accuracy for time-averaged
540 // barotropic motions resolved by baroclinic time step.
541 //
542  scale=(Falpha+1.0_rt)*(Falpha+Fbeta+1.0_rt)/
543  ((Falpha+2.0_rt)*(Falpha+Fbeta+2.0_rt)*Real(ndtfast));
544 //
545 // Find center of gravity of the primary weighting shape function and
546 // iteratively adjust "scale" to place the centroid exactly at
547 // "ndtfast".
548 //
549  gamma=Fgamma*max(0.0_rt, 1.0_rt-10.0_rt/Real(ndtfast));
550  for(iter=1;iter<=16;iter++) {
551  nfast=0;
552  for(int i=1;i<=2*ndtfast;i++) {
553  cff=scale*Real(i);
554  weight1[i-1]=pow(cff,Falpha)-pow(cff,(Falpha+Fbeta))-gamma*cff;
555  if (weight1[i-1]>0.0_rt) nfast=i;
556  if ((nfast>0)&&(weight1[i-1]<0.0_rt)) {
557  weight1[i-1]=0.0_rt;
558  }
559  }
560  wsum=0.0_rt;
561  shift=0.0_rt;
562  for(i=1;i<=nfast;i++) {
563  wsum=wsum+weight1[i-1];
564  shift=shift+weight1[i-1]*Real(i);
565  }
566  scale=scale*shift/(wsum*Real(ndtfast));
567  }
568 //
569 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
570 // Post-processing of primary weights.
571 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
572 //
573 // Although it is assumed that the initial settings of the primary
574 // weights has its center of gravity "reasonably close" to NDTFAST,
575 // it may be not so according to the discrete rules of integration.
576 // The following procedure is designed to put the center of gravity
577 // exactly to NDTFAST by computing mismatch (NDTFAST-shift) and
578 // applying basically an upstream advection of weights to eliminate
579 // the mismatch iteratively. Once this procedure is complete primary
580 // weights are normalized.
581 //
582 // Find center of gravity of the primary weights and subsequently
583 // calculate the mismatch to be compensated.
584 //
585  for(iter=1;iter<=ndtfast;iter++) {
586  wsum=0.0_rt;
587  shift=0.0_rt;
588  for(i=1;i<=nfast;i++) {
589  wsum=wsum+weight1[i-1];
590  shift=shift+Real(i)*weight1[i-1];
591  }
592  shift=shift/wsum;
593  cff=Real(ndtfast)-shift;
594 //
595 // Apply advection step using either whole, or fractional shifts.
596 // Notice that none of the four loops here is reversible.
597 //
598  if (cff>1.0_rt) {
599  nfast=nfast+1;
600  for(i=nfast;i>=2;i--) {
601  weight1[i-1]=weight1[i-1-1];
602  }
603  weight1[1-1]=0.0_rt;
604  } else if (cff>0.0_rt) {
605  wsum=1.0_rt-cff;
606  for(i=nfast;i>=2;i--) {
607  weight1[i-1]=wsum*weight1[i-1]+cff*weight1[i-1-1];
608  }
609  weight1[1-1]=wsum*weight1[1-1];
610  } else if (cff<-1.0_rt) {
611  nfast=nfast-1;
612  for(i=1;i<=nfast;i++) {
613  weight1[i-1]=weight1[i+1-1];
614  }
615  weight1[nfast+1-1]=0.0_rt;
616  } else if (cff<0.0_rt) {
617  wsum=1.0_rt+cff;
618  for(i=1;i<=nfast-1;i++) {
619  weight1[i-1]=wsum*weight1[i-1]-cff*weight1[i+1-1];
620  }
621  weight1[nfast-1]=wsum*weight1[nfast-1];
622  }
623  }
624 //
625 // Set SECONDARY weights assuming that backward Euler time step is used
626 // for free surface. Notice that array weight2[i] is assumed to
627 // have all-zero status at entry in this segment of code.
628 //
629  for(j=1;j<=nfast;j++) {
630  cff=weight1[j-1];
631  for(i=1;i<=j;i++) {
632  weight2[i-1]=weight2[i-1]+cff;
633  }
634  }
635 //
636 // Normalize both set of weights.
637 //
638  wsum=0.0_rt;
639  cff=0.0_rt;
640  for(i=1;i<=nfast;i++) {
641  wsum=wsum+weight1[i-1];
642  cff=cff+weight2[i-1];
643  }
644  wsum=1.0_rt/wsum;
645  cff=1.0_rt/cff;
646  for(i=1;i<=nfast;i++) {
647  weight1[i-1]=wsum*weight1[i-1];
648  weight2[i-1]=cff*weight2[i-1];
649  }
650 //
651 // Report weights.
652 //
653  if (ParallelDescriptor::IOProcessor()) {
654  Print().SetPrecision(18)<<ParallelDescriptor::NProcs()<<" "<<ndtfast<<" "<<nfast<<" "<<wsum<<std::endl;
655  cff=0.0_rt;
656  cff1=0.0_rt;
657  cff2=0.0_rt;
658  wsum=0.0_rt;
659  shift=0.0_rt;
660  for(i=1;i<=nfast;i++) {
661  cff=cff+weight1[i-1];
662  cff1=cff1+weight1[i-1]*Real(i);
663  cff2=cff2+weight1[i-1]*Real(i*i);
664  wsum=wsum+weight2[i-1];
665  shift=shift+weight2[i-1]*(Real(i)-0.5_rt);
666  Print().SetPrecision(18)<<"i="<<i<<" "<<weight1[i-1]<<" "<<weight2[i-1]<<" "<<cff<<" "<<wsum<<std::endl;
667  }
668  cff1=cff1/Real(ndtfast);
669  cff2=cff2/(Real(ndtfast)*Real(ndtfast));
670  shift=shift/Real(ndtfast);
671  Print().SetPrecision(18)<<ndtfast <<" "<< nfast<<" "<<Real(nfast)/Real(ndtfast)<<std::endl;
672  Print().SetPrecision(18)<<cff1<<" "<<cff2<<" "<<shift<<" "<<cff<<" "<<wsum<<" "<<Fgamma<<" "<<gamma<<std::endl;
673  if (cff2<1.0001_rt) Print()<<"\n\n\n"<<std::endl;
674  }
675 }

◆ setPlotVariables()

void ROMSX::setPlotVariables ( const std::string &  pp_plot_var_names,
amrex::Vector< std::string > &  plot_var_names 
)
private

set which variables and derived quantities go into plotfiles

11 {
12  ParmParse pp(pp_prefix);
13 
14  if (pp.contains(pp_plot_var_names.c_str()))
15  {
16  std::string nm;
17 
18  int nPltVars = pp.countval(pp_plot_var_names.c_str());
19 
20  for (int i = 0; i < nPltVars; i++)
21  {
22  pp.get(pp_plot_var_names.c_str(), nm, i);
23 
24  // Add the named variable to our list of plot variables
25  // if it is not already in the list
26  if (!containerHasElement(plot_var_names, nm)) {
27  plot_var_names.push_back(nm);
28  }
29  }
30  } else {
31  //
32  // The default is to add none of the variables to the list
33  //
34  plot_var_names.clear();
35  }
36 
37  // Get state variables in the same order as we define them,
38  // since they may be in any order in the input list
39  Vector<std::string> tmp_plot_names;
40 
41  for (int i = 0; i < Cons::NumVars; ++i) {
42  if ( containerHasElement(plot_var_names, cons_names[i]) ) {
43  tmp_plot_names.push_back(cons_names[i]);
44  }
45  }
46  // check for velocity since it's not in cons_names
47  // if we are asked for any velocity component, we will need them all
48  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "x_velocity") ||
49  containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "y_velocity") ||
50  containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "z_velocity")) {
51  tmp_plot_names.push_back("x_velocity");
52  tmp_plot_names.push_back("y_velocity");
53  tmp_plot_names.push_back("z_velocity");
54  }
55  for (int i = 0; i < derived_names.size(); ++i) {
56  if ( containerHasElement(plot_var_names, derived_names[i]) ) {
57  if (solverChoice.use_terrain || (derived_names[i] != "z_phys" && derived_names[i] != "detJ") ) {
58  tmp_plot_names.push_back(derived_names[i]);
59  }
60  }
61  }
62 // Check to see if we found all the requested variables
63  for (auto plot_name : plot_var_names) {
64  if (!containerHasElement(tmp_plot_names, plot_name)) {
65  Warning("\nWARNING: Requested to plot variable '" + plot_name + "' but it is not available");
66  }
67  }
68  plot_var_names = tmp_plot_names;
69 }

◆ sum_integrated_quantities()

void ROMSX::sum_integrated_quantities ( amrex::Real  time)

Integrate conserved quantities for diagnostics

9 {
10  BL_PROFILE("ROMSX::sum_integrated_quantities()");
11 
12  if (verbose <= 0)
13  return;
14 
15  int datwidth = 14;
16  int datprecision = 6;
17 
18  amrex::Real scalar = 0.0;
19  amrex::Real mass = 0.0;
20 
21  for (int lev = 0; lev <= finest_level; lev++) {
22  mass += volWgtSumMF(lev,vars_new[lev][Vars::cons],Rho_comp,true,true);
23  scalar += volWgtSumMF(lev,vars_new[lev][Vars::cons],RhoScalar_comp,true,true);
24  }
25 
26  if (verbose > 0) {
27  const int nfoo = 2;
28  amrex::Real foo[nfoo] = {mass,scalar};
29 #ifdef AMREX_LAZY
30  Lazy::QueueReduction([=]() mutable {
31 #endif
32  amrex::ParallelDescriptor::ReduceRealSum(
33  foo, nfoo, amrex::ParallelDescriptor::IOProcessorNumber());
34 
35  if (amrex::ParallelDescriptor::IOProcessor()) {
36  int i = 0;
37  mass = foo[i++];
38  scalar = foo[i++];
39 
40  amrex::Print() << '\n';
41  amrex::Print() << "TIME= " << time << " MASS = " << mass << '\n';
42  amrex::Print() << "TIME= " << time << " SCALAR = " << scalar << '\n';
43 
44  if (NumDataLogs() > 0) {
45  std::ostream& data_log1 = DataLog(0);
46  if (data_log1.good()) {
47  if (time == 0.0) {
48  data_log1 << std::setw(datwidth) << " time";
49  data_log1 << std::setw(datwidth) << " mass";
50  data_log1 << std::setw(datwidth) << " scalar";
51  data_log1 << std::endl;
52  }
53 
54  // Write the quantities at this time
55  data_log1 << std::setw(datwidth) << time;
56  data_log1 << std::setw(datwidth) << std::setprecision(datprecision)
57  << mass;
58  data_log1 << std::setw(datwidth) << std::setprecision(datprecision)
59  << scalar;
60  data_log1 << std::endl;
61  }
62  }
63  }
64 #ifdef AMREX_LAZY
65  });
66 #endif
67  }
68 }
