◆ t3dmix()

void ROMSX::t3dmix ( const amrex::Box &  bx,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  t,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  diff2,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  Hz,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  pm,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  pn,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  pmon_u,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  pnom_v,
int  nrhs,
int  nnew,
const amrex::Real  dt_lev 
)

Harmonic diffusivity for tracers

14 {
15  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
16  // Add in harmonic diffusivity s terms.
17  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
18 
19  Box gbx2 = bx;
20  gbx2.grow(IntVect(NGROW,NGROW,0));
21  int ncomp = 1;
22 
23  FArrayBox fab_FX(gbx2,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena());
24  FArrayBox fab_FE(gbx2,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena());
25 
26  auto FX=fab_FX.array();
27  auto FE=fab_FE.array();
28 
29  amrex::ParallelFor(gbx2,
30  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
31  {
32  FX(i,j,k)=0.0;
33  FE(i,j,k)=0.0;
34  });
35 
36  //K_LOOP : DO k=1,N(ng)
37  //DO j=Jstr,Jend
38  //DO i=Istr,Iend+1
39  amrex::ParallelFor(bx, ncomp,
40  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k, int n)
41  {
42  const amrex::Real cff = 0.25 * (diff2(i,j,0) + diff2(i-1,j,0)) * pmon_u(i,j,0);
43  FX(i,j,k) = cff * (Hz(i,j,k)+Hz(i+1,j,k))*(t(i,j,k,nrhs)-t(i-1,j,k,nrhs));
44  });
45 
46  //K_LOOP : DO k=1,N(ng)
47  //DO j=Jstr,Jend+1
48  //DO i=Istr,Iend
49  amrex::ParallelFor(bx, ncomp,
50  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k, int n)
51  {
52  const amrex::Real cff=0.25*(diff2(i,j,0)+diff2(i,j-1,0)) * pnom_v(i,j,0);
53  FE(i,j,k) = cff * (Hz(i,j,k) + Hz(i,j-1,k)) * (t(i,j,k,nrhs) - t(i,j-1,k,nrhs));
54  });
55  /*
56  Time-step harmonic, S-surfaces diffusion term.
57  */
58  //K_LOOP : DO k=1,N(ng)
59  //DO j=Jstr,Jend
60  //DO i=IstrU,Iend
61  amrex::ParallelFor(bx, ncomp,
62  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k, int n)
63  {
64  const amrex::Real cff=dt_lev*pm(i,j,0)*pn(i,j,0);
65  const amrex::Real cff1=cff*(FX(i+1,j ,k)-FX(i,j,k));
66  const amrex::Real cff2=cff*(FE(i ,j+1,k)-FE(i,j,k));
67  const amrex::Real cff3=cff1+cff2;
68  t(i,j,k,nnew)=t(i,j,k,nnew)+cff3;
69  });
70 
71 }

◆ timeStep()

void ROMSX::timeStep ( int  lev,
amrex::Real  time,
int  iteration 
)
private

advance a level by dt, includes a recursive call for finer levels

11 {
12  // Update what we call "old" and "new" time
13  t_old[lev] = t_new[lev];
14  t_new[lev] += dt[lev];
15 
16  if (Verbose()) {
17  amrex::Print() << "[Level " << lev << " step " << istep[lev]+1 << "] ";
18  amrex::Print() << "ADVANCE from time = " << t_old[lev] << " to " << t_new[lev]
19  << " with dt = " << dt[lev] << std::endl;
20  }
21 
22  // We must swap the pointers so the previous step's "new" is now this step's "old"
23  std::swap(vars_old[lev], vars_new[lev]);
24 
25  // Advance a single level for a single time step
26  Advance(lev, time, dt[lev], iteration, nsubsteps[lev]);
27 
28  ++istep[lev];
29 
30  if (Verbose())
31  {
32  amrex::Print() << "[Level " << lev << " step " << istep[lev] << "] ";
33  amrex::Print() << "Advanced " << CountCells(lev) << " cells" << std::endl;
34  }
35 
36  if (lev < finest_level)
37  {
38  // recursive call for next-finer level
39  for (int i = 1; i <= nsubsteps[lev+1]; ++i)
40  {
41  timeStep(lev+1, time+(i-1)*dt[lev+1], i);
42  }
43 
44  AverageDownTo(lev); // average lev+1 down to lev
45  }
46 }
ROMSX::Advance
void Advance(int lev, amrex::Real time, amrex::Real dt_lev, int iteration, int ncycle)
Definition: ROMSX_Advance.cpp:8

◆ update_massflux_3d()

void ROMSX::update_massflux_3d ( const amrex::Box &  bx,
const amrex::Box &  valid_bx,
const int  ioff,
const int  joff,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  phi,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  Hphi,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  Hz,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  on_u_or_om_v,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  Dphi1,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  Dphi2,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  DC,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  FC,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  CF,
const int  nnew 
)
14 {
15  const int Mn = Geom(0).Domain().size()[0];
16  const int Mm = Geom(0).Domain().size()[1];
17  auto N = Geom(0).Domain().size()[2]-1; // Number of vertical "levs" aka, NZ
18  auto phi_bxD=phi_bx;
19  auto phi_bx_g1z=phi_bx;
20  phi_bxD.makeSlab(2,0);
21  phi_bx_g1z.grow(IntVect(0,0,1));
22 
23  auto geomdata = Geom(0).data();
24  bool NSPeriodic = geomdata.isPeriodic(1);
25  bool EWPeriodic = geomdata.isPeriodic(0);
26 
27  //Copied depth of water column calculation from DepthStretchTransform
28  //Compute thicknesses of U-boxes DC(i,j,0:N-1), total depth of the water column DC(i,j,-1), and
29  // incorrect vertical mean CF(i,j,-1)
30  if (verbose > 0) {
31  Print() << "phi: " << phi_bx << std::endl;
32  Print() << "DC: " << Box(DC) << std::endl;
33  Print() << "CF: " << Box(CF) << std::endl;
34  Print() << "FC: " << Box(FC) << std::endl;
35  }
36  //amrex::ParallelFor(phi_bx,
37  amrex::ParallelFor(phi_bx_g1z,
38  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
39  {
40  DC(i,j,k)=0.0;
41  CF(i,j,k)=0.0;
42  });
43  //amrex::ParallelFor(phi_bx,
44  amrex::ParallelFor(phi_bx,
45  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
46  {
47  FC(i,j,k)=0.0;
48  });
49  Gpu::streamSynchronize();
50  //This takes advantage of Hz being an extra grow cell size
51  amrex::ParallelFor(phi_bx,
52  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
53  {
54  DC(i,j,k)=0.5*om_v_or_on_u(i,j,0)*(Hz(i,j,k)+Hz(i-ioff,j-joff,k));
55  });
56  amrex::ParallelFor(phi_bxD,
57  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int )
58  {
59  for(int k=0; k<=N; k++) {
60  DC(i,j,-1)=DC(i,j,-1)+DC(i,j,k);
61  CF(i,j,-1)=CF(i,j,-1)+DC(i,j,k)*phi(i,j,k,nnew);
62  }
63  });
64 
65  // Note this loop is in the opposite direction in k in ROMS but does not
66  // appear to affect results
67  amrex::ParallelFor(phi_bxD,
68  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int )
69  {
70  for(int k=0; k<=N; k++) {
71  Real cff1=DC(i,j,-1);
72  if(k==0) {
73  DC(i,j,-1)=1.0/DC(i,j,-1);
74  CF(i,j,-1)=DC(i,j,-1)*(CF(i,j,-1)-Dphi_avg1(i,j,0));
75  }
76  //Consider putting this in a later function:
77  // ubar(i,j,1)=DC(i,0)*DU_avg1(i,j)
78  // ubar(i,j,2)=ubar(i,j,1)
79  // vbar(i,j,1)=DC(i,0)*DV_avg1(i,j)
80  // vbar(i,j,2)=vbar(i,j,1)
81  //Vertical mean correction on boundary points
82  // Maybe wrong? Will it just get obliterated on the FillBoundary
83  if(!(NSPeriodic&&EWPeriodic)) {
84  if((((i<0)||(i>=Mn+1))&&!EWPeriodic)||(((j<0)||(j>=Mm+1))&&!NSPeriodic)) {
85  phi(i,j,k) -= CF(i,j,-1);
86  Abort("Untested vertical mean");
87  }
88  }
89 
90  //Compute correct mass flux, Hz*v/m
91  Hphi(i,j,k) = 0.5 * (Hphi(i,j,k)+phi(i,j,k,nnew)*DC(i,j,k));
92  FC(i,j,0) = FC(i,j,0)+Hphi(i,j,k); //recursive
93  }
94  });
95 
96  amrex::ParallelFor(phi_bxD,
97  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int )
98  {
99  FC(i,j,0) = DC(i,j,-1)*(FC(i,j,0)-Dphi_avg2(i,j,0)); //recursive
100  });
101  amrex::ParallelFor(phi_bx,
102  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
103  {
104  Hphi(i,j,k) = Hphi(i,j,k)-DC(i,j,k)*FC(i,j,0);
105  });
106 
107 }

◆ update_vel_3d()

void ROMSX::update_vel_3d ( const amrex::Box &  bx,
const amrex::Box &  gbx,
const int  ioff,
const int  joff,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  vel,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  vel_old,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  rvel,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  Hz,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  Akv,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  pm,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  pn,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  DC,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  FC,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  sstr,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  bstr,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  z_r,
const int  iic,
const int  ntfirst,
const int  nnew,
int  nstp,
int  nrhs,
int  N,
const amrex::Real  lambda,
const amrex::Real  dt_lev 
)

Update velocities or tracers as the last part of the prestep

31 {
32 
33  BoxArray ba_gbxvel = intersect(BoxArray(vel_bx), gbx);
34  AMREX_ASSERT((ba_gbxvel.size() == 1));
35  Box gbxvel = ba_gbxvel[0];
36 
37  //
38  // Weighting coefficient for the newest (implicit) time step derivatives
39  // using either a Crack-Nicolson implicit scheme (lambda=0.5) or a
40  // backward implicit scheme (lambda=1.0).
41  //
42 
43 
44  Real oml_dt = dt_lev*(1.0-lambda);
45  //N is one less than ROMS
46 
47  // Except the commented out part means lambda is always 1.0
48  if (verbose > 0) {
49  amrex::Print() << "in update_vel_3d with box " << vel_bx << std::endl;
50  Print() << "vel old " << Box(vel_old) << std::endl;
51  Print() << "Akv " << Box(Akv) << std::endl;
52  }
53  amrex::ParallelFor(vel_bx,
54  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
55  {
56  if(k+1<=N&&k>=0)
57  {
58  Real cff = 1.0 / ( z_r(i,j,k+1)+z_r(i-ioff,j-joff,k+1)
59  -z_r(i,j,k )-z_r(i-ioff,j-joff,k ));
60  FC(i,j,k) = oml_dt * cff * (vel_old(i,j,k+1,nstp)-vel_old(i,j,k,nstp)) *
61  (Akv(i,j,k) +Akv(i-ioff,j-joff,k));
62  }
63  else if (k==-1)
64  {
65  FC(i,j,-1) = dt_lev*bstr(i,j,0);
66  }
67  else if (k==N)
68  {
69  FC(i,j, N) = dt_lev*sstr(i,j,0);
70  }
71 
72  DC(i,j,k) = 0.25 * dt_lev * (pm(i,j,0)+pm(i-ioff,j-joff,0))
73  * (pn(i,j,0)+pn(i-ioff,j-joff,0));
74  });
75 
76  amrex::ParallelFor(gbxvel,
77  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
78  {
79  Real cff3=dt_lev*(1.0-lambda);
80  Real cff1 = 0.0, cff2 = 0.0, cff4;
81 
82  int indx=0; //nrhs-3
83 
84  if (iic==ntfirst)
85  {
86  if (k+1<=N && k>=1)
87  {
88  cff1=vel_old(i,j,k,nstp)*0.5*(Hz(i,j,k)+Hz(i-ioff,j-joff,k));
89  cff2=FC(i,j,k)-FC(i,j,k-1);
90  vel(i,j,k,nnew)=cff1+cff2;
91  }
92  else if(k==0)
93  {
94  cff1=vel_old(i,j,k,nstp)*0.5*(Hz(i,j,k)+Hz(i-ioff,j-joff,k));
95  cff2=FC(i,j,k)-dt_lev*bstr(i,j,0);
96  vel(i,j,k,nnew)=cff1+cff2;
97  }
98  else if(k==N)
99  {
100  cff1=vel_old(i,j,k,nstp)*0.5*(Hz(i,j,k)+Hz(i-ioff,j-joff,k));
101  cff2=dt_lev*sstr(i,j,0)-FC(i,j,k-1); //or: -FC(i,j,k-1)+dt_lev*sstr(i,j,0);
102  vel(i,j,k,nnew)=cff1+cff2;
103  }
104 
105  } else if(iic==ntfirst+1) {
106 
107  if (k<N && k>0) {
108  cff1=vel_old(i,j,k,nstp)*0.5*(Hz(i,j,k)+Hz(i-ioff,j-joff,k));
109  cff2=FC(i,j,k)-FC(i,j,k-1);
110  }
111  else if(k==0) {
112  cff1=vel_old(i,j,k,nstp)*0.5*(Hz(i,j,k)+Hz(i-ioff,j-joff,k));
113  cff2=FC(i,j,k)-dt_lev*bstr(i,j,0);
114  }
115  else if(k==N) {
116  cff1=vel_old(i,j,k,nstp)*0.5*(Hz(i,j,k)+Hz(i-ioff,j-joff,k));
117  cff2=dt_lev*sstr(i,j,0)-FC(i,j,k-1); //or: -FC(i,j,k-1)+dt_lev*sstr(i,j,0);
118  }
119 
120  cff3=0.5*DC(i,j,k);
121  if(ioff==0&&joff==0)
122  vel(i,j,k,nnew)=cff1 + cff2;
123  else {
124  indx=nrhs ? 0 : 1;
125  Real r_swap= rvel(i,j,k,indx);
126  rvel(i,j,k,indx) = rvel(i,j,k,nrhs);
127  rvel(i,j,k,nrhs) = r_swap;
128  vel(i,j,k,nnew)=cff1- cff3*rvel(i,j,k,indx)+ cff2;
129  }
130  } else {
131  cff1= 5.0/12.0;
132  cff2=16.0/12.0;
133  if (k==0) {
134  cff3=vel_old(i,j,k,nstp)*0.5*(Hz(i,j,k)+Hz(i-ioff,j-joff,k));
135  cff4=FC(i,j,k)-dt_lev*bstr(i,j,0);
136  //cff4=FC(i,j,k)-FC(i,j,k-1);//-bustr(i,j,0);
137 
138  } else if (k == N) {
139  cff3=vel_old(i,j,k,nstp)*0.5*(Hz(i,j,k)+Hz(i-ioff,j-joff,k));
140  cff4=dt_lev*sstr(i,j,0)-FC(i,j,k-1);
141 
142  } else {
143  cff3=vel_old(i,j,k,nstp)*0.5*(Hz(i,j,k)+Hz(i-ioff,j-joff,k));
144  cff4=FC(i,j,k)-FC(i,j,k-1);
145  }
146  if(ioff==0&&joff==0)
147  vel(i,j,k,nnew)=cff3 + cff4;
148  else {
149  indx=nrhs ? 0 : 1;
150  Real r_swap= rvel(i,j,k,indx);
151  rvel(i,j,k,indx) = rvel(i,j,k,nrhs);
152  rvel(i,j,k,nrhs) = r_swap;
153 
154  vel(i,j,k,nnew)=cff3+
155  DC(i,j,k)*(cff1*rvel(i,j,k,nrhs)-
156  cff2*rvel(i,j,k,indx))+
157  cff4;
158  rvel(i,j,k,nrhs) = 0.0;
159  }
160  }
161  });
162 }

◆ uv3dmix()

void ROMSX::uv3dmix ( const amrex::Box &  bx,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  u,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  v,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  rufrc,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  rvfrc,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  visc2_p,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  visc2_r,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  Hz,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  om_r,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  on_r,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  om_p,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  on_p,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  pm,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  pn,
int  nrhs,
int  nnew,
const amrex::Real  dt_lev 
)

Harmonic viscosity

18 {
19  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
20  // Add in harmonic viscosity s terms.
21  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
22 
23  Box gbx2 = bx;
24  gbx2.grow(IntVect(NGROW,NGROW,0));
25  int ncomp = 1;
26 
27  FArrayBox fab_UFx(gbx2,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena());
28  FArrayBox fab_UFe(gbx2,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena());
29  FArrayBox fab_VFx(gbx2,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena());
30  FArrayBox fab_VFe(gbx2,1,amrex::The_Async_Arena());
31 
32  auto UFx=fab_UFx.array();
33  auto UFe=fab_UFe.array();
34  auto VFx=fab_VFx.array();
35  auto VFe=fab_VFe.array();
36 
37  amrex::ParallelFor(gbx2,
38  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
39  {
40  UFx(i,j,k)=0.0;
41  UFe(i,j,k)=0.0;
42  VFx(i,j,k)=0.0;
43  VFe(i,j,k)=0.0;
44  });
45 
46  //K_LOOP : DO k=1,N(ng)
47  //DO j=JstrV-1,Jend
48  //DO i=IstrU-1,Iend
49  // Should these be on ubox/vbox?
50  amrex::ParallelFor(bx, ncomp,
51  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k, int n)
52  {
53  // cff depends on k, but UFx and VFe will only be affected by the last cell?
54  const amrex::Real cff = 0.5*Hz(i,j,k) * (pm(i,j,0) / pn(i,j,0) *
55  ((pn(i, j,0) + pn(i+1,j,0)) * u(i+1,j,k,nrhs)-
56  (pn(i-1,j,0) + pn(i, j,0)) * u(i ,j,k,nrhs))-
57  pn(i,j,0) / pm(i,j,0) *
58  ((pm(i,j ,0)+pm(i,j+1,0))*v(i,j+1,k,nrhs)-
59  (pm(i,j-1,0)+pm(i,j ,0))*v(i,j ,k,nrhs)));
60  // ifndef VISC_3DCOEF branch
61  UFx(i,j,k) = on_r(i,j,0)*on_r(i,j,0)*visc2_r(i,j,0)*cff;
62  VFe(i,j,k) = om_r(i,j,0)*om_r(i,j,0)*visc2_r(i,j,0)*cff;
63  });
64 
65  //K_LOOP : DO k=1,N(ng)
66  //DO j=Jstr,Jend+1
67  //DO i=Istr,Iend+1
68  amrex::ParallelFor(bx, ncomp,
69  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k, int n)
70  {
71  //printf("%d %d %d %15.15g %15.15g %15.15g %15.15g\n",i,j,k,Hz(i-1,j,k),Hz(i,j,k),Hz(i-1,j-1,k),Hz(i,j-1,k));
72  const amrex::Real cff = 0.125 * (Hz(i-1,j ,k)+Hz(i,j ,k)+
73  Hz(i-1,j-1,k)+Hz(i,j-1,k))*
74  (pm(i,j,0)/pn(i,j,0)*
75  ((pn(i ,j-1,0)+pn(i ,j,0))*v(i ,j,k,nrhs)-
76  (pn(i-1,j-1,0)+pn(i-1,j,0))*v(i-1,j,k,nrhs)));
77  // ifndef VISC_3DCOEF branch
78  UFe(i,j,k) = om_p(i,j,0)*om_p(i,j,0)*visc2_p(i,j,0)*cff;
79  VFx(i,j,k) = on_p(i,j,0)*on_p(i,j,0)*visc2_p(i,j,0)*cff;
80  });
81 /*
82  Time-step harmonic, S-surfaces viscosity term. Notice that momentum
83  at this stage is HzU and HzV and has m2/s units. Add contribution for
84  barotropic forcing terms.
85  */
86  //K_LOOP : DO k=1,N(ng)
87  //DO j=Jstr,Jend
88  //DO i=IstrU,Iend
89  amrex::ParallelFor(bx, ncomp,
90  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k, int n)
91  {
92  const amrex::Real cff=dt_lev*0.25*(pm(i-1,j,0)+pm(i,j,0))*(pn(i-1,j,0)+pn(i,j,0));
93  const amrex::Real cff1=0.5*(pn(i-1,j,0)+pn(i,j,0))*(UFx(i,j ,k)-UFx(i-1,j,k));
94  const amrex::Real cff2=0.5*(pm(i-1,j,0)+pm(i,j,0))*(UFe(i,j+1,k)-UFe(i ,j,k));
95  const amrex::Real cff3=cff*(cff1+cff2);
96  rufrc(i,j,0)=rufrc(i,j,0)+cff1+cff2;
97  u(i,j,k,nnew)=u(i,j,k,nnew)+cff3;
98 /*#ifdef DIAGNOSTICS_UV
99  DiaRUfrc(i,j,3,M2hvis)=DiaRUfrc(i,j,3,M2hvis)+cff1+cff2
100  DiaRUfrc(i,j,3,M2xvis)=DiaRUfrc(i,j,3,M2xvis)+cff1
101  DiaRUfrc(i,j,3,M2yvis)=DiaRUfrc(i,j,3,M2yvis)+cff2
102  DiaU3wrk(i,j,k,M3hvis)=cff3
103  DiaU3wrk(i,j,k,M3xvis)=cff*cff1
104  DiaU3wrk(i,j,k,M3yvis)=cff*cff2
105 #endif*/
106  });
107 
108  //K_LOOP : DO k=1,N(ng)
109  //DO j=JstrV,Jend
110  //DO i=Istr,Iend
111  amrex::ParallelFor(bx, ncomp,
112  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k, int n)
113  {
114  const amrex::Real cff=dt_lev*0.25*(pm(i,j,0)+pm(i,j-1,0))*(pn(i,j,0)+pn(i,j-1,0));
115  const amrex::Real cff1=0.5*(pn(i,j-1,0)+pn(i,j,0))*(VFx(i+1,j,k)-VFx(i,j ,k));
116  const amrex::Real cff2=0.5*(pm(i,j-1,0)+pm(i,j,0))*(VFe(i ,j,k)-VFe(i,j-1,k));
117  const amrex::Real cff3=cff*(cff1-cff2);
118  rvfrc(i,j,0)=rvfrc(i,j,0)+cff1-cff2;
119  v(i,j,k,nnew)=v(i,j,k,nnew)+cff3;
120 /*#ifdef DIAGNOSTICS_UV
121  DiaRVfrc(i,j,3,M2hvis)=DiaRVfrc(i,j,3,M2hvis)+cff1-cff2
122  DiaRVfrc(i,j,3,M2xvis)=DiaRVfrc(i,j,3,M2xvis)+cff1
123  DiaRVfrc(i,j,3,M2yvis)=DiaRVfrc(i,j,3,M2yvis)-cff2
124  DiaV3wrk(i,j,k,M3hvis)=cff3
125  DiaV3wrk(i,j,k,M3xvis)= cff*cff1
126  DiaV3wrk(i,j,k,M3yvis)=-cff*cff2
127 #endif*/
128  });
129 
130 
131 }

◆ vert_mean_3d()

void ROMSX::vert_mean_3d ( const amrex::Box &  bx,
const int  ioff,
const int  joff,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  phi,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  Hz,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  Hzk,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  oHz,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  Dphi_avg1,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  Akv,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  BC,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  DC,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  FC,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  CF,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  dxlen,
const int  nnew,
const int  N,
const amrex::Real  dt_lev 
)
20 {
21  // Interior points vertical mean correction
22  //
23  // Put Hzk on the x- or y-face as appropriate, or leave on cell center for tracers
24  //
25  if (verbose > 0)
26  amrex::Print() << "updating on box in vert_mean_3d: " << phi_bx << std::endl;
27  auto phi_bxD=phi_bx;
28  phi_bxD.makeSlab(2,0);
29 
30  amrex::ParallelFor(phi_bx,
31  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
32  {
33  Hzk(i,j,k)=0.5*(Hz(i-ioff,j-joff,k)+Hz(i,j,k));
34  });
35  Gpu::synchronize();
36  Real CF_tmp=0.0;
37  Real DC_tmp=0.0;
38  amrex::ParallelFor(phi_bxD,
39  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int )
40  {
41  for(int k=0; k<=N; k++) {
42  if(k==0) {
43  CF(i,j,-1)=Hzk(i,j,k);
44  DC(i,j,-1)=phi(i,j,k,nnew)*Hzk(i,j,k);
45  } else {
46  CF(i,j,-1)+=Hzk(i,j,k);
47  DC(i,j,-1)+=phi(i,j,k,nnew)*Hzk(i,j,k);
48  }
49  }
50  });
51  Gpu::synchronize();
52  amrex::ParallelFor(phi_bxD,
53  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int )
54  {
55  Real cff1=1.0/(CF(i,j,-1)*(1.0/dxlen(i,j,0)));
56  DC(i,j,-1)=(DC(i,j,-1)*(1.0/dxlen(i,j,0))-Dphi_avg1(i,j,0))*cff1; // recursive
57  });
58 
59  amrex::ParallelFor(phi_bx,
60  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
61  {
62  phi(i,j,k) -= DC(i,j,-1);
63  });
64 }

◆ vert_visc_3d()

void ROMSX::vert_visc_3d ( const amrex::Box &  bx,
const amrex::Box &  valid_bx,
const int  ioff,
const int  joff,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  phi,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  Hz,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  Hzk,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  oHz,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  AK,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  Akv,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  BC,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  DC,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  FC,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real >  CF,
const int  nnew,
const int  N,
const amrex::Real  dt_lev 
)
19 {
20  //
21  // Put Hzk on the x- or y-face as appropriate, or leave on cell center for tracers
22  //
23  if (verbose > 0)
24  amrex::Print() << "updating on box in vert_visc_3d: " << phi_bx << std::endl;
25  auto phi_bxD = phi_bx;
26  phi_bxD.makeSlab(2,0);
27  amrex::ParallelFor(phi_bx,
28  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
29  {
30  Hzk(i,j,k)=0.5*(Hz(i-ioff,j-joff,k)+Hz(i,j,k));
31  });
32 
33  //
34  // Define oHz = (1/Hz)
35  //
36  amrex::ParallelFor(phi_bx,
37  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
38  {
39  oHz(i,j,k) = 1.0/ Hzk(i,j,k);
40  });
41 
42  //
43  // Put Akv on the x- or y-face as appropriate, or leave on cell center for tracers
44  //
45  amrex::ParallelFor(phi_bx,
46  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
47  {
48  AK(i,j,k) = 0.5 * (Akv(i-ioff,j-joff,k)+Akv(i,j,k));
49  });
50  Gpu::streamSynchronize();
51 #ifdef AMREX_USE_GPU
52  Gpu::synchronize();
53 #else
54 #endif
55  /////////////////// This and the following loop is the first non-matching thing that affects plotfile comparison for cuda
56  // Begin vertical viscosity term
57  // NOTE: vertical viscosity term for tracers is identical except AK=Akt
58  amrex::ParallelFor(phi_bxD,
59  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int )
60  {
61  for(int k=0; k<=N; k++) {
62  //
63  // Use conservative, parabolic spline reconstruction of vertical
64  // viscosity derivatives. Then, time step vertical viscosity term
65  // implicitly by solving a tridiagonal system.
66  //
67  Real cff;
68  Real cff1=1.0/6.0;
69 
70  if(k-1>=0)
71  FC(i,j,k)=cff1*Hzk(i,j,k )-dt_lev*AK(i,j,k-1)*oHz(i,j,k );
72  else
73  FC(i,j,k)=cff1*Hzk(i,j,k );
74  //printf("%d %d %d %d %25.25g FC\n",i,j,k,0,FC(i,j,k));
75  // amrex::Abort("first index");
76  if(k<=N-1)
77  {
78  CF(i,j,k)=cff1*Hzk(i,j,k+1)-dt_lev*AK(i,j,k+1)*oHz(i,j,k+1);
79  }
80  //printf("%d %d %d %d %25.25g CF\n",i,j,k,0,CF(i,j,k));
81  //
82  // LU decomposition and forward substitution.
83  //
84  cff1=1.0/3.0;
85  if(k==0)
86  {
87  BC(i,j,k)=cff1*(Hzk(i,j,k)+Hzk(i,j,k+1))+
88  dt_lev*AK(i,j,k)*(oHz(i,j,k)+oHz(i,j,k+1));
89  cff=1.0/(BC(i,j,k)-FC(i,j,k)*0.0);
90  CF(i,j,k) *= cff;
91  DC(i,j,k) = cff*(phi(i,j,k+1,nnew)-phi(i,j,k,nnew)-FC(i,j,k)*0.0);
92  }
93  if(k+1<=N&&k>=1)
94  {
95  BC(i,j,k)=cff1*(Hzk(i,j,k)+Hzk(i,j,k+1))+
96  dt_lev*AK(i,j,k)*(oHz(i,j,k)+oHz(i,j,k+1));
97  cff=1.0/(BC(i,j,k)-FC(i,j,k)*CF(i,j,k-1));
98  CF(i,j,k) *= cff;
99  DC(i,j,k) = cff*(phi(i,j,k+1,nnew)-phi(i,j,k,nnew)-FC(i,j,k)*DC(i,j,k-1));
100  }
101  }
102  //printf("%d %d %d %d %25.25g %25.25g %25.25g %25.25g %25.25g BC cff CF DC\n",i,j,k,0,BC(i,j,k),cff,CF(i,j,k),FC(i,j,k),DC(i,j,k));
103  //printf("%d %d %d %d %25.25g %25.25g %25.25g %25.25g %25.25g cff u(k+1) u(k)FC DC(k-1)\n",i,j,k,0,cff,phi(i,j,k+1,nnew),phi(i,j,k,nnew),FC(i,j,k),DC(i,j,k-1));
104  //exit(1);
105  });
106 #ifdef AMREX_USE_GPU
107  Gpu::synchronize();
108 #else
109 #endif
110  Gpu::streamSynchronize();
111  amrex::ParallelFor(phi_bxD,
112  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
113  {
114  for(int k=0; k<=N; k++) {
115  //
116  // Backward substitution.
117  //
118  DC(i,j,N)=0.0;
119 
120  if(N-k+1<=N && N>=k) //-N,1,-1 => kidx =N-k+1
121  {
122  if(N+1<k || N+2<k) amrex::Abort("-1 here");
123  DC(i,j,N-k) -= CF(i,j,N-k)*DC(i,j,N-k+1);
124  }
125  }
126  });
127 #ifdef AMREX_USE_GPU
128  Gpu::synchronize();
129 #else
130 #endif
131  amrex::ParallelFor(phi_bx,
132  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
133  {
134  DC(i,j,k) *= AK(i,j,k);
135  });
136 
137  amrex::ParallelFor(phi_bx,
138  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
139  {
140  Real cff;
141  if(k-1>=0) {
142  cff = dt_lev*oHz(i,j,k)*(DC(i,j,k)-DC(i,j,k-1));
143  } else {
144  cff = dt_lev*oHz(i,j,k)*(DC(i,j,k));
145  }
146  phi(i,j,k) += cff;
147  });
148 }

◆ volWgtSumMF()

amrex::Real ROMSX::volWgtSumMF ( int  lev,
const amrex::MultiFab &  mf,
int  comp,
bool  local,
bool  finemask 
)
73 {
74  BL_PROFILE("ROMSX::volWgtSumMF()");
75 
76  amrex::Real sum = 0.0;
77  amrex::MultiFab tmp(grids[lev], dmap[lev], 1, 0);
78  amrex::MultiFab::Copy(tmp, mf, comp, 0, 1, 0);
79 
80  if (lev < finest_level && finemask) {
81  const amrex::MultiFab& mask = build_fine_mask(lev+1);
82  amrex::MultiFab::Multiply(tmp, mask, 0, 0, 1, 0);
83  }
84 
85  amrex::MultiFab volume(grids[lev], dmap[lev], 1, 0);
86  auto const& dx = geom[lev].CellSizeArray();
87  Real cell_vol = dx[0]*dx[1]*dx[2];
88  volume.setVal(cell_vol);
89  if (solverChoice.use_terrain)
90  amrex::MultiFab::Multiply(volume, *detJ_cc[lev], 0, 0, 1, 0);
91  sum = amrex::MultiFab::Dot(tmp, 0, volume, 0, 1, 0, local);
92 
93  if (!local)
94  amrex::ParallelDescriptor::ReduceRealSum(sum);
95 
96  return sum;
97 }

amrex::MultiFab & build_fine_mask(int lev)
Definition: ROMSX_SumIQ.cpp:100

◆ WriteCheckpointFile()

void ROMSX::WriteCheckpointFile ( ) const
private
16 {
17  // chk00010 write a checkpoint file with this root directory
18  // chk00010/Header this contains information you need to save (e.g., finest_level, t_new, etc.) and also
19  // the BoxArrays at each level
20  // chk00010/Level_0/
21  // chk00010/Level_1/
22  // etc. these subdirectories will hold the MultiFab data at each level of refinement
23 
24  // checkpoint file name, e.g., chk00010
25  const std::string& checkpointname = amrex::Concatenate(check_file,istep[0],5);
26 
27  amrex::Print() << "Writing checkpoint " << checkpointname << "\n";
28 
29  const int nlevels = finest_level+1;
30 
31  // ---- prebuild a hierarchy of directories
32  // ---- dirName is built first. if dirName exists, it is renamed. then build
33  // ---- dirName/subDirPrefix_0 .. dirName/subDirPrefix_nlevels-1
34  // ---- if callBarrier is true, call ParallelDescriptor::Barrier()
35  // ---- after all directories are built
36  // ---- ParallelDescriptor::IOProcessor() creates the directories
37  amrex::PreBuildDirectorHierarchy(checkpointname, "Level_", nlevels, true);
38 
39  // write Header file
40  if (ParallelDescriptor::IOProcessor()) {
41 
42  std::string HeaderFileName(checkpointname + "/Header");
43  VisMF::IO_Buffer io_buffer(VisMF::IO_Buffer_Size);
44  std::ofstream HeaderFile;
45  HeaderFile.rdbuf()->pubsetbuf(io_buffer.dataPtr(), io_buffer.size());
46  HeaderFile.open(HeaderFileName.c_str(), std::ofstream::out |
47  std::ofstream::trunc |
48  std::ofstream::binary);
49  if( ! HeaderFile.good()) {
50  amrex::FileOpenFailed(HeaderFileName);
51  }
52 
53  HeaderFile.precision(17);
54 
55  // write out title line
56  HeaderFile << "Checkpoint file for ROMSX\n";
57 
58  // write out finest_level
59  HeaderFile << finest_level << "\n";
60 
61  // write the number of components
62  // for each variable we store
63 
64  // conservative, cell-centered vars
65  HeaderFile << Cons::NumVars << "\n";
66 
67  // x-velocity on faces
68  HeaderFile << 1 << "\n";
69 
70  // y-velocity on faces
71  HeaderFile << 1 << "\n";
72 
73  // z-velocity on faces
74  HeaderFile << 1 << "\n";
75 
76  HeaderFile << 2 << "\n";
77 
78  HeaderFile << 2 << "\n";
79 
80  HeaderFile << 3 << "\n";
81 
82  HeaderFile << 3 << "\n";
83 
84  // write out array of istep
85  for (int i = 0; i < istep.size(); ++i) {
86  HeaderFile << istep[i] << " ";
87  }
88  HeaderFile << "\n";
89 
90  // write out array of dt
91  for (int i = 0; i < dt.size(); ++i) {
92  HeaderFile << dt[i] << " ";
93  }
94  HeaderFile << "\n";
95 
96  // write out array of t_new
97  for (int i = 0; i < t_new.size(); ++i) {
98  HeaderFile << t_new[i] << " ";
99  }
100  HeaderFile << "\n";
101 
102  // write the BoxArray at each level
103  for (int lev = 0; lev <= finest_level; ++lev) {
104  boxArray(lev).writeOn(HeaderFile);
105  HeaderFile << '\n';
106  }
107  }
108 
109  // write the MultiFab data to, e.g., chk00010/Level_0/
110  // Here we make copies of the MultiFab with no ghost cells
111  for (int lev = 0; lev <= finest_level; ++lev)
112  {
113  BoxList bl2d = grids[lev].boxList();
114  for (auto& b : bl2d) {
115  b.setRange(2,0);
116  }
117  BoxArray ba2d(std::move(bl2d));
118 
119  MultiFab cons(grids[lev],dmap[lev],Cons::NumVars,0);
120  MultiFab::Copy(cons,vars_new[lev][Vars::cons],0,0,NVAR,0);
121  VisMF::Write(cons, amrex::MultiFabFileFullPrefix(lev, checkpointname, "Level_", "Cell"));
122 
123  MultiFab xvel(convert(grids[lev],IntVect(1,0,0)),dmap[lev],1,0);
124  MultiFab::Copy(xvel,vars_new[lev][Vars::xvel],0,0,1,0);
125  VisMF::Write(xvel, amrex::MultiFabFileFullPrefix(lev, checkpointname, "Level_", "XFace"));
126 
127  MultiFab yvel(convert(grids[lev],IntVect(0,1,0)),dmap[lev],1,0);
128  MultiFab::Copy(yvel,vars_new[lev][Vars::yvel],0,0,1,0);
129  VisMF::Write(yvel, amrex::MultiFabFileFullPrefix(lev, checkpointname, "Level_", "YFace"));
130 
131  MultiFab zvel(convert(grids[lev],IntVect(0,0,1)),dmap[lev],1,0);
132  MultiFab::Copy(zvel,vars_new[lev][Vars::zvel],0,0,1,0);
133  VisMF::Write(zvel, amrex::MultiFabFileFullPrefix(lev, checkpointname, "Level_", "ZFace"));
134 
135  if (solverChoice.use_terrain) {
136  // Note that we write the ghost cells of z_phys_nd (unlike above)
137  MultiFab z_height(convert(grids[lev],IntVect(NGROW-1,NGROW-1,NGROW-1)),dmap[lev],1,1);
138  MultiFab::Copy(z_height,*z_phys_nd[lev],0,0,1,1);
139  VisMF::Write(z_height, amrex::MultiFabFileFullPrefix(lev, checkpointname, "Level_", "Z_Phys_nd"));
140  }
141 
142  MultiFab mf_ru(grids[lev],dmap[lev],2,0);
143  MultiFab::Copy(mf_ru,*vec_ru[lev],0,0,2,0);
144  VisMF::Write(mf_ru, amrex::MultiFabFileFullPrefix(lev, checkpointname, "Level_", "XRHS"));
145 
146  MultiFab mf_rv(grids[lev],dmap[lev],2,0);
147  MultiFab::Copy(mf_rv,*vec_rv[lev],0,0,2,0);
148  VisMF::Write(mf_rv, amrex::MultiFabFileFullPrefix(lev, checkpointname, "Level_", "YRHS"));
149 
150  MultiFab mf_ubar(ba2d,dmap[lev],3,0);
151  MultiFab::Copy(mf_ubar,*(vec_ubar[lev]),0,0,3,0);
152  VisMF::Write(mf_ubar, amrex::MultiFabFileFullPrefix(lev, checkpointname, "Level_", "XBar"));
153

◆ WriteGenericPlotfileHeaderWithTerrain()

void ROMSX::WriteGenericPlotfileHeaderWithTerrain ( std::ostream &  HeaderFile,
int  nlevels,
const amrex::Vector< amrex::BoxArray > &  bArray,
const amrex::Vector< std::string > &  varnames,
amrex::Real  time,
const amrex::Vector< int > &  level_steps,
const std::string &  versionName,
const std::string &  levelPrefix,
const std::string &  mfPrefix 
) const
444 {
445  BL_ASSERT(nlevels <= bArray.size());
446  BL_ASSERT(nlevels <= ref_ratio.size()+1);
447  BL_ASSERT(nlevels <= level_steps.size());
448 
449  HeaderFile.precision(17);
450 
451  // ---- this is the generic plot file type name
452  HeaderFile << versionName << '\n';
453 
454  HeaderFile << varnames.size() << '\n';
455 
456  for (int ivar = 0; ivar < varnames.size(); ++ivar) {
457  HeaderFile << varnames[ivar] << "\n";
458  }
459  HeaderFile << AMREX_SPACEDIM << '\n';
460  HeaderFile << time << '\n';
461  HeaderFile << finest_level << '\n';
462  for (int i = 0; i < AMREX_SPACEDIM; ++i) {
463  HeaderFile << geom[0].ProbLo(i) << ' ';
464  }
465  HeaderFile << '\n';
466  for (int i = 0; i < AMREX_SPACEDIM; ++i) {
467  HeaderFile << geom[0].ProbHi(i) << ' ';
468  }
469  HeaderFile << '\n';
470  for (int i = 0; i < finest_level; ++i) {
471  HeaderFile << ref_ratio[i][0] << ' ';
472  }
473  HeaderFile << '\n';
474  for (int i = 0; i <= finest_level; ++i) {
475  HeaderFile << geom[i].Domain() << ' ';
476  }
477  HeaderFile << '\n';
478  for (int i = 0; i <= finest_level; ++i) {
479  HeaderFile << level_steps[i] << ' ';
480  }
481  HeaderFile << '\n';
482  for (int i = 0; i <= finest_level; ++i) {
483  for (int k = 0; k < AMREX_SPACEDIM; ++k) {
484  HeaderFile << geom[i].CellSize()[k] << ' ';
485  }
486  HeaderFile << '\n';
487  }
488  HeaderFile << (int) geom[0].Coord() << '\n';
489  HeaderFile << "0\n";
490 
491  for (int level = 0; level <= finest_level; ++level) {
492  HeaderFile << level << ' ' << bArray[level].size() << ' ' << time << '\n';
493  HeaderFile << level_steps[level] << '\n';
494 
495  const IntVect& domain_lo = geom[level].Domain().smallEnd();
496  for (int i = 0; i < bArray[level].size(); ++i)
497  {
498  // Need to shift because the RealBox ctor we call takes the
499  // physical location of index (0,0,0). This does not affect
500  // the usual cases where the domain index starts with 0.
501  const Box& b = shift(bArray[level][i], -domain_lo);
502  RealBox loc = RealBox(b, geom[level].CellSize(), geom[level].ProbLo());
503  for (int n = 0; n < AMREX_SPACEDIM; ++n) {
504  HeaderFile << loc.lo(n) << ' ' << loc.hi(n) << '\n';
505  }
506  }
507 
508  HeaderFile << MultiFabHeaderPath(level, levelPrefix, mfPrefix) << '\n';
509  }
510  HeaderFile << "1" << "\n";
511  HeaderFile << "3" << "\n";
512  HeaderFile << "amrexvec_nu_x" << "\n";
513  HeaderFile << "amrexvec_nu_y" << "\n";
514  HeaderFile << "amrexvec_nu_z" << "\n";
515  std::string mf_nodal_prefix = "Nu_nd";
516  for (int level = 0; level <= finest_level; ++level) {
517  HeaderFile << MultiFabHeaderPath(level, levelPrefix, mf_nodal_prefix) << '\n';
518  }
519 }

82  if (strlen(githash1) > 0) {

96

98  jobInfoFile << PrettyLine;
99  jobInfoFile << " Grid Information\n";
100  jobInfoFile << PrettyLine;
101 
102  int f_lev = finest_level;
103 
104  for (int i = 0; i <= f_lev; i++) {
105  jobInfoFile << " level: " << i << "\n";
106  jobInfoFile << " number of boxes = " << grids[i].size() << "\n";
107  jobInfoFile << " maximum zones = ";
108  for (int n = 0; n < AMREX_SPACEDIM; n++) {
109  jobInfoFile << geom[i].Domain().length(n) << " ";
110  }
111  jobInfoFile << "\n\n";

118  jobInfoFile << " -y: " << domain_bc_type[1] << "\n";
119  jobInfoFile << " +y: " << domain_bc_type[4] << "\n";
120  jobInfoFile << " -z: " << domain_bc_type[2] << "\n";
121  jobInfoFile << " +z: " << domain_bc_type[5] << "\n";
122 
123  jobInfoFile << "\n\n";
124 
125  // runtime parameters
126  jobInfoFile << PrettyLine;
127  jobInfoFile << " Inputs File Parameters\n";
128  jobInfoFile << PrettyLine;

132 }

◆ WriteMultiLevelPlotfileWithTerrain()

void ROMSX::WriteMultiLevelPlotfileWithTerrain ( const std::string &  plotfilename,
int  nlevels,
const amrex::Vector< const amrex::MultiFab * > &  mf,
const amrex::Vector< const amrex::MultiFab * > &  mf_nd,
const amrex::Vector< std::string > &  varnames,
amrex::Real  time,
const amrex::Vector< int > &  level_steps,
const std::string &  versionName = "HyperCLaw-V1.1",
const std::string &  levelPrefix = "Level_",
const std::string &  mfPrefix = "Cell",
const amrex::Vector< std::string > &  extra_dirs = amrex::Vector<std::string>() 
) const
360 {
361  BL_PROFILE("WriteMultiLevelPlotfileWithTerrain()");
362 
363  BL_ASSERT(nlevels <= mf.size());
364  BL_ASSERT(nlevels <= ref_ratio.size()+1);
365  BL_ASSERT(nlevels <= level_steps.size());
366  BL_ASSERT(mf[0]->nComp() == varnames.size());
367 
368  bool callBarrier(false);
369  PreBuildDirectorHierarchy(plotfilename, levelPrefix, nlevels, callBarrier);
370  if (!extra_dirs.empty()) {
371  for (const auto& d : extra_dirs) {
372  const std::string ed = plotfilename+"/"+d;
373  PreBuildDirectorHierarchy(ed, levelPrefix, nlevels, callBarrier);
374  }
375  }
376  ParallelDescriptor::Barrier();
377 
378  if (ParallelDescriptor::MyProc() == ParallelDescriptor::NProcs()-1) {
379  Vector<BoxArray> boxArrays(nlevels);
380  for(int level(0); level < boxArrays.size(); ++level) {
381  boxArrays[level] = mf[level]->boxArray();
382  }
383 
384  auto f = [=]() {
385  VisMF::IO_Buffer io_buffer(VisMF::IO_Buffer_Size);
386  std::string HeaderFileName(plotfilename + "/Header");
387  std::ofstream HeaderFile;
388  HeaderFile.rdbuf()->pubsetbuf(io_buffer.dataPtr(), io_buffer.size());
389  HeaderFile.open(HeaderFileName.c_str(), std::ofstream::out |
390  std::ofstream::trunc |
391  std::ofstream::binary);
392  if( ! HeaderFile.good()) FileOpenFailed(HeaderFileName);
393  WriteGenericPlotfileHeaderWithTerrain(HeaderFile, nlevels, boxArrays, varnames,
394  time, level_steps, versionName,
395  levelPrefix, mfPrefix);
396  };
397 
398  if (AsyncOut::UseAsyncOut()) {
399  AsyncOut::Submit(std::move(f));
400  } else {
401  f();
402  }
403  }
404 
405  std::string mf_nodal_prefix = "Nu_nd";
406  for (int level = 0; level <= finest_level; ++level)
407  {
408  if (AsyncOut::UseAsyncOut()) {
409  VisMF::AsyncWrite(*mf[level],
410  MultiFabFileFullPrefix(level, plotfilename, levelPrefix, mfPrefix),
411  true);
412  VisMF::AsyncWrite(*mf_nd[level],
413  MultiFabFileFullPrefix(level, plotfilename, levelPrefix, mf_nodal_prefix),
414  true);
415  } else {
416  const MultiFab* data;
417  std::unique_ptr<MultiFab> mf_tmp;
418  if (mf[level]->nGrowVect() != 0) {
419  mf_tmp = std::make_unique<MultiFab>(mf[level]->boxArray(),
420  mf[level]->DistributionMap(),
421  mf[level]->nComp(), 0, MFInfo(),
422  mf[level]->Factory());
423  MultiFab::Copy(*mf_tmp, *mf[level], 0, 0, mf[level]->nComp(), 0);
424  data = mf_tmp.get();
425  } else {
426  data = mf[level];
427  }
428  VisMF::Write(*data , MultiFabFileFullPrefix(level, plotfilename, levelPrefix, mfPrefix));
429  VisMF::Write(*mf_nd[level], MultiFabFileFullPrefix(level, plotfilename, levelPrefix, mf_nodal_prefix));
430  }
431  }
432 }
ROMSX::WriteGenericPlotfileHeaderWithTerrain
void WriteGenericPlotfileHeaderWithTerrain(std::ostream &HeaderFile, int nlevels, const amrex::Vector< amrex::BoxArray > &bArray, const amrex::Vector< std::string > &varnames, amrex::Real time, const amrex::Vector< int > &level_steps, const std::string &versionName, const std::string &levelPrefix, const std::string &mfPrefix) const
Definition: Plotfile.cpp:435

◆ WritePlotFile()

void ROMSX::WritePlotFile ( int  which,
amrex::Vector< std::string >  plot_var_names 
)

write plotfile to disk

86 {
87 
88  const Vector<std::string> varnames = PlotFileVarNames(plot_var_names);
89  const int ncomp_mf = varnames.size();
90  const auto ngrow_vars = IntVect(NGROW-1,NGROW-1,0);
91 
92  // We fillpatch here because some of the derived quantities require derivatives
93  // which require ghost cells to be filled
94  for (int lev = 0; lev <= finest_level; ++lev) {
95  FillPatch(lev, t_new[lev], vars_new[lev]);
96  }
97 
98  if (ncomp_mf == 0)
99  return;
100 
101  Vector<MultiFab> mf(finest_level+1);
102  for (int lev = 0; lev <= finest_level; ++lev) {
103  mf[lev].define(grids[lev], dmap[lev], ncomp_mf, ngrow_vars);
104  }
105 
106  Vector<MultiFab> mf_nd(finest_level+1);
107  if (solverChoice.use_terrain) {
108  for (int lev = 0; lev <= finest_level; ++lev) {
109  BoxArray nodal_grids(grids[lev]); nodal_grids.surroundingNodes();
110  mf_nd[lev].define(nodal_grids, dmap[lev], ncomp_mf, 1);
111  mf_nd[lev].setVal(0.);
112  }
113  }
114 
115  for (int lev = 0; lev <= finest_level; ++lev) {
116  int mf_comp = 0;
117 
118  // First, copy any of the conserved state variables into the output plotfile
119  AMREX_ALWAYS_ASSERT(cons_names.size() == Cons::NumVars);
120  for (int i = 0; i < Cons::NumVars; ++i) {
121  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, cons_names[i])) {
122  MultiFab::Copy(mf[lev],vars_new[lev][Vars::cons],i,mf_comp,1,ngrow_vars);
123  mf_comp++;
124  }
125  }
126 
127  // Next, check for velocities and if desired, output them
128  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "x_velocity") ||
129  containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "y_velocity") ||
130  containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "z_velocity")) {
131  amrex::Print()<<"For now, print faces as if they are at cell centers"<<std::endl;
132  // average_face_to_cellcenter(mf[lev],mf_comp,
133  // Array<const MultiFab*,3>{&vars_new[lev][Vars::xvel],&vars_new[lev][Vars::yvel],&vars_new[lev][Vars::zvel]});
134  //
135  // Convert the map-factor-scaled-velocities back to velocities
136  //
137  MultiFab dmf(mf[lev], make_alias, mf_comp, AMREX_SPACEDIM);
138  for (MFIter mfi(dmf, TilingIfNotGPU()); mfi.isValid(); ++mfi)
139  {
140  const Box& bx = mfi.growntilebox();
141  const Array4<Real> vel_arr = dmf.array(mfi);
142  const Array4<const Real> velx_arr = vars_new[lev][Vars::xvel].array(mfi);
143  const Array4<const Real> vely_arr = vars_new[lev][Vars::yvel].array(mfi);
144  const Array4<const Real> velz_arr = vars_new[lev][Vars::zvel].array(mfi);
145  const Array4<Real> msf_arr = mapfac_m[lev]->array(mfi);
146  ParallelFor(bx, [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
147  {
148  vel_arr(i,j,k,0) = velx_arr(i,j,k);
149  vel_arr(i,j,k,1) = vely_arr(i,j,k);
150  vel_arr(i,j,k,2) = velz_arr(i,j,k);
151  });
152  }
153  mf_comp += AMREX_SPACEDIM;
154  }
155 
156  // Finally, check for any derived quantities and compute them, inserting
157  // them into our output multifab
158  auto calculate_derived = [&](std::string der_name,
159  decltype(derived::romsx_dernull)& der_function)
160  {
161  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, der_name)) {
162  MultiFab dmf(mf[lev], make_alias, mf_comp, 1);
163 
164  for (MFIter mfi(dmf, TilingIfNotGPU()); mfi.isValid(); ++mfi)
165  {
166  const Box& bx = mfi.tilebox();
167  auto& dfab = dmf[mfi];
168  auto& sfab = vars_new[lev][Vars::cons][mfi];
169  der_function(bx, dfab, 0, 1, sfab, Geom(lev), t_new[0], nullptr, lev);
170  }
171 
172  mf_comp++;
173  }
174  };
175 
176  // Note: All derived variables must be computed in order of "derived_names" defined in ROMSX.H
177  calculate_derived("KE", derived::romsx_derKE);
178  calculate_derived("QKE", derived::romsx_derQKE);
179  calculate_derived("scalar", derived::romsx_derscalar);
180 
181  MultiFab r_hse(base_state[lev], make_alias, 0, 1); // r_0 is first component
182  MultiFab p_hse(base_state[lev], make_alias, 1, 1); // p_0 is second component
183 
184  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "pres_hse"))
185  {
186  // p_0 is second component of base_state
187  MultiFab::Copy(mf[lev],p_hse,0,mf_comp,1,ngrow_vars);
188  mf_comp += 1;
189  }
190  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "dens_hse"))
191  {
192  // r_0 is first component of base_state
193  MultiFab::Copy(mf[lev],r_hse,0,mf_comp,1,ngrow_vars);
194  mf_comp ++;
195  }
196 
197  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "pert_dens"))
198  {
199  for ( MFIter mfi(mf[lev],TilingIfNotGPU()); mfi.isValid(); ++mfi)
200  {
201  Box bx = mfi.tilebox();
202  bx.grow(ngrow_vars);
203  const Array4<Real>& derdat = mf[lev].array(mfi);
204  const Array4<Real const>& S_arr = vars_new[lev][Vars::cons].const_array(mfi);
205  const Array4<Real const>& r0_arr = r_hse.const_array(mfi);
206  ParallelFor(bx, [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE(int i, int j, int k) noexcept {
207  derdat(i, j, k, mf_comp) = S_arr(i,j,k,Rho_comp) - r0_arr(i,j,k);
208  });
209  }
210  mf_comp ++;
211  }
212 
213  if (solverChoice.use_terrain) {
214  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "z_phys"))
215  {
216  MultiFab::Copy(mf[lev],*z_phys_cc[lev],0,mf_comp,1,ngrow_vars);
217  mf_comp ++;
218  }
219 
220  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "detJ"))
221  {
222  MultiFab::Copy(mf[lev],*detJ_cc[lev],0,mf_comp,1,ngrow_vars);
223  mf_comp ++;
224  }
225  } // use_terrain
226  }
227 
228  std::string plotfilename;
229  if (which == 1)
230  plotfilename = Concatenate(plot_file_1, istep[0], 5);
231  else if (which == 2)
232  plotfilename = Concatenate(plot_file_2, istep[0], 5);
233 
234  mf[0].FillBoundary(geom[0].periodicity());
235 
236  if (finest_level == 0)
237  {
238  if (plotfile_type == "amrex") {
239  amrex::Print() << "Writing plotfile " << plotfilename << "\n";
240  if (solverChoice.use_terrain) {
241  // We started with mf_nd holding 0 in every component; here we fill only the offset in z
242  int lev = 0;
243  MultiFab::Copy(mf_nd[lev],*z_phys_nd[lev],0,2,1,0);
244  Real dz = Geom()[lev].CellSizeArray()[2];
245  for (MFIter mfi(mf_nd[lev], TilingIfNotGPU()); mfi.isValid(); ++mfi) {
246  Box bx = mfi.tilebox();
247  bx.grow(ngrow_vars);
248  Array4< Real> mf_arr = mf_nd[lev].array(mfi);
249  ParallelFor(bx, [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k) {
250  mf_arr(i,j,k,2) -= k * dz;
251  });
252  }
253  WriteMultiLevelPlotfileWithTerrain(plotfilename, finest_level+1,
254  GetVecOfConstPtrs(mf),
255  GetVecOfConstPtrs(mf_nd),
256  varnames,
257  t_new[0], istep);
258  } else {
259  WriteMultiLevelPlotfile(plotfilename, finest_level+1,
260  GetVecOfConstPtrs(mf),
261  varnames,
262  Geom(), t_new[0], istep, refRatio());
263  }
264  writeJobInfo(plotfilename);
265 #ifdef ROMSX_USE_HDF5
266  } else if (plotfile_type == "hdf5" || plotfile_type == "HDF5") {
267  amrex::Print() << "Writing plotfile " << plotfilename+"d01.h5" << "\n";
268  WriteMultiLevelPlotfileHDF5(plotfilename, finest_level+1,
269  GetVecOfConstPtrs(mf),
270  varnames,
271  Geom(), t_new[0], istep, refRatio());
272 #endif
273 #ifdef ROMSX_USE_NETCDF
274  } else if (plotfile_type == "netcdf" || plotfile_type == "NetCDF") {
275  int lev = 0;
276  int which = 0;
277  writeNCPlotFile(lev, which, plotfilename, GetVecOfConstPtrs(mf), varnames, istep, t_new[0]);
278  total_plot_file_step_1 += 1;
279 #endif
280  } else {
281  amrex::Print() << "User specified plot_filetype = " << plotfile_type << std::endl;
282  amrex::Abort("Dont know this plot_filetype");
283  }
284 
285  } else { // multilevel
286 
287  Vector<IntVect> r2(finest_level);
288  Vector<Geometry> g2(finest_level+1);
289  Vector<MultiFab> mf2(finest_level+1);
290 
291  mf2[0].define(grids[0], dmap[0], ncomp_mf, 0);
292 
293  // Copy level 0 as is
294  MultiFab::Copy(mf2[0],mf[0],0,0,mf[0].nComp(),0);
295 
296  // Define a new multi-level array of Geometry's so that we pass the new "domain" at lev > 0
297  Array<int,AMREX_SPACEDIM> periodicity =
298  {Geom()[0].isPeriodic(0),Geom()[0].isPeriodic(1),Geom()[0].isPeriodic(2)};
299  g2[0].define(Geom()[0].Domain(),&(Geom()[0].ProbDomain()),0,periodicity.data());
300 
301  if (plotfile_type == "amrex") {
302  r2[0] = IntVect(1,1,ref_ratio[0][0]);
303  for (int lev = 1; lev <= finest_level; ++lev) {
304  if (lev > 1) {
305  r2[lev-1][0] = 1;
306  r2[lev-1][1] = 1;
307  r2[lev-1][2] = r2[lev-2][2] * ref_ratio[lev-1][0];
308  }
309 
310  mf2[lev].define(refine(grids[lev],r2[lev-1]), dmap[lev], ncomp_mf, 0);
311 
312  // Set the new problem domain
313  Box d2(Geom()[lev].Domain());
314  d2.refine(r2[lev-1]);
315 
316  g2[lev].define(d2,&(Geom()[lev].ProbDomain()),0,periodicity.data());
317  }
318 
319  // Do piecewise interpolation of mf into mf2
320  for (int lev = 1; lev <= finest_level; ++lev) {
321  for (MFIter mfi(mf2[lev], TilingIfNotGPU()); mfi.isValid(); ++mfi) {
322  const Box& bx = mfi.tilebox();
323  pcinterp_interp(bx,mf2[lev].array(mfi), 0, mf[lev].nComp(), mf[lev].const_array(mfi),0,r2[lev-1]);
324  }
325  }
326 
327  // Define an effective ref_ratio which is isotropic to be passed into WriteMultiLevelPlotfile
328  Vector<IntVect> rr(finest_level);
329  for (int lev = 0; lev < finest_level; ++lev) {
330  rr[lev] = IntVect(ref_ratio[lev][0],ref_ratio[lev][1],ref_ratio[lev][0]);
331  }
332 
333  WriteMultiLevelPlotfile(plotfilename, finest_level+1, GetVecOfConstPtrs(mf2), varnames,
334  g2, t_new[0], istep, rr);
335  writeJobInfo(plotfilename);
336 #ifdef ROMSX_USE_NETCDF
337  } else if (plotfile_type == "netcdf" || plotfile_type == "NetCDF") {
338  for (int lev = 0; lev <= finest_level; ++lev) {
339  for (int which = 0; which < num_boxes_at_level[lev]; which++) {
340  writeNCPlotFile(lev, which, plotfilename, GetVecOfConstPtrs(mf), varnames, istep, t_new[0]);
341  total_plot_file_step_1 += 1;
342  }
343  }
344 #endif
345  }
346  } // end multi-level
347 }
ROMSX::total_plot_file_step_1
int total_plot_file_step_1
Definition: ROMSX.H:874
ROMSX::WriteMultiLevelPlotfileWithTerrain
void WriteMultiLevelPlotfileWithTerrain(const std::string &plotfilename, int nlevels, const amrex::Vector< const amrex::MultiFab * > &mf, const amrex::Vector< const amrex::MultiFab * > &mf_nd, const amrex::Vector< std::string > &varnames, amrex::Real time, const amrex::Vector< int > &level_steps, const std::string &versionName="HyperCLaw-V1.1", const std::string &levelPrefix="Level_", const std::string &mfPrefix="Cell", const amrex::Vector< std::string > &extra_dirs=amrex::Vector< std::string >()) const

Definition: Derive.cpp:40
